, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gestalt therapy focuses\non process (what is actually happening) over content (what is being talked about).&nbsp; The emphasis is on what is being done,\nthought, and felt at the present moment (the phenomenality of both client and\ntherapist), rather than on what was, might be, could be, or should have been..</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nGestalt therapy &nbsp;the major goal is\nself-awareness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Gestalt therapy, the goal is to discover people connected\nwith a patient's unresolved issues and try to engage those people (or images of\nthose people) in interactions that can lead to a resolution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WARN \u2013 Gesalt therapy\nhas raped the minds of disturbed people with severe mental illness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP teaches that our\nmind-body (neuro) and what we say (language) all interact together to form our\nperceptions of the world, or maps (programming).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each person's map of the world\ndetermines feelings and behavior. &nbsp;Unrealistic\n&nbsp;maps will restrict choices and result in\nhumongous &nbsp;problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In NLP the Meta-model\nis a set of specifying questions or language patterns designed to challenge and\nexpand the limits to a person's model or 'map' of the world.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a person\nspeaks about a problem or situation, their choice of words, (or \u2018indicators\u2019),\nwill distort, generalize, and delete portions of their experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By listening\nto and responding to these language patterns the practitioner seeks to help the\nclient to recover the information that is under the surface of the words. A\ntherapist who \u2019listens\u2019 on the basis of their existing belief systems may miss\nimportant aspects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP used the \"reframing\"\ntechnique .&nbsp; It functions through\n\"changing the way you perceive an event and so changing the meaning.&nbsp; &nbsp;When\nthe meaning changes, responses and behaviors will also change. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing with language allows you to see the\nworld in a different way and this changes the meaning. This may work to subdue\nanger&nbsp; in a limited manner.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To reframe something is to change its meaning\nby putting it in a different setting, context or frame. For instance, a nasty\nexperience can seem funny when put in a long- term frame.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmeaning of any event depends on how we frame it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we change the frame we\nchange the meaning and with it our responses and behaviors.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing is a part of Vedanta philosophy.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fqoWr4F8584/WT6gZTWOsUI/AAAAAAABUQ0/AJJRbE_ZUKEqt9kjqlQ7S5ddmzAi5b0PQCLcB/s1600/imafffges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"193\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fqoWr4F8584/WT6gZTWOsUI/AAAAAAABUQ0/AJJRbE_ZUKEqt9kjqlQ7S5ddmzAi5b0PQCLcB/s400/imafffges.jpg\" width=\"389\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Panchatantra princes would be given tales\nto derive the moral and reframe behaviors.&nbsp;\nPrinces were prepared for the throne by intelligent stories of animals\nand birds in the deep forest <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_kFBsl1iavQ/WT6i8jXyJ3I/AAAAAAABURM/TtcFaSpciKAY8n-TBr1WS-uo4bT8_zEOACLcB/s1600/innages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_kFBsl1iavQ/WT6i8jXyJ3I/AAAAAAABURM/TtcFaSpciKAY8n-TBr1WS-uo4bT8_zEOACLcB/s640/innages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QC6JG76ZZe4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QC6JG76ZZe4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every behavior is\nuseful in some situation. By thinking of a useful context, you can change your\nresponse to that behavior. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In evolutionary terms,\nour brains don\u2019t do anything without some underlying purpose. Our brain\u2019s\nfunctioning is always of benefit overall to the survival of the species. We\nmight feel it isn\u2019t acting in our short-term personal interest sometimes, but\nthere is always a purpose for our behavior and responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Putting a positive spin\non ideas in politics is a typical use of reframing. Finding the positive\nintention of a behavior is the other kind of &nbsp;reframing in Hindu philosophy</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta recognizes that\ngenerally, people do NOT intend to harm other people with &nbsp;words or &nbsp;actions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The frames we have\ndeveloped limit us, and prevent us from having what we want. In life, nothing\nis intrinsically good or bad, positive or negative. Events or experiences don\u2019t,\nof themselves, have any meaning whatsoever, they have only the meaning we give\nto them. That meaning is determined to a large degree by the frame in which we\nperceive it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Syncretism of Vedanta\nsays that when the frame changes so does the meaning, and our response to it \u2013\nthe way we feel and how we act. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SLqNJ1jcWRo/WT6e5cJvKFI/AAAAAAABUQk/JV10krgabK0Am3KxY7hXjMEzx75j4cF2ACLcB/s1600/downloFFCad.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"259\" data-original-width=\"194\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SLqNJ1jcWRo/WT6e5cJvKFI/AAAAAAABUQk/JV10krgabK0Am3KxY7hXjMEzx75j4cF2ACLcB/s400/downloFFCad.png\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Indian philosophy thrived only due to be abundant\nwild life in our jungles and the abundant cultures and thousands of languages\nin a single &nbsp;land steeped in spirituality\n\u2014all in harmony .&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Eclecticism is a\nfusion of knowledge from all sources-- &nbsp;conscious and unconscious . &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aJIevp9CvDI/WT6hk5eLFuI/AAAAAAABURE/TozWXenSjxUUdmrTfsYYsctE_NI-sY08QCLcB/s1600/im77ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aJIevp9CvDI/WT6hk5eLFuI/AAAAAAABURE/TozWXenSjxUUdmrTfsYYsctE_NI-sY08QCLcB/s320/im77ages.png\" width=\"212\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>There lies the charm --<span style=\"color: red;\">we learnt from mute creatures</span> created by god.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tNntPuID8DM/WT6hAKUApnI/AAAAAAABUQ8/Z3AhBGrDx5gg5u68_REinGHWJfxs8eDkgCLcB/s1600/imagr4s.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"328\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tNntPuID8DM/WT6hAKUApnI/AAAAAAABUQ8/Z3AhBGrDx5gg5u68_REinGHWJfxs8eDkgCLcB/s640/imagr4s.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta\nwas a conceptual approach that did not hold rigidly to a single paradigm or set\nof assumptions, but instead drew upon multiple theories, styles, or ideas to\ngain complementary insights into a subject. Vedanta drawing from abundant and\npriceless variety could have originated only in India .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Indian philosophy\nwas not a potted plant.&nbsp; Philosophy in Vedanta\nincluded &nbsp;life as connected with\nexistence, knowledge, values, reason, mind, and language.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the nature of man\nthat he likes change. He wants new and novel ways in every field of work. The\nsame is the case with learning process. Learners always like something new and\nexciting.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Panchatantra stories which &nbsp;gave moral education to our Kings provided\nit.&nbsp; Sanatana Dharma is steeped in cosmic\nallegories&nbsp; --it can &nbsp;communicate with the subconscious .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OCjCxVxHtz4/WT6iVHZkz2I/AAAAAAABURI/lksoJ2gCXJA6-1jC3POqQJ5l_sH9x0igwCLcB/s1600/imagnnnes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"186\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OCjCxVxHtz4/WT6iVHZkz2I/AAAAAAABURI/lksoJ2gCXJA6-1jC3POqQJ5l_sH9x0igwCLcB/s320/imagnnnes.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>There\ncannot be any \"sleight of mouth\" or \"sleight of hand\" in\nour Dharma.&nbsp; The white invader tried his\nbest to convert saffron to a conmans color\u2014they failed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DlgwFZ-LX1g/WT5PRUw4HKI/AAAAAAABUQE/IP30k-3K9BIhEws5v_Xaw_qwtsZrxrY8gCLcB/s1600/bjp-mp-rajeev-chaddnrashekhar-arnab-goswami.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"480\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DlgwFZ-LX1g/WT5PRUw4HKI/AAAAAAABUQE/IP30k-3K9BIhEws5v_Xaw_qwtsZrxrY8gCLcB/s640/bjp-mp-rajeev-chaddnrashekhar-arnab-goswami.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Now I see Commie Arnab Goswami ( employed by\nBJP Rajya Sabha MP Rajeev Chandrasekhar ) trying the same thing on his Republic\nTV channel.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedic philosophy was embedded\nin wisdom and love of knowledge \u2013 it can never be killed .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger management is\neffective when a nag nag PMS laden woman perpetually in faalthu rage can be\ntaught to reframe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing involves\nseeing things from a different perspective, in another light, from an\nalternative point of view and different perspective \u2014and is useful to quench\nrage.. &nbsp;Reframing &nbsp;can be used consciously and deliberately, in\nVedanta to teach young prince the value of tolerance and not jumping into conclusions\n\u2013all this using a medium of simple animal and bird stories.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing is not\nabout mindless optimism \u2013 the &nbsp;aim was &nbsp;to achieve a realistic perspective on reality.&nbsp; If you know how to reframe , it is easy to\nwin debates. The starting point in context reframing is the presupposition that\nevery behaviour is useful and appropriate in some context.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Identifying where or\nin what situation a behaviour or event would be useful is context reframing. The\npurpose of reframing is to help a person experience their actions, the impact\nof their beliefs, etc. from a different perspective (frame) and potentially be\nmore resourceful or have more choice in how they react.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the west parents (\nshorn of spirituality ) are unable to reframe when their see their young\nchildren \u201cmisbehaving \u201c. &nbsp;Assuming every behaviour has a positive intention, the\nparent may choose to discover the positive intention. The parent may point out\nwhere or in what context that type of behaviour is acceptable; thus validating\nto the child that his behaviours are useful in certain contexts. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jwyzjoD9EbU/WT6hWCt80GI/AAAAAAABURA/D-SA0mqnUqIZ4wsi1kk0KtxGREpGFBZqQCLcB/s1600/imahges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jwyzjoD9EbU/WT6hWCt80GI/AAAAAAABURA/D-SA0mqnUqIZ4wsi1kk0KtxGREpGFBZqQCLcB/s320/imahges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PEOPLE TRAINED BY NLP\nCONMEN TEND TO USE IT ON THEIR CHILDREN AND LOVED ONES.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">ONCE THE GLASS OF TRUST IS SHATTERED , IT IS\nTOO LATE</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-th75A7ZL5mg/WT6eXsgEf9I/AAAAAAABUQc/L2vx0D06CB0PAXp7VutsoprHTrlW85BPACLcB/s1600/dRownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"259\" data-original-width=\"194\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-th75A7ZL5mg/WT6eXsgEf9I/AAAAAAABUQc/L2vx0D06CB0PAXp7VutsoprHTrlW85BPACLcB/s400/dRownload.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Framing is a mental\nstructure that is built upon the beliefs you have about yourself, your roles,\nyour circumstances, and about other people. It is a structure you use to\nascribe meaning to given circumstances.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, the meaning you ascribe\nto any event is dependent upon how you frame it in your mind. As such, your\nframes shape how you see the world, how you see yourself, how you view others,\nand how you interpret your life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The frames of reference\nyou use collaborate with your beliefs and values. You will therefore frame\nthings in a certain way that corresponds with what you believe and value most\nin life \u2014 irrelevant of whether your beliefs are helpful or unhelpful.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This\nbasically means that every frame you make is linked to an underlying belief\nand/or assumption that is implied by your thoughts. In this way your frames\nprovide you with a context in which you can assess your progress.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is\nhelpful, but at the same time can be unhelpful. It is helpful because it allows\nyou to unlock new opportunities and explore other possibilities that might be\nadvantageous. However, it is unhelpful if your frames are built upon your\nlimiting belief systems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In such instances \u2014 and without much objective thought\n\u2014 you might unconsciously be setting boundaries and putting limitations on\nyourself regarding what you can or can\u2019t do; and this therefore limits your\nperspective, opportunities and the possibilities that lay before you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is however a\npositive intention behind all your thoughts. Therefore all the frames of\nreference you use are there to help you in some way, or at least in some\nspecific context. This of course doesn\u2019t mean that these thoughts are right or\nthat they are acceptable, however it does mean that they have some value, and\ntherefore can be used in a positive way<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing is very much\nlike changing a picture in a picture frame. The frame hasn\u2019t changed, however\nthe picture within the frame is now different. In other words, the situation\nhasn\u2019t changed, however your view of the situation is now different then what\nit was before.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are therefore not changing the situation, but rather\nchanging your view of the situation in a more helpful and optimal way.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jGCSVBt0z9A/WT6elBYvOXI/AAAAAAABUQg/k9kWFj6NB2UTYnJR62NPT9crFEKET-wiACLcB/s1600/doZZBBBBwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"188\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jGCSVBt0z9A/WT6elBYvOXI/AAAAAAABUQg/k9kWFj6NB2UTYnJR62NPT9crFEKET-wiACLcB/s400/doZZBBBBwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing is easy to do\nto shift anything from a negative or blocked state into a clear or positive\nstate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bWGtjqv19ZA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bWGtjqv19ZA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frame provides a context\nor focus for your thoughts and actions. Just as a picture frame puts borders or\nboundaries on what you can see in a picture, the frames of reference that you\nchoose as a result of your beliefs about yourself and others, your perceived\nrole in life, your perceived limitations in skills/abilities, etc. can limit\nwhat you see as possible or can open up all sorts of possibilities.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\n(and if you allow them, others) are continually setting time frames,\nboundaries, limits, etc. on what you can and can\u2019t do \u2013 often without any real\nthought about the consequences or if the limitations are true.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reframing is when an\nundesirable behavior or trait is conferred a positive intention. Alternatives\nto satisfy the positive intent are found, followed by negotiations with (parts\nof) self to resolve conflict, check for ecology and to implement the new behavior.\nReframing can also be used to describe changing the context or representation\nof a problem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frame provides a\ncontext or focus for your thoughts and actions. Just as a picture frame puts\nborders or boundaries on what you can see in a picture, the frames of reference\nthat you choose as a result of your beliefs about yourself and others, your\nperceived role in life, your perceived limitations in skills/abilities, etc.\ncan limit what you see as possible or can open up all sorts of possibilities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You (and if you allow them, others) are continually setting time frames,\nboundaries, limits, etc. on what you can and can\u2019t do \u2013 often without any real\nthought about the consequences or if the limitations are true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changing the frame of\nan experience can have a major influence on how you perceive, interpret and\nreact to that experience.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being told that you have one hour to complete a task\nwill most likely result in a different emotional state, approach and quality of\nwork than if you are told that you have one week to accomplish the same task.\nThis illustrates how a change in frame can have a significant impact on the\nchoices you make.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of reframing is to help a person experience their\nactions, the impact of their beliefs, etc. from a different perspective (frame)\nand potentially be more resourceful or have more choice in how they react.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Reframing is a process through which a\nproblematic behaviour is separated from the positive intention of the internal\nprogram or \u201cpart\u201d that is responsible for the behaviour.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">New choices of\nbehaviour are established by having the part responsible for the old behaviour\ntake responsibility for implementing other behaviours that satisfy the same\npositive intention but don\u2019t have the problematic by-products.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\ncan change the meaning of almost anything.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you get stuck, in road rage , it\nis because your ability to change meaning is limited.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Context\nreframing acknowledges the fact that any sensory representation is valid - given\nthe appropriate context.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A context reframe takes\nthe \u2018problem\u2019 experience and places it in a context in which it is no longer a\n\u2018problem\u2019 or where that experience actually has a useful or positive benefit or\neven becomes an asset or a skill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Content Reframe is\ngiving another meaning to a statement by recovering more content, which changes\nthe focus. It is also called Meaning Reframe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each individual's\nperception of the world is their 'map'. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP teaches that our mind-body (neuro) and\nwhat we say (language) all interact together to form our perceptions of the\nworld, or maps (programming).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS\n!&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each person's map of the world and his unique\npast experiences and SOUL SAMSKARAS determines feelings and behavior. Impoverished\n\u2013 and unrealistic \u2013 maps can restrict choices and result in problems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP knows\nshit about soul samskaras and phobias, inherited from a previous birth. NLP\ngurus are mere conmen. They are the street magicians who convince you that they\ndo miracles on you<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-94B0lMdl4dw/WT6dygjK_wI/AAAAAAABUQU/FsxKRV3g57cSCFx4RHUju4XK5KZSO1r_gCLcB/s1600/doZZwnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE WARN THE MODI GOVT. &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">NLP HAS INVADED INDIA\u2014 &nbsp;THIS IS WHY I WRITE\nTHIS BLOG POST</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVEN IN MANAGEMENT JOB INTERVIEWS THEY ASK\nQUESTIONS WHICH CAN BE ANSWERED ONLY IF YOU KNOW NLP CON TECHNIQUES . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIA DOES NOT NEED THIS NONSENSE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOME OF THESE NLP QUESTIONS CANNOT BE EVEN\nUNDERSTOOD BY THE BIGGEST GENIUS ON EARTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ONE SUCH QUESTION ASKED A COUPLE OF DAYS AGO FOR\nA GOVT JOB WAS -</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP conmen swear -- &nbsp;When\na person speaks about a problem or situation, their choice of words, (or\n\u2018indicators\u2019), will distort, generalize, and delete portions of their\nexperience. By listening to and responding to these language patterns the NLP practitioner\nseeks to help the client to recover the information that is under the surface\nof the words.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS !</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP teaches 'mirroring'\nor matching body language, posture, breathing, predicates and voice tonality. Listen , NLP cunts-- you cant even fool a kid\nwith this<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check out NLP shit-- Memories\nare closely linked to sensory experience. When people are processing\ninformation they see images and hear sounds and voices and process this with\ninternally created feelings. Some representations are within conscious\nawareness but information is largely processed at the unconscious level.&nbsp; When involved in any task, such as making\nconversation, describing a problem in therapy, reading a book, kicking a ball\nor riding a horse, their representational systems, consisting of images,\nsounds, feelings (and possibly smell and taste) are being activated at the same\ntime.&nbsp; The way representational systems\nare organised and the links between them impact on behavioral performance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many NLP techniques ,\nNLP conmen swear --rely on interrupting maladaptive patterns and replacing them\nwith more positive and creative thought patterns which will in turn impact on\nbehavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh Yeah ?&nbsp; How come I have seen nothing of this sort\u2014except\nin hot NLP air ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP teaches that we\nconstantly make \"anchors\" (associations) between what we see, hear\nand feel and our emotional states. While in an emotional state if a person is\nexposed to a unique stimulus (sight, sound or touch) then a connection is made\nbetween the emotion and the unique stimulus. If the unique stimulus occurs\nagain, the emotional state will then be triggered.&nbsp;&nbsp; NLP teaches that anchors (such as a\nparticular touch associated with a memory or state) can be deliberately created\nand triggered to help people access 'resourceful' or other target states.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y0FJg4ASGog/WT6nmIcA3cI/AAAAAAABURY/XO7VN8EDiTwxTvqMKAYkUp3wpvQQnLEFwCLcB/s1600/imagues.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"137\" data-original-width=\"367\" height=\"148\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y0FJg4ASGog/WT6nmIcA3cI/AAAAAAABURY/XO7VN8EDiTwxTvqMKAYkUp3wpvQQnLEFwCLcB/s400/imagues.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh yeah ? , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Martin Luther King\nJr&nbsp; used the phrase 'I have a dream'\neight times in his address to about 2,000 people at Booker T. Washington High\nSchool in Rocky Mount, eight months before electrifying the nation with a much\ntouted extempore speech&nbsp; at the March on\nWashington.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He also referred to\n'the sons of former slaves and the sons of former slave owners,' saying he\ndreamed they would 'meet at the table of brotherhood.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the steps of the\nLincoln Memorial, King changed that to 'sit down together at the table of\nbrotherhood.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In both speeches, LET\nFREEDOM RING&nbsp; served as his rallying cry\n.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SI_3DgjV560/WT9rlKXG2gI/AAAAAAABUSI/PhRCuvtQ2sklgcrj9Oy0FbyGU5Anz1QUQCLcB/s1600/imFawges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was to be the\nsymbol of NON-VIOLENCE .&nbsp;&nbsp; Once you wear\nthis cap you cannot raise your arm against anybody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP TECHNIQUES WERE\nUSED IN MARTIN LUTHER KINGs \u201cI HAVE A DREAM SPEECH \u201c\u2014TRAINED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the first half of\nhis speech Martin Luther King &nbsp;uses\nnegative emotional words, like \"captivity,\" \"poverty,\"\n\"exile,\" \"persecution,\" \"despair,\" \" lonely\nisland of poverty\" and \"dark and desolate\" and talks of the\n\"manacles of segregation\" and the \"chains of\ndiscrimination\" in an obvious reference to slavery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second half of the\nspeech is packed with positive emotional words, such as \"freedom,\"\n\"justice,\" 'faith\" and \"hope\" as he begins to outline\nwhat could be if blacks and whites learned to work together and not fear each\nother. He speaks of a \"table of brotherhood,\" \"an oasis of\nfreedom and justice\" and \"beautiful symphony of brotherhood\" and\nthe hope that black and white children will be able to hold hands, and be\njudged \"not on the colour of their skin but on the content of their\ncharacter.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Dym1rgcXb_g/WT95kKDPjsI/AAAAAAABUTk/QsbOatbcfLsWRnCcJGHArfcu5jsnY4LNgCLcB/s1600/WWimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"174\" data-original-width=\"290\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Dym1rgcXb_g/WT95kKDPjsI/AAAAAAABUTk/QsbOatbcfLsWRnCcJGHArfcu5jsnY4LNgCLcB/s400/WWimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King ends with NLP-- \"And\nso let freedom ring -- from the prodigious hilltops of New Hampshire. Let\nfreedom ring -- from the mighty mountains of New York. Let freedom ring -- from\nthe heightening Alleghenies of Pennsylvania. Let freedom ring -- from the\nsnow-capped Rockies of Colorado. Let freedom ring -- from the curvaceous slopes\nof California.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But not only that. Let\nfreedom ring -- from Stone Mountain of Georgia. Let freedom ring -- from\nLookout Mountain of Tennessee. Let freedom ring -- from every hill and molehill\nof Mississippi, from every mountainside, let freedom ring!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And when this happens,\nwhen we allow freedom to ring, when we let it ring from every village and every\nhamlet, from every state and every city , we will be able to speed up that day\nwhen all of God's children, black men and white men, Jews and Gentiles,\nProtestants and Catholics , will be able to join hands and sing in the words of\nthe old Negro spiritual,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Free at last,\nfree at last. Thank God Almighty, we are free at last!\"\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TOg33moV4GI/WT9sY48z_9I/AAAAAAABUSQ/XXMLIb2XGQ84vMQOX0saFErZmQX8KuzZwCLcB/s1600/downzzRVload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"201\" data-original-width=\"251\" height=\"512\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TOg33moV4GI/WT9sY48z_9I/AAAAAAABUSQ/XXMLIb2XGQ84vMQOX0saFErZmQX8KuzZwCLcB/s640/downzzRVload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King used a large\nnumber of embedded commands in pushing forward his views. &nbsp;He made it highly emotional: Direct your words\nto the emotions and stir them vigorously. &nbsp;He used &nbsp;lots of repetition: persistently repeat your\npoint over and over\u2014an NLP method .&nbsp; Forget\nbeauty, literary criteria, scientific reasoning, balance, and novelty. The focus\nsolely on convincing people and creating zealots.&nbsp; His NLP slogans drove his movement forward.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zG908sTVXrg/WT95DIUjkBI/AAAAAAABUTc/qc-qH0C5IqMoJJvQO6_DnSB-GJhFe-LqwCLcB/s1600/doE3wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"177\" data-original-width=\"285\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zG908sTVXrg/WT95DIUjkBI/AAAAAAABUTc/qc-qH0C5IqMoJJvQO6_DnSB-GJhFe-LqwCLcB/s400/doE3wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King\u2019s speeches were\nfull of lyrical metaphors that took the listener on a timeline journey, from\nthe past, to the present, then into the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his \u2018I have a dream\u2019\nspeech, he moves the listener from summer into autumn and the element of time\nis reinforced by saying \u20181963 is not an end but a beginning.\u2019 MLK uses a\nmetaphor for his subject matter and through his metaphorical journey he leads\nthe recipient by doing a series of modality reframes:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Dark and desolate\nvalley of segregation to the sunlit path of racial justice\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c From the quicksands\nof racial injustice to the solid rock of brotherhood\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c The sweltering summer\nof the Negro\u2019s legitimate discontent will not pass until there is an\ninvigorating autumn of freedom and equality\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Let us not seek to\nsatisfy our thirst for freedom by drinking from the cup of bitterness and\nhatred\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Every hill and\nmountain shall be made low, and rough places will be made plains, and the\ncrooked places will be made straight and beautiful\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King &nbsp;repeats \u2018I have a dream\u2019 eight times, \u2018We can\nnever be satisfied\u2019 six times, and \u2018Let freedom ring\u2019 seven times, each one a\npowerful reframe on past, present and what is hoped for the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL TO MAKE A CHOOT OUT\nOF ENSLAVED BLACK MEN IN USA, WHO WANTED TO START A VIOLENT REVOLT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GANDHI WENT FROM SOUTH\nAFRICA TO LONDON AT THE BREAK OF WW1 BEFORE HE WAS UNLEASHED ON INDIA BY JEW\nROTHSCHILD\u2014TO RECRUIT INDIAN SOLDIERS FOR WW1</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi held forth an\nextreme either-or, black-and-white call to action.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DhNzAUbEUlg/WT92k7aMTZI/AAAAAAABUS8/_nDKNoWKbDUAGTLsG2HZhIaAa3SCUmPagCLcB/s1600/dSSWownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"188\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DhNzAUbEUlg/WT92k7aMTZI/AAAAAAABUS8/_nDKNoWKbDUAGTLsG2HZhIaAa3SCUmPagCLcB/s400/dSSWownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHEN RECRUITING SOLDIERS FOR JEW ROTHSCHILD GANDHI ADVOCATED VIOLENCE&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></i></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Gandhi recruited 13\nlakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which\n111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Gandhi recruited&nbsp; 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in\nthe second World war.&nbsp;&nbsp; Out of this\n243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four decades ago, on my\nship, the young Second Engineer was a Telugu guy. &nbsp;&nbsp;His wife was Veena Gayatri a music maestro\u2014just\nmarried . &nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapport sits at the\nheart of NLP as a central pillar, or essential ingredient, which leads to\nsuccessful communication between two individuals or groups of people. But NLP\nmethods are laden with deceit.&nbsp; &nbsp;To build rapport there is NO need to con\npeople . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my 30 years as ship\ncaptain , I have never conned anybody to building a rapport or to gain trust or\nto foster team work.&nbsp; &nbsp;Mind you it is not about my team alone which I\ncommand and hold absolute power over. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At every port I have to\ndeal with Customs / Coast Guard / Immigration / Port Health &nbsp;and port authorities all of who hold\ntremendous nuisance potential&nbsp; \u2014 &nbsp;95% of them itching to fleece the Captain off\nwhisky and cigarettes as a quid pro quo. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who know me will vouch Captain never surrendered his honour like other Captains&nbsp;</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapport is a mutually\nrespectful way of being with others and a way of doing business at all times.&nbsp; &nbsp;You\ndon\u2019t need to like people to build rapport with them. Rapport is not a technique\nthat you turn on and off at will like a torch, but something that should flow\nconstantly between people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t kid yourself that\nyou can pull rapport instantly out of the bag for a particular meeting,\nconversation or problem-solving session. True rapport is based on an\ninstinctive sense of trust and integrity --the ability to relate to others in a\nway that creates trust and understanding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the ability to\nsee the other's point of view and get them to understand yours. You don't have\nto agree with their point of view or even like it. It makes any form of\ncommunication easier.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUILDING RAPPORT IS A\nGENUINE THING.&nbsp; YOU DON\u2019T NEED TO DECEIVE\n&nbsp;PEOPLE TO BUILD A RAPPORT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is \u2018a sympathetic relationship\nor understanding\u2019: rapport is about making a two-way connection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You know that you\u2019ve\nmade such a connection when you experience a genuine sense of trust and respect\nwith another person, when you engage comfortably with someone no matter how\ndifferent the two of you are, and when you know that you\u2019re listening and being\nlistened to.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although you may want\nto spend your time with people who are just like you, the world is full of a\nhuge variety of different types of people to meet, all with special skills,\nopinions, and backgrounds. Rapport is the key to success and influence in both\nyour personal and professional life, because it\u2019s about appreciating and\nworking with differences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AT SEA I GAVE PRIME IMPORTANCE TO TEAMWORK.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">I WOULD DISCARD A\nHIGHLY COMPETENT SAILOR &nbsp;IF HE HAD ATTITUDE PROBLEMS AND COULD NOT\nFIT INTO THE TEAM..&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
