style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUST READ THE 2D\nTHINKING OF EDWARD DE BONO ( WIKIPEDIA ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS PLANET IS HAJAAR\nTHRILLED WITH THIS MEDIOCRE METHOD OF THINKING <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lateral_thinking\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lateral_thinking</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS PLANET CANNOT\nUNDERSTAND THE CONCEPT OF ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS BY GOING PAST THE ONION LAYERS\nENTERING THE CORE SITTING THERE AND LOOKING OUTWARDS , --</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">--THE WAY 12 STRAND DNA\nMAHARISHIS WITH&nbsp; KING SIZED PINEAL GLANDS\nDID \u2013ALSO KNOWN AS <b><span style=\"color: red;\">3D VADAKAYIL BINDU THINKING</span></b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BINDU IS THE CORE OF\nSRI YANTRA</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/unB-Paz-5No/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/unB-Paz-5No?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SITTING AT THE CORE OF SRI YANTRA ANCIENT\nSEERS FIGURED OUT THE NUMBER 108</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An intelligent man who\nunderstand the context and scenario needs NO checklist.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Going through a pea\nbrained checklist ( going through the motions ) is the reason why accidents\ntake place. &nbsp;&nbsp;What is needed is training by a competent and\nintelligent man\u2014 and real DUD brains ( mandha buddhis ) &nbsp;kept away from thinking processes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the west pea brained\npeople use pea brained checklists .&nbsp; Such\npeople use checklists and land up wearing their undies outside their pants worn\nbackwards ( like phantom ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA IF I FOUND A PEA\nBRAINED CHECK LIST\u2014 IT THREW IT AWAY . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I MADE\nMY OWN CHECKLIST , EVEN IF MY SHORE BOSSES THREATENED TO SACK ME.&nbsp; MY CREW KNEW THIS.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK\u2014</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">HOW MANY OF YOU WILL\nTAKE YOUR ONLY CHILD TO A BRAIN SURGEON WHO USES A CHECK LIST ?</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF MY READERS HAVE THANKED ME FOR WRITING WHY BALARAMA WAS ALWAYS DEPICTED WITH A HEAVY PLOUGH ON HIS SHOULDERS<br />\n<br />\nWELL IF YOU DO ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS LIKE MODERN WESTERN CUNTS YOU WILL NEVER GET THE ANSWER<br />\n<br />\nTHESE WHITE CUNTS POOH POOHED HINDUS AND SAID SARASWATI RIVER NEVER EXISTED<br />\n<br />\nOUR SCRIPTURES TELL ABOUT BALARAMA WALKING ALONG THE BANKS OF THE DYING SARASWATI RIVER IN 4000 BC<br />\n<br />\nHIS PLOUGH WAS GIVEN TO HIM BY PARASHURAMA<br />\n<br />\nBALARAMA DIVERTED THE BLOCKED SARASWATI RIVER TO GANGA AND JAMUNA USING HIS PLOUGH<br />\n<br />\nRIG VEDA ( 5000 BC ) HAS ONLY SARASWATI RIVER MENTIONED 52 TIMES.. <br />\n<br />\nGANGA RIVER WAS MENTIONED JUST ONCE IN PASSING -- NADISTUTI SUKTA 10.75 RIG VEDA..<br />\n<br />\nIn verse 5, the rishi enumerates ten rivers, beginning with the Ganga and moving westwards:<br />\n<br />\nO Ganga, Yamuna, Sarasvati, Shutudri (Sutlej), Parushni (Iravati, Ravi), follow my praise! O Asikni (Chenab) Marudvridha, Vitasta (Jhelum), with the Arjikiya (Haro) and Sushoma (Sohan), HARK!<br />\n<br />\nGanga<br />\nYamuna<br />\nSarasvati<br />\nSutudri<br />\nParusni<br />\nAsikni<br />\nMarudvrdha<br />\nVitasta<br />\nArjikiya<br />\nSusoma<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEVERY HINDU WANTS TO SEE THE MOUTH OF THE GANGES --IT COMES OUT OF A HOLE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/living-water-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE FINAL FIGHT BETWEEN DURYADHANA AND BHIMA HAPPENED AT THE EDGE OF A STAGNANT SARASWATI RIVER POOL AT KURUKSHETRA. &nbsp;DURYODHANA WAS UNDER WATER , COOLING HIS INTENSE RAGE AND SORROW<br />\n<br />\nBHIMA ACCUSED DURYODHANA OF COWARDICE-- BALARAMA AFTER DIVERTING THE SARASWATI RIVER ARRIVED JUST IN TIME TO HEAR THIS ACCUSATION.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Duryodhana!\"\nexclaimed Yudhishthira, \"after destroying family and tribe, would you\nyourself escape death by concealing yourself in this pond? Where is your pride\nnow? Have you no shame? Come up and fight. A kshatriya by birth, do you shrink\nbattle and death?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stung to the quick by\nthese words, Duryodhana replied with dignity: \"I have not come here,\nDharmaputra, a fugitive for my life. It was not fear that brought me here. I\nstepped into the water to cool the fire that is raging within me. I neither\nfear death nor wish to live, but why should I fight? The earth has now nothing\nleft that I came to fight for! All those who stood by me have been slain. My\ndesire for kingdom is gone. I leave the world to you without a rival. Enjoy it\nin undisputed sovereignty.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Sanjaya, who related\nthe events to the blind old king, here said: \"When your son Duryodhana\nheard these harsh and cruel words spoken by Dharmaputra, he at once rose from\nthe water, mace in hand.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Stepping out of the\npool, the unfortunate Duryodhana said: \"Come, one by one, all of you, for\nI am single. You five will surely not join together and attack me who am alone\nand without armor, weary and wounded all over.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Accordingly, the combat\nbegan between Bhima and Duryodhana. Sparks of fire flew when their maces\nclashed. Duryodhana and Bhima were equal in strength and skill, and the battle\nraged long, and the issue hung doubtful. Those, who stood watching, were\ndebating as to whom would win. Krishna said to Arjuna that Bhima would redeem\nthe oath he swore in the Hall of Assembly and smash Duryodhana's thighs. Bhima\nheard this and, at that moment, the memory of the great outrage came vividly to\nhis mind.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He leaped like a lion\nand came down with his mace on Duryodhana's thighs and broke them and\nDuryodhana fell heavily on the ground, wounded to death.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Bhima jumped on the\nprostrate body of his enemy, stamped on his head with his heavy foot and danced\na terrible dance.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Cease,\nBhima,\" cried Dharmaraja. \"You have paid off the debt. Duryodhana is\na prince and a cousin. It is not right to put your foot on his head.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Said Krishna:\"Soon\nthe wicked man's soul will depart from the body. Sons of Pandu, Duryodhana and\nhis friends have been slain. Why linger here? On to your chariots.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When Krishna said this,\nthe face of the fallen Duryodhana glowed like a blazing fire with anger and\nhatred. Turning his eyes towards Krishna be said:<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"By base tricks\nyou contrived the death of warriors, who fought bravely according to the laws\nof war. You could not have dreamt of victory in a fair fight with Karna or\nBhishma or Drona. Have you not a spark of shame left?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Even dying, Duryodhana\nfelt no regret for all that he had done.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Duryodhana,\"\nsaid Krishna, \"vainly do you accuse others. Greed and pride of power led\nyou to unnumbered wicked deeds and you are reaping as you sowed.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Wretch!\"\nreplied Duryodhana. \"Living, I was a great prince, generous friend, and a\nterrible foe. All human joys, such joys as kings wish for in vain, and even\nGods do not despise, have been mine, in their fullness. A warrior's death is the\nfitting crown of such a life. Dying, I go triumphantly to swarga to join my\nfriends and my brothers who have gone there already and are waiting to welcome\nme. You remain here below, your objects defeated and yourselves the object of\ncontempt of all kshatriyas. I do not mind Bhima putting his foot on my head as\nI lie helpless on the ground with legs broken. What care I? In a few minutes\nmore will not the feet of crows and vultures settle on my head?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When Duryodhana said\nthis, flowers were showered down from the heavens by the gods. Inordinate\ndesire took Duryodhana into the wrong path, whence ensued anger and numerous\nbreaches of dharma. But no one could question the unconquerable spirit of\nDhritarashtra's son.</i></span><i style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When the war was\nnearing its end, Balarama arrived at Kurukshetra after completing his tour of\nholy places. He came just when Bhima and Duryodhana were engaged in their last\nmortal combat. He saw Bhima aiming the deadly blow which broke Duryodhana's\nthighs, and his anger flamed up at this great breach of the rules of single\ncombat.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Fie upon you all!\nWould any kshatriya hit below the navel? This Bhima has offended the law most\ndisgracefully,\" he exclaimed and impatiently going up to his brother\nKrishna, shouted:<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"You can look on\nand tolerate all this. But I cannot bear to see such unclean fighting!\"\nSaying this he advanced towards the offending Bhima with upraised plough. The\nplough was Balarama's weapon on supreme occasions, as the discus was Krishna's.\nKrishna was alarmed when he saw his elder brother advancing in a passion\ntowards Bhima. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He rushed forward and,\nintercepting him, said: \"The Pandavas are our friends and closest\nrelations. They have been the victims of insufferable wrongs at the hands of\nDuryodhana. When Draupadi was insulted in the Assembly Hall, Bhima vowed: 'I\nwill one day in battle break the two thighs of Duryodhana with this mace and\nkill him.' He proclaimed this solemn oath at that time and everyone has known\nit. It is the duty of a kshatriya to fulfil the vow he has solemnly taken. Do\nnot let your anger mislead you and do not be unjust to the innocent Pandavas.\nYou should, before condemning Bhima, take into account all the wrongs that the\nKauravas have done to the Pandavas. Nothing but error can result if one\nproceeds to judge conduct without taking into account the chain of events\nleading up to it. You cannot snatch a particular act out of its context and\nproceed to give judgment on it alone without gross injustice. The era of Kali\nhas arrived, when the laws of a previous age cannot apply. It was not wrong for\nBhima to strike below the navel an enemy who had wickedly contrived against his\nlife on many occasions. It was because of Duryodhana's foul instigation that\nKarna sent a shaft from behind and broke Abhimanyu's bowstring when he was\ndefending himself against heavy odds. Arjuna's young son was attacked by\nnumerous warriors who surrounded him, when he stood all by himself in the\nfield, deprived of bow and chariot, and in a most cowardly manner, killed him.\nDuryodhana thought evil and practised deception from the time of his birth and\nhas brought about the destruction of his people. There is no sin in Bhima\nkilling this man. Bhima bore the wrongs done and kept his wrath within himself for\nthirteen long years. Duryodhana knew well that Bhima had sworn to break his\nthighs and kill him. When he challenged the aggrieved Pandavas to battle, he\nknew very well that he invited Bhima to make good his oath. How can you think\nthat it was wrong for Bhima to do this?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Krishna's words did not\nchange Balarama's opinion, but his anger subsided. \"Duryodhana will attain\nthe happy regions reserved for the brave. Bhima's fame has been tarnished for\nall time. It will be said among men that the son of Pandu broke the laws of war\nin attacking Duryodhana. It will remain forever a great blot on his good name.\nI hate to stay here any longer.\" So saying the indignant Balarama\nimmediately left for Dwaraka.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Krishna turned towards\nthem and said:<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Warriors, it is\nnot proper that we go on speaking against an enemy who has been defeated and is\nlying mortally wounded. We should not speak ill of a dying man. He was stupid\nand brought about his own end. He fell into the company of bad men and was\nruined. Let us go.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Duryodhana, who was\nstretched on the ground in intense, agony, when he heard Krishna say this, went\ninto a paroxysm of rage. He half raised himself on his arms in spite of the\nexcruciating pain, and exclaimed:<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Wretch! Son of a\nslave! Was not your father Vasudeva Kamsa's slave? You have no business to sit\nor move with princes. You speak like a shameless wretch. I saw you instigate\nBhima to aim his blow at my thigh! Do you think I did not see you, making as\nthough casually talking to Arjuna, pointing to your thigh, but really\nindicating to Bhima that he should strike me on the thighs, disregarding the\nlaws of single combat? Till then it had been equal battle. You have neither\npity nor shame. Did you not contrive the death of the grandsire Bhishma through\nstratagem? You advised Sikhandin to be placed in front when attacking Bhishma,\nknowing that the grandsire would scorn to fight a woman, and would let himself\nbe mortally wounded without resistance. You brought about the end of\nDronacharya through making Dharmaputra utter a falsehood. You were the father\nof that deadly lie that issued from Yudhishthira's mouth, and made Dronacharya\nthrow his bow away. Did you not look on without protest, and rejoice, when\nthat, wretch Dhrishtadyumna attacked and killed the acharya who had stopped\nfighting, throwing away his weapons, and settled down in yoga posture for\nmeditation on the Supreme? Was it not you who wickedly contrived to make Karna\nhurl the fatal spear at Ghatotkacha instead of reserving it for Arjuna as he\nhad all along resolved to do? O great sinner, surely it was you who instigated\nSatyaki to butcher Bhurisravas when his right arm had been foully cut off and\nhe stopped fighting and spread his arrows for a seat for holy meditation. It\nwas you who brought about the death of Karna by inducing Arjuna to attack him\nin a cowardly manner when he was engaged in lifting his chariot wheel which had\nsunk and stuck in the mud in the field of battle. Oh worthless man, sole cause\nof our destruction, the whole world has condemned your act when by sorcery you\nmade it appear as if the sun had set. You made Jayadratha, the Sindhu king,\nbelieve that the day was over and he was past danger, and thus he was slain\nwhen he was off his guard.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Thus did Duryodhana\npour his denunciation against Krishna and then, exhausted by the pain of his\nwounds and the violence of his rage, he fell prostrate again.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">KRISHNAs UNSPOKEN MISSION WAS TO KILL ALL 100 KAURAVA TEST TUBE BABIES&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1497075125391#c4250081390390365127\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 10, 2017 at 11:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_49MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTODAY MORNING REPUBLIC TV WAS GIVING FAALTHU PROPAGANDA FOR SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR<br />\n<br />\nTHIS ROGUE GURUS DYES HIS BEARD AND IS ALL THE TIME TRYING TO HIDE HIS GANGANTUAN PAUNCH WITH HIS SHAWL<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SOME CHILDREN GAVE HIM CURRENCY NOTES WITH A REQUEST--YOU SHOULD SEE HOW FAST HE POUNCES ON THE MONEY AND PASSES IT ON TO SOME SIDEKICK BEHIND<br />\n<br />\nTHIS ROGUE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR SAID THAT VISHNU AND SHIVA HAS HOMOSEXUAL SEX AND PRODUCED AYYAPPA --IN THE SAMUDRA MANTHAN ERA<br />\n<br />\nSAMUDRA MANTHAN ERA IS THOUSANDS OF YEARS OLDER THAN PARASHURAMA AVATAR ERA .<br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE ASKED ME --WHO IS THIS ARTHUNGAL VELUTHCHAN WHO HAD HAJAAAR FRUITFUL SECULAR CONVERSATIONS WITH AYYAPPA<br />\n<br />\nWHEN VELUTHACHAN MEANS --WHITE SKINNED PADRE IN MALAYALAM<br />\n<br />\nARTHUNGAL --MEANS SIR ARTHUR<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthunkal</span><br />\n<br />\nHERE IS THE BULLSHIT BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE :On January 18, as the gates of the church are opened at early hours of dawn, thousands of devotees, including Hindu pilgrims returning from the Sabarimala temple, throng to pay their homage to the saint. The Hindu pilgrims also take bath at a facility attached to the church or at the sea. This custom traces its roots to a mythical story that links the Arthunkal Veluthachan with the Sabarimala Ayyappan. Sabarimala is the second largest pilgrimage site in the world, with 50 million devotees visiting every year.<br />\n<br />\nThe church, officially 'Arthunkal St. Andrew's Forane Church', was originally built by the Portuguese missionaries in the 16th century. It has a fascinating history.[3] The church was rebuilt in 1584, under the then vicar Fr. Jacoma Fenicio, whom the devotees claim, possessed magical powers to heal the body and mind. Devotees fondly referred to him as Arthunkal Veluthachan, which in English translates to fair skinned father. Fr. Fenicio died in 1632. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SO ON ONE HAND 5900 YEARS AGO PARASHURAMA CONSECRATED AYYAPPA PILGRIMAGE</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">ON THE OTHER HAND ARTHUNGAL VELUTHACHAN HAD HAJAAAAR SECULAR CONVERSATIONS WITH AYYAPPA 4 CENTURIES AGO</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAND RAHUR EASHWARS TELUGU FOREFATHERS CROSSED A FLOODED KRISHNA RIVER IN SPATE ( ON WAY FROM TELUGULAND TO SABARIMALA HILL ) --<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AND ONE TELUGU KANDARARU FELLOW WALKED OVER WATER, AND THE OTHER TELUGU KANDARARU FELLOW DRAINED THE RIVER AND WALKED ON THE RIVER BED<br /><br />BOTH IMPRESSED THE SHIT OUT OF PARASHURAMA 5900 YEARS AGO --&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://sabarimala.tdb.org.in/node/129</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS THE BULLSHIT STORY CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO PLANT A TELUGU TANTRI AT SABARIMALA<br />\n<br />\nAND HULLO--<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">AYYAPPA ALSO HAD HAJAAAR FRUITFUL SECULAR CONVERSATIONS WITH MUSLIM VAVAR</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vavar</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />ROTHSCHILD COLLECTED TONNES OF PEPPER FROM THIS FAKE VAVAR DARGAH AND MADE MOOLAH<br /><br />ISLAM IS JUST 1300 YEARS OLD-- CHRISTIANITY IS JUST 1690 YEARS OLD</span></b><br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">TO PREVENT ACCIDENTS AND BEING FORCED BY CUNT\nBOSSES ASHORE TO DO MINDLESS ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS WHICH LANDED ON THE NECKS OF SHIPSTAFF, &nbsp;I INTRODUCED \u201c<span style=\"color: red;\">PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE</span>\u201d AT SEA.&nbsp;\n</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I DECLARED SAILORS ( UNDERMANNED SHIPS &nbsp;FOR OWNERS PROFITS ) &nbsp;HAVE ONLY 24 HOURS A DAY OUT OF WHICH TIME OUT\nFOR SLEEP , MEALS AND BATH IS A MUST .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">I REFUSED TO DO \u201cPLANNED MAINTENANCE\u201d TO THE UTTER HORROR OF MY BOSSES ASHORE. </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ONLY CUNTS DO PLANNED MAINTENANCE</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/predictive-maintenance-on-chemical.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/predictive-maintenance-on-chemical.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>I MADE MY OWN \u201cPREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE \u201c &nbsp;SOFTWARE AND SPREAD SHEETS -- &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I TREATED MY SHIP LIKE A HUMAN BODY . &nbsp;</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">NO MORE WASHING ASSHOLE FOR NO FUCKIN' REASON --JUST BECAUSE SOME CUNT PLANNED IT</b></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Will you allow your own\nbody to be maintained by some CUNT doctor using his PLANNED schedule?&nbsp; Will you allow him to surgically lift your\nknee cap bone so that the condition underneath can be assessed at regular\nintervals ?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Predictive maintenance\non ships helps determine the condition of in-service equipment in order to\npredict when maintenance should be performed.&nbsp;\nTasks are performed only when warranted\u2014not according to the CHOOTIYA\nplan based on Mungerilal\u2019s sapne &nbsp;.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People often wondered\nwhy ships I commanded had very little breakdowns. I predicted when breakdowns\nwood happen --as my maintenance was 100% predictive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potential advantages pf\nPredictive include increased equipment lifetime, increased plant safety, fewer\naccidents with negative impact on environment, and optimized spare parts (\nexpensive ) &nbsp;handling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Predictive maintenance\ndiffers from its cousin preventive/ planned maintenance because it relies on\nthe actual condition of equipment, rather than average or expected life\nstatistics which loses context.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>HOW MANY F YOU WANT AN ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS TO BE DONE ON YOUR OWN DEAD BODY &nbsp;--- WHERE YOUR ASSHOLE IS PULVERIZED&nbsp;INTO A 100 PIECES ?</b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-lub-oil-analysis-babitt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-lub-oil-analysis-babitt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">3G/ ZEST FOR HARDWORK AND MEETING DEADLINES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I can\nput NGT and their technical think tank through an elementary &nbsp;exam on environmental protection &nbsp;\u2013and all will score ZERO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;
