font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">As a\nresult of which , shore powers put a lot of importance to near misses, so that\nthe jokers can write nice circulars and shine. This as as stupid as writing\nvolumes about fishing boats in the ship's wake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">At sea\non the bridge we care only about fishing boats ahead of ship. We like to be\nPRO-ACTIVE and deal with hazards which have NOT yet happened. We like to talk\nabout coming shadows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">But\nthe jokers ashore don't want this on SMS reporting records, for if the shadow\nindeed does its evil deed, they stand to lose their honourable chairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\nwill even give you fancy ROOT CAUSE analysis tools, where as soon as the blame\ncomes on the sailor's incompetence or negligence , it stops . And then the poor\nsailor is victimised.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He stopped the captain by coming in between . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He cried --\u201c Sir Biswas is saying </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WORRYING</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"> \u2013 not\n</span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WHORING</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2785277424882752143\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">&nbsp;I had\ndeclared that the &nbsp;ten Vishnu Avatars\nare:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; Matsya (the fish) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">2. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\">Balarama took the side of Duryodhana and was\nvery angry with his younger brother Krishna when Duryodhana was felled unfairly- by hitting below the belt.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tI--RxOQk6M/WTi_zP_3GjI/AAAAAAABUNI/0kXp5c5ldS4iCijBZFZFEa2ZsPJlkuadwCLcB/s1600/bhima-duryo4dhana.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp; Ayyappa was found by a king in Kerala in the forest while hunting. &nbsp;The handsome baby boy had a large brilliant diamond ( mani ) on his neck. &nbsp; The childless queen loved the baby boy and brought him up. &nbsp; &nbsp;One fine day the queen became pregnant and she got a baby boy. &nbsp; The queen now felt that Ayyappa would be the next king and not her own son. &nbsp; She pretended to be sick and told Ayyappa ( now a young boy ) that only the fresh milk of a tiger can cure her. &nbsp; Ayyappa became sad--he knew that his foster mother , the queen wanted him to die. &nbsp; &nbsp;He came back to the palace riding a tiger with tiger cubs running after them . &nbsp;He swore to his sad father ( the king ) that he will never marry . &nbsp; After that he just disappeared . &nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; <i>Vavar was a Muslim saint who migrated from\nArabia to India with the intention of spreading Islam. Others suggest that he\nwas a warrior who reached the shore of Kerala as a pirate in a ship to loot and\nplunder. During his encounter with Lord Ayyappa, he was defeated. Impressed by\nthe youth's valour, Vavar became close associate of Lord Ayyappa and helped him\nin the wars in the mountainous region. As time passed, Vavar too became an\nardent devotee of Ayyappa just like Kaduthaswami and came to be known as Vavar\nswami. The old sword on the wall of the Vavar shrine symbolises the eminence of\nVavar as a great warrior. It is believed that the Lord Ayyappa himself\ninstructed the King of Pandala Desam to build a mosque for Vavar at Erumely in\nKottayam District.:.&nbsp; There is a shrine\ndedicated to Vavar in Sabarimala next to the main temple. As per Islamic\nteachings there is no idol, but just a carved stone slab symbolises the deity\nof Vavar. A green coloured silk cloth is hung across one of the three walls.\nThe fourth side is open. An old sword is also kept near the wall. The Hindu pilgrims also take\nbath at a facility attached to the church or at the sea. This custom traces its\nroots to a mythical story that links the Arthunkal Veluthachan with the\nSabarimala Ayyappan. The church, officially 'Arthunkal St. Andrew's Forane\nChurch', was originally built by the Portuguese missionaries in the 16th\ncentury. It has a fascinating history.[3] The church was rebuilt in 1584, under\nthe then vicar Fr. Jacoma Fenicio, whom the devotees claim, possessed magical\npowers to heal the body and mind. Devotees fondly referred to him as Arthunkal\nVeluthachan, which in English translates to fair skinned father. Fr. Kantararu\nMohanaru, in which he was entangled in a scandal involving politics, sex, and\nconspiracy. The crux of the incident is that he was caught/photographed in a\ncompromising position with a woman, who was previously booked for immoral\ntraffic. The incident occurred in a flat owned by Ms. Sobha John in Kochi, in\nthe state of Kerala on 23 July 2006. &nbsp;By\nthat time Kantararu Maheshwararu the Supreme Priest of Sabarimala came out in\nopen in support of his son Kantararu Mohanaru and also made his grandson Rahul\nEaswar, the spokesperson of the Tazhamon family.</i>&nbsp; UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Here is the bullshit going on about Rahul\nEashwar\u2019s Telugu family branch\u2014self propagation..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SEE PARASHURAMA PERONALLY SELECTED RAHUL\nEASHWARs TELUGU FAMILY 5900 YEARS AGO \u2014TEE HEEEEEE ! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">LISTEN I KNOW THE ORIGINS OF THIS TELUGU\nFAMILY FROM ONE OF HIS TELUGU RELATIVES .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://sabarimalaayyappa.org/php/thazhamon_family.php\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://sabarimalaayyappa.org/php/thazhamon_family.php</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE: <i>&nbsp;The sage (&nbsp;\nPARASHURAMA OK\u2014 NOT ROTHSCHILD ) brought two able Brahmins from Andhra to\nKerala for looking after poojas at the 108 Sastha temples and 108 Durga temples\nhe had built in the State after creating it from the ocean. &nbsp;Enroute to kerala they came on the banks of\nswirling River Krishna. For testing the powers of the Brahmins, the sage asked\nthem to cross the river. The first priest walked over the current to the other\nbank. &nbsp;But the second priest stopped the flow of the river and walked through\nthe river bed. Parasurama was pleased with them and granted them titles.&nbsp; While the Brahmin who walked over the water\nwas called Tharananelloor ( Tharanam means to cross), the other priest was\ncalled Thazhamon ( the one who walked on the sand below the river). The sage\nalso bestowed the tittle Kandararu to the Thazhamon family. The present idol at\nthe Sabarimala was installed by late Kandararu Sankararu</i> UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2017 at 5:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi p,<br />\n<br />\nTHE SUN NEVER RISES EXACTLY IN THE EAST 090 DEGREES ALL THE TIME<br />\n<br />\nVARAHA AVATAR OF VISHNU TILTED THE EARTHS AXIS TO 23.4 DEGREES<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MEANS THE SUN WILL TRAVEL ENDLESSLY TO AND FRO THE TROPIC OF CANCER TO TROPIC OF CAPRICON OF LAITUTUDE 23.4 DEG<br />\n<br />\nIT WILL RISE EXACTLY EAST ONLY IF THE LATITUDE OF THE PLACE YOUR HOME IS SAME AS THE DECLINATION OF THE SUN.<br />\n<br />\nFOR MY HOME IN CALICUT AT LATITUDE AT 11.25 NORTH -- THE SUN WILL BE EXACTLY OVERHEAD AT NOON ( A STICK ON THE GROUND WILL NOT HAVE A SHADOW ) AND SUN WILL RISE IN THE EAST ( 090 DEG ) WHEN THE SUNS DECLINATION IS 11.25 DEG NORTH--<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL HAPPEN ONLY TWICE IN A YEAR --ONCE WHEN THE SUN IS ON THE PASSAGE NORTHWARD TO THE TROPIC OF CANCER AND ONCE WHEN THE SUN IS ON THE PASSAGE SOUTHWARDS TO THE TROPIC OF CAPRICON<br />\n<br />\nTHEORETICALLY THIS WILL BE THE HOTTEST TWO DAYS IN CALICUT IN YEAR 2017 ( APRIL 19TH AND AUGUST 23RD )<br />\n<br />\nThe site for Giza pyramids and Sphinx was chosen in the year 10600 BC<br />\n<br />\nLatitude of Sphinx is 30 deg and latitude of Mount Kailash is 31 deg<br />\n<br />\nHeight of Mount Kailash ( the pineal gland of the planet ) is 6666 metres and its distance from the North pole is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\ndistance from Giza to North pole is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\nI say the British pyramids were made by Hindu sages because the distance of Mount Kailash to stonehenge is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\nI CANT PUT DIAGRAMS --SO IT WILL PUT IT IN THE BOTTOM OF THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<br />\n<br />\nDue to precession the belt of Orion 'slides' up and down the meridian in the course of 25,765 years or one precessional cycle. It takes 12,883 years for Orion to descend from top to bottom and another 12,883 years to ascend from bottom to top again..<br />\n<br />\nBy generating a simulation of the night sky at 10,600 BC, we can see that the Orion crosses the meridian at an altitude of only 9 degrees 20' above the horizon. This is the lowest altitude it will reach in its precessional cycle.<br />\nThus, by mimicking the layout of the belt stars in the sky in 10,60 BC, the pyramids not only signifies a specific epoch but also marks the beginning of a precessional half-cycle<br />\n<br />\nSPHINX SHOWS LEO ( LION ) CONSTELLATION OF 10600 BC.. The deglaciation ultimately caused a 300-foot rise in the sea level.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_158MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_158B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_159B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1491028585062963036\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_159M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1496923291948#c1491028585062963036\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2017 at 5:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_159MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nUSING ROUNDED OFF FULL NUMBERS --each sign of the zodiac is composed of 30 degrees, each astrological age might be thought to last about 72 (years) \u00d7 30 (degrees) = about 2160 years. This means the Sun crosses the equator at the vernal equinox moving backwards against the fixed stars from one year to the next at the rate of one degree in seventy-two years, one constellation (on average) in about 2160 years, and the whole twelve signs in about 25,920 years, sometimes called a Platonic Year.<br />\n<br />\nINDIANS WERE THE FIRST TO WRITE DOWN ALL THIS. KERALA SAGES WROTE THE BIBLE COSMOLOGY FOR THE ROMAN EMPEROR --ONLY WE KNEW ASTROLOGY THOSE DAYS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn the pre-dawn on the vernal equinox in 10600BC with the sun some 12 degrees below the horizon, the Great Sphinx would have gazed directly at his own celestial counterpart, the constellation of Leo- which experienced what astronomers known its 'helical rising' at this moment<br />\n<br />\nThe sphinx site was chosen 30 degrees north of the Equator so that as the Earth turns it comes as close as 6.5 degrees to the ecliptic-- a shocking statement which is pointing directly to the obliquity of the Earth's polar axis .<br />\n<br />\n30 minus 6.5 is 23.5 deg --tilt of the earth's axis<br />\n<br />\n2 x 23.5\u00ba = 47\u00ba is shocking as 47\u00ba is the radius of the precessional circle traced in the sky over 25,765 years by the Earth's tilted axis.<br />\n<br />\nThe sloping side of the great pyramid is 51.8 deg --the Sri Yantra angle are 51.84 deg<br />\n<br />\nThe great pyramid of Cheops Egypt has a base angle 51 deg 49 minutes like the 10000 year old Sri Yantra large pyramid, showing exactly the same relationship between pi and phi .<br />\n<br />\nThe ratio of the hypotenuse to half the base is phi, the Golden Ratio-- or 'divine proportion', given by (1 + square-root 5)/2 (its value to five decimal places is 1.61803). It is a sure indication that the Pharaoh's architects were NOT from Egypt.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_160B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4622951671659748132\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_160M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. INDIAN NAVY WHO CAME VIA THE BACKDOOR<br />\n<br />\nMY CHIEF ENGINEER WAS COMPETENT AND EXPERIENCED<br />\n<br />\nONE DAY WHEN I WENT INTO THE ENGINE CONTROL ROOM , I SAW THIS PERSONAL LOG BOOK<br Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1496985692707#c1947864936142400876\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 9, 2017 at 10:51 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_202MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nYES -THIS JOKE ABOUT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL BEING KALKI 9.5 AVATAR AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nI WAS MORE THAN THAT--CALL IT<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> 9.6</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI REFUSED TO USE TIME TESTED IMO / ISM APROVED ISO CHECKLISTS .<br />\n<br />\nI MADE MY OWN CHECKLISTS DESPITE COMPANIES WARNING ME OF DISCIPLINARY ACTION<br />\n<br />\nIF SHIP STAFF DOES NOT USED ISO/ SMS APPROVED CHECKLISTS THEY WILL FAIL THEIR ISM AUDITS<br />\n<br />\nIF DID NOT CARE -- FOR ME SAILORS LIES WERE MORE IMPORTANT<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU WE ARE TALKING ABOUT DANGEROUS TANKERS--WHICH CAN EXPLODE AND CAUSE LOSS OF LIFE<br />\n<br />\nANY INTELLIGENT MAN WILL KNOW WHAT I AM TALKING ABOUT IF THEY CHECK OUT MY OWN FORMS ON \"HOT WORK PERMIT \" AND \"ENCLOSED SPACED ENTRY\".<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/hot-work-permit-on-chemical-tankers.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/enclosed-spaced-entry-checklist-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMOST ACCIDENTS AT SEA HAPPENED DUE TO USE OF USELESS IMO APPROVED SAFETY CHECKLISTS<br />\n<br />\nThe International Maritime Organization (IMO) is a specialised agency of the United Nations responsible for regulating shipping.<br />\n<br />\nThe IMO was established in Geneva in 1948 and came into force ten years later, meeting for the first time in 1959. Headquartered in London, United Kingdom, the IMO has 172 Member States and three Associate Members.<br />\n<br />\nI CALLED IMO THINK TANKS--MONKEYS<br />\n<br />\nSAILORS ABANDONING SINKING SHIPS LOST THEIR LIVES BECAUSE OF IMO MONKEYS.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE REASON I DID NOT ALLOW MY ELDER SON TO BE A CAPTAIN AT SEA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/enclosed-lifeboat-accidents-and-imo.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/single-hook-for-enclosed-lifeboats-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-sinking-ships-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHENEVER A PORT STATE CONTROL OR USCG INSPECTION HAPPENED ON MY SHIP ( IN EUROPE/ USA / SCANDINAVIA ) -- I EXPLAINED ALL THIS TO THEM HOPING THEY WOULD IMPROVE THIS SHIT SCENE AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nWHEN IT FAILED I WROTE TO USCG AND IMO AND PSC OF FIRST WORLD NATIONS<br />\n<br />\nNOTHING HAPPENED<br />\n<br />\nTHEY DID NOT HAVE THE BRAINS TO UNDERSTAND THIS<br />\n<br />\nBUT I TELL YOU THIS<br />\n<br />\nEVEN MY HOUSEWIFE FEMALE READERS ( LITERATE ONES ) AND SCHOOL STUDENTS CAN UNDERSTAND ALL THIS IF THEY READ MY POSTS<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE FOUGHT THOUSANDS OF BATTLES AT SEA--WON ALL OF THEM. I NEVER CARED FOR APPROVAL FROM SHORE KINGMAKERS.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS KING ON MY SHIP-- AND I RAN SAFE SHIPS .<br />\n<br />\nSAILORS WHO WERE UNDER MY COMMAND SPREAD THIS KNOWLEDGE TO OTHER SHIPS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-locking-ig-tank-entry.html</span><br />\n<br />\nREAD BELOW POST-- I HAVE DONE MORE FOR GLOBAL WARMING PREVENTION THAN ANY HUMAN ON EARTH.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-magnetised-pv-valves-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_92b+seedVxHD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_92b+seedVxHD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_106M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996869030#c3498136755581129753\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_73MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2014IMPORTANT\u2026\u2026\u2026.</b></span><br />I AM PENNING THIS MOST CRITICAL POST FOR THE BLIND MEN OF HINDOOSTAN WHO ARE FIGHTING OVER THE QUINTESSENTIAL ELEPHANT..<br /><br />WE HAVE BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES, THE IGNORANT ISI, THE FOOLISH THINK TANKS , THE PEABRAINED BENAMI MEDIA ETC , ARGUING ABOUT WHY TAJ MAHAL IS DIRTY FROM OUTSIDE AND INSIDE..<br /><br />ONLY ONE MAN ON THIS PLANET CAN GIVE YOU THIS ANSWER--HIS NAME IS CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( IF I AM BOASTING, SO BE IT !) -- HENCE LISTEN UP..<br /><br />Pure white marble used in building Taj Mahal is the result of metamorphism of a very pure (silicate-poor) limestone or dolomite protolith\u2026<br /><br />Most of the exterior marble slabs you see on Taj Mahal is ripped off from inside rooms of an older palace which stood there several centuries before JEW Shah Jahan and his JEWESS wife Mumtaj Mahal existed ..<br /><br />This is an areas where ancient Nuclear explosions took place --and hence carbon dating will show later dates... This science is so sure that if you do carbon dating in a place where a fresh nuclear explosion took place like Bikini Atoll in Pacific--the carbon dating will show several centuries into the FUTURE ( instead of past )..<br /><br />THERE WAS A CONSPIRACY TO SHUT DOWN MATHURAL OIL REFINERY-- BY DESH DROHIS IN THE PAYROLL OF THE WHITE MAN -- STATING THAT THE REFINERYs CHIMNEY EMISSIONS MAKE THE TAJ MAHAL DIRTY..<br /><br />OIL PUMPED INTO THE VADINAR ( GUJARAT ) DEEP SEA SBM TERMINAL FROM HUGE TANKERS GO ALL THE WAY TO MATHURA REFINERY BY PIPELINE WITH BOOSTER PUMPS ENROUTE.. THE SHIP WHICH I SERVED AS SECOND MATE WAS THE FIRST TO PUMP 280,000 TONNED OF RASTANURA CRUDE OIL INTO VADINAR..<br /><br />THE DISTANCE FROM MATHURA OIL REFINERY TO TAJ MAHAL ( TO THE SOUTH EAST ) IS JUST 48 KM.. THIS PIPELINE FROM VADINAR DEEP SEA TERMINAL TO MATHURA REFINERY IS ABOUT 1800 KM LONG.. A MASSIVE INVESTMENT FOR THE PROSPERITY OF BHARATATA ..<br /><br />AT THAT TIME I WAS A YOUNG OFFICER ( 1977 ) AND I SAID BULLSHIT -- WHEN I HEARD THE TOP IOC OFFICIALS TALKING ABOUT SHUTTING DOWN MATHURA REFINERY TO SAVE TAJ MAHAL - I CALLED THEM CUNTS !<br /><br />Now --<br /><br />I have carried huge 30 to 35 ton marble blocks from Sicily Italy ( Reggio Calabria ) to Kuwait , for making statues for the Kuwait Emir's palace. These marble blocks were unpolished and you would think it was a huge block of white chalk or limestone.<br /><br />THIS WAS THE YEAR 1981 , AND I WAS 37 YEARS YOUNGER.. A BACHELOR..<br /><br />WE HAD HEAVY DERRICKS FROM 40 TONNES VALLES TO 125 TONNES JUMBOS ..<br /><br />DIGRESSION : ON THE SAME SHIP I LOADED A NUCLEAR PLANT FOR SADDAM HUSSAIN ( ITALY ) AND LANDED IT DIRECTLY INTO TRUCKS AT AL-KUWAIT PORT\u2026<br /><br />THE SHIP HAD TWEEN DECKS ( UPPER AND LOWER ) INSIDE THE HOLD-- WHICH MEANT DOZENS OF HUGE HYDRAULIC CYLINDERS TO LIFT THE HATCH COVERS AND TWIN DECK COVERS..<br /><br />MY CAPTAIN WAS A MALAYALI IDIOT ( WE CALLED HIM FUCK-KNOWS-STEPHANOS ) WHO CAME UP FROM THE RANKS-- AND SO WHEN IT CAME TO USING BRAINS , I AS A THREE STRIPER CHIEF OFFICER HAD TO USE IT TO SAVE THE VENTURE--EVERY TIME.. MY CREW / COMPANY ( SCI ) LOOKED UP TO ME..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">BELOW-- WHAT I DESCRIBED AT HAMBURG DRY DOCK WAS WHAT EXACTLY HAPPENED TO THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP IN MUMBAI LOCKS WHICH CAPSIZED RECENTLY..&nbsp; &nbsp; READ A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT DATED 6TH DEC 2016..&nbsp; &nbsp; I HAD TO COMMENT BECAUSE OUR INDIAN NAVY IS FULL OF CUNTS SANS HONOUR ..</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />I WANTED THE TOP LAYER OF THE MARBLE BLOCK TO BE COVERED WITH LARGE PLASTIC SHEATH WRAPPING.. THIS COSTED TIME AND MONEY---AND THE SHIPPERS WERE UNWILLING TO DO IT..<br /><br />AS THE CHIEF MATE I SAID I WILL NOT SIGN THE MATES RECEIPTS--THERE WAS A STAND OFF --AND FINALLY I WON..<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">WHAT I SAID WAS --\"ONE DROP OF HYDRAULIC OIL DRIPPING ON MARBLE DURING THE VOYAGE ( SQUIRTING PAST LEAKY SEALS IN HIGH TEMPERATURE / ROUGH SEAS ) WOULD BE SUCKED INTO THE MARBLE SLAB LIKE ABSORBANT BLOTTING PAPER RENDERING IT UNFIT FOR POLISHING..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_73BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_73b+seedBotAD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_71T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_71TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_71TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_71B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7666295950680842272\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1525996919249#c7666295950680842272\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 11, 2018 at 5:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_71MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">THE PASSAGE CHANNEL OF THE OIL INTO THE MARBLE BLOCK INTERIOR CAN NEVER BE POLISHED..AND THIS SPOT WOULD BE YELLOW FOREVER ON WHITE BACK GROUND..</span></div>\n<br />IN THE TAJ MAHAL, THE IDIOTS HAVE USED HEAVY DUTY ACIDIC DETERGENTS TO CLEAN THE MARBLE SLABS --AND THIS CAUSES THE MARBLE TO LOSE ITS ANCIENT POLISH AND BECOME SURFACE ROUGH... WHEN THIS HAPPENS DIRT AND OIL ENTERS THE MICRO PORES ..<br /><br />THIS IS WHY , WHEN I MOVED INTO MY NEW HOME TWO DECADES AGO-- I SAW HUGE WHITE RAJASTANI MARBLE SLABS IN THE KITCHEN -- I GOT THEM RIPPED OFF AND CHANGED TO HIGHLY POLISHED SUPERIOR GRANITE WHOSE UNPOLISHED PORES WERE SMALLER ..<br /><br />ALL CALLED ME CRAZY-- I SAID, I KNOW WHAT I AM DOING...THESE SURFACES WOULD BE CONSTANTLY COVERED BY OIL AND HARSH DETERGENTS..AND WOULD BE A DIRTY YELLOW EYE SORE SOONER THAN LATER ..<br /><br />WISDOM: WHEN YOU USE WHITE MARBLE SLABS--ENSURE THAT THE SURFACE IF HIGHLY POLISHED ..THIS IS EASIER DONE ON HORIZONTAL SURFACE WITHOUT GROOVES--AND ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE TO DO ON CURVED DOMES...<br /><br /><div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">A COARSE UNPOLISHED MARBLE SURFACE HAS PITS WHICH HOLDS FOREIGN MATERIAL..</b></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nI WAS THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE \"PASSIVATION\" ON STAINLESS STEEL CHEMICAL TANKERS USING NITRIC ACID-- TO BUILD UP AN ANGSTROM THIN VENEER OF CHROMIUM OXIDE.. I HAD A RUNNING BATTLE WITH THE WHITE POWERS WHO RULED THE SEAS.. I WON..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/stainless-steel-chemicaltankers.html</span><br /><br />ON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE CARRY TOXINS LIKE MDI ( WHICH KILLED IN BHOPAL ), CARINOGENS LIKE BENZENE, STRONG ACIDS LIKE SULFURIC ACID, STRONG ALKALIES LIKE CAUSTIC POTASH , WHITE WINE, POTABLE RUM, ORANGE JUICE ETC..<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/passivation-on-stainless-steel-chemical.html</span><br /><br />THIS POST ( ON TRUCKS ) IS FOR INDIAS FOOD AND TRANSPORT MINISTERIES.. IT WENT IGNORED.. LUYTENS DESH DROHI BASTARDS WHO ARE BHOOKA FOR A PIECE OF JUDAS SILVER\u2026<br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">THIS BLOGSITE WILL SEND THESE LUTYENS TRAITORS TO JAIL\u2014THEY SHALL WAIT..</span></div>\n<br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/tanker-lorries-carrying-liquids-in-bulk.html</span><br /><br />HEAVY DUTY ACIDIC DETERGENT CLEANERS SPOIL THE SURFACE OF POLISHED MARBLE..<br /><br />THIS IS WHO THEY UNEARTHED THE GOLD AT PADMANABHA SWAMY TEMPLE IN KERALA.. ONE OVER SMART MALAYALI PUJARI USED STRONG AMWAY DETERGENT ON A BLACK GREASY VISHNU IDOL-- AND THE IDOL SUDDENLY STARTED SHINING LIKE GOLD..<br /><br />NOW ABOUT FLYING BROWN ALGAE..WHICH MADE THE BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL MELORDS GO INTO A TIZZY..<br /><br />WHITE TAJ MAHAL DOMES CAN BE DARKENED BY NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM CNG CARS, NANO CARBON EMISSIONS FROM LPG COOKING CYLINDERS, DIESEL EXHAUSTS OF TRUCKS, DUST STORMS EMANATING FROM PAKISTAN SIDE, ACID RAIN WHOSE FOUNTAIN HEAD IS OIL REFINERIES IN THE SAUDI ARABIAN DESERT OR POLLUTION EVEN FURTHER AWAY..<br /><br />CALIFORNIAN WINE IS SHIT - BECAUSE&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POLLUTION FROM CHINA TRAVELS ACROSS THE PACIFIC OCEAN IN 3 DAYS FLAT LIKE A HIGH ALTITUDE BALLOON</span></b>&nbsp;AND RAINS DOWN ON THE WEST COAST OF USA.. INSTEAD OF UNDERSTANDING THIS THE CUNTS IN USA ASKED ASKED SHIPS TO REDUCE SPEED AND USE LIGHT DIESEL OIL INSTEAD OF HEAVY FUEL OIL..<br /><br />I HAVE WRITTEN ABOUT IT 7 YEARS AGO.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/american-pollution-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br /><br />THIS IS WHY I NEVER DRINK FRENCH OR CALIFORNIAN WINE-- I PREFER CHILEAN WINE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/chilean-wine-and-art-of-wine-tasting.html</span><br />REGARDING RED RAIN IN KERALA -- THIS IS FROM OUTER SPACE --IT CONTAINS DNA CAUSING NEW FORMS OF LIFE ON PLANET EARTH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html</span><br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..<br /><br /><span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_71MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_71BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_71B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_72B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4648558241049425915\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "227", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8288091060728318135/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2988896553145087961", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-06-03T18:24:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-06-06T19:08:19+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDk2NzU2Mjk5ODg3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/anger-management-part-2-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2988896553145087961", "title": "ANGER MANAGEMENT , part 2  \u2013 CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 1, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">&nbsp;<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People in depression\nmust help themselves .&nbsp; Don\u2019t stay in\nhiding.&nbsp; Don\u2019t remain silent.&nbsp; Recognize that you may need help. &nbsp;Believe it\u2019s okay to find help.&nbsp; It\u2019s not a sign of weakness.&nbsp; It\u2019s empowering yourself!&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression is kind of like a sponge, where\nnegative thoughts are easily absorbed.&nbsp;\nWhen you soak up all the misguided and self-doubting thoughts and\nenergy, the weight becomes oppressive.&nbsp;\nThe more you absorb, the heavier it becomes.&nbsp; Fortunately, you can wring out that sponge of\nyours!&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OEM_BY9Y9WU/WTK19fiYycI/AAAAAAABUD0/iZwtopHeQwMatk0Mv2zvIf1ycVuB-ku-ACLcB/s1600/s2download.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OEM_BY9Y9WU/WTK19fiYycI/AAAAAAABUD0/iZwtopHeQwMatk0Mv2zvIf1ycVuB-ku-ACLcB/s400/s2download.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just know how to recognize the\nsigns. These feelings aren\u2019t unique to you.&nbsp;\nThis is not some defect that you and you alone have. There are millions\naround the globe just like you. &nbsp;Whatever\nit is, you can overcome it. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SURYANAMASKAR\ncan overcome this .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Sailors often wondered why captain held so many \"hair down\" parties on board ships, where the goin' was tough. &nbsp;Under my command nobody got BURNT OUT. &nbsp; My shore bosses knew that I flouted the alcohol policy--they get feed back. &nbsp;They turned a Nelson's eye .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/burned-out-versus-stressed-out-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/burned-out-versus-stressed-out-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-U5XSsLmcrMQ/WTK1oGagE1I/AAAAAAABUDw/koJ49UKcC3M1qM-XXf6X6fWhzFkxRNwqwCLcB/s1600/work%2Behard%2Bplay%2Bhard%2Bfcol.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"534\" data-original-width=\"991\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-U5XSsLmcrMQ/WTK1oGagE1I/AAAAAAABUDw/koJ49UKcC3M1qM-XXf6X6fWhzFkxRNwqwCLcB/s1600/work%2Behard%2Bplay%2Bhard%2Bfcol.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hVtDkT7Ldic/WTK0ZIDYjrI/AAAAAAABUDo/vw3Jsa_fU283h5ZKT-avI_JN6rROYE4SQCLcB/s1600/drrownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-hVtDkT7Ldic/WTK0ZIDYjrI/AAAAAAABUDo/vw3Jsa_fU283h5ZKT-avI_JN6rROYE4SQCLcB/s400/drrownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my shipboard party all\nare equal.&nbsp; There is nobody more equal\nthan the other. &nbsp;I have NOT yet seen\nanybody taking advantage of this relaxation of discipline.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nis NOT about dancing entirely----&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">we have fun--&nbsp;\nwe talk -- we converse-- we sing-- we crack jokes - we reminisce-- no\none-up-manship -- no putting people in their places --&nbsp; no chattering minds --&nbsp; no self delusions -- no hidden agendas--&nbsp; no over inflated self importance --&nbsp; no distorted interpretations -- no selective\nperceptions --&nbsp; no staring into the rear\nview mirror --&nbsp; no self pity -- no\nresentments--</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">yes-- you may call this Utopia--&nbsp;\nall are in the moment\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">No placing one leg in\nthe past and one in the future , to piss on the present-- This does NOT mean\nnext day my steward will try and be familiar with me-- and pat my back and say\n\" hi buddy!\".&nbsp;&nbsp; Rather he will\nbe grateful, that I have treated him like a brother and friend -- nay-- human\nbeing ,&nbsp; for 4 hours in a month.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">My crew\nknows that captain does NOT like sick poultry -- that he rarely punishes a man\nwho will be the life of a party -- who is a good shipmate -- this encourages\nthem to let their hair down \u2013and <b><span style=\"color: red;\">RELEASE THEIR LOCKED UP STRESSES </span></b>!</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oIXFxOinMAU/WTK3SwHORAI/AAAAAAABUD4/XNCmQzMDwP059f9IGFwcAxM2cTTCPzzVgCLcB/s1600/P90f60405.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"832\" data-original-width=\"1600\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oIXFxOinMAU/WTK3SwHORAI/AAAAAAABUD4/XNCmQzMDwP059f9IGFwcAxM2cTTCPzzVgCLcB/s1600/P90f60405.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression comes in\nmany forms. Sometimes the word is used nonchalantly.&nbsp; You\u2019ll hear people say they\u2019re depressed when\nthey\u2019re having a down day and it\u2019s not all that serious. Consequently, people\nwill generally dismiss depression as not that serious.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then there\u2019s the other side of the spectrum,\nwhich is clinical depression.&nbsp; This is\nthe kind of debilitating, hopeless feeling that could lead to severe health\nproblems and even suicidal tendencies.&nbsp;\nIn either case, depression is very real and has a way of beating us up.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-19VZKm34xiM/WTKzvJz5l3I/AAAAAAABUDg/MxB8MpMz8T4Nxoos5N0hnax95EPCf0n_QCLcB/s1600/do88wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-19VZKm34xiM/WTKzvJz5l3I/AAAAAAABUDg/MxB8MpMz8T4Nxoos5N0hnax95EPCf0n_QCLcB/s400/do88wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are &nbsp;tell-tale signs of depression:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feeling hopeless, like\nnothing you do is good enough<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Losing interest in\nactivities you usually enjoy and also in people, being anti-social<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting irritated\neasily, even over small stuff<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in sleep\n(insomnia or over-sleeping)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Changes in appetite\n(losing appetite or gaining weight, binging)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feeling restless and\nagitated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting fatigued easily<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sudden, unexplained\naches and pains that don\u2019t respond to treatment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feelings of guilt or\nworthlessness.&nbsp; Blaming yourself for past\nfailures<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stewing with\nnegativity.&nbsp; Embracing futility, rather\nthan seeing the brighter side of things</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Thinking about death\nand dying (or possibly suicide)</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NeB4LdDPTzA/WTK0BOyRH3I/AAAAAAABUDk/wcrEfJ3uw-cXkUMaaxYRptoL0SuRA0vzgCLcB/s1600/66bc1d6e458806cd998b198436a77bbb4b.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Following a suicide or\nan attempted suicide, invariably the first questions are \u201cWhy?\u201d and \u201cWhat could\nI have done?\u201d The reasons for suicide are often unclear and the survivors are\nleft to speculate about the cause.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Our brain is\nholographic. While introducing Nikola Tesla to Akasha or longitudinal field ZPF\nwaves , in 1903, the great Indian mystic has told him -\"Every part is a\nwhole and everything springs from the whole\".<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This was 45 years\nbefore a hologram was invented.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Our brain can store\nunlimited data, because our brain is holographic.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Holograms are all about\nchanging the angle at which two lasers strike a piece of photographic film- to\nrecord many different images on same surface.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Any image thus recorded\ncan be retrieved simply by illuminating the film with a laser beam possessing\nthe same angle as the original two beams.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KCLVCsudPV8/WTOHAcgz68I/AAAAAAABUEE/F3bMX3996bEnzZTQK8kW_RThXU0tgEPwgCLcB/s1600/3179sw03454.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Our FREE CHOICE is\nabout finding the right angle to call up the image / memory of what we want or\nsearch.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><b>tight slap across his face</b></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> , to force\nchange this angle--and then he would not want to commit suicide at all.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Well 13 strand DNA Vishnu avatars could produce holograms from their own bodies</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sxhc12znlV8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sxhc12znlV8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhishma laid down his\narms as soon as an exasperated ( with Arjuna ) Krishna showed his vishvaroop\nand stopped KALA CHAKRA ( time ) where arrows froze in mid air.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This chakra is shown by\nthe white invader as an angry Krishna rushing towards Bhishma with a chariot\nwheel to kill him, with Arjuna hanging on to his legs like a limpet and begging\nto stop-- swearing he will kill Bhishma and do his duty \u2013is &nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>FAKE-- POISON INJECTION .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
