, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Arjuna peppered Bhishma\nwith arrows \u2013with tears streaming from his eyes <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>With arrows sticking\nall over his body so thickly that there was not even an inch of intervening\nspace, Bhishma fell headlong to the ground from his chariot.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>As he fell, the gods,\nwho looked on from above, folded their hands in reverent salutation and a\ngentle breeze, laden with fragrance and cool raindrops, swept over the\nbattlefield.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Thus fell the great and\ngood Bhishma, the son of Ganga, who came on earth to hallow it and all it\nbears.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The blameless hero who,\nunasked, made the great renunciation ( of not marrying ) to give joy to his\nfather. &nbsp;The undefeated bowman who had\nhumbled the pride of Rama of the axe&nbsp;\n(Parshuram ) . The selfless worker for righteousness' sake, thus repaid\nhis debt to Duryodhana, and lay wounded to death sanctifying with his\nlife-blood the battlefield. As the grandsire fell, the hearts of the Kauravas\nalso fell along with him.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Bhishma's body did not\ntouch the ground, on account of the arrows sticking out all over his body. His\nbody shone more brightly than ever before, as it lay as on a bed of honor,\nsupported by the shafts that had pierced his flesh.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Both armies ceased\nfighting and all the warriors came running and crowded round the great hero,\nwho lay on his bed of arrows. The kings of the earth stood with bowed heads\nround him, as the gods round Brahma.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"My head hangs\ndown unsupported,\" said the grandsire. The princes who stood near, ran and\nbrought cushions. The old warrior rejected them with a smile and, turning\ntowards Arjuna said: \"Dear son Partha, give me a cushion befitting a\nwarrior.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When Arjuna, whose\narrows were just then burning the grandsire's flesh, heard those words\naddressed to him, he took three arrows from out of his quiver and so placed\nthem that the grandsire's head found support on their points.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Princes,\"\nsaid Bhishma addressing the assembled chiefs, \"Arjuna's arrows were indeed\nwhat my head required to be supported on. This pillow gives me satisfaction.\nNow, I must lie thus until the sun turns north. My soul will not depart till\nthen. ( THIS IS THE ICHAMRIYTHYU DATE OF MAKARAVILAKKU AT SABARIMALA , KERALA )\nWhen I pass away, those of you who may be alive then may come and see me.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Then the grandsire\nturned again to Arjuna and said: \"I am tormented with thirst. Get me some\ndrinking water.\" At once, Arjuna raised his bow, and drawing, it to the\near, shot a shaft down into the earth near the grandsire on his right side.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Upon the opening made\nby the arrow, there gushed a stream of pure sweet water to the very lips of the\ndying man. Ganga came up, says the poet, to quench her dear son's burning\nthirst. Bhishma drank and was happy.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Duryodhana, may\nyou be wise!\" said Bhishma, addressing the Kaurava prince. \"Did you\nsee how Arjuna brought me water to quench my thirst? Who else in this world can\ndo such a deed? Make peace with him without further delay. May the war cease\nwith my exit. Listen to me, son, make peace with the Pandavas.\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n6pgA8xWdYY/WTOjXL_7rTI/AAAAAAABUEo/IzmmzvME5RcG7rBDoc-GSWRlImVgi-MCQCLcB/s1600/Mahabharata-eeBhishma-Pitamah.jpg.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"695\" data-original-width=\"1024\" height=\"434\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n6pgA8xWdYY/WTOjXL_7rTI/AAAAAAABUEo/IzmmzvME5RcG7rBDoc-GSWRlImVgi-MCQCLcB/s640/Mahabharata-eeBhishma-Pitamah.jpg.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a world wide survey\nmen are 3 times more likely to complete a successful suicide than women, while\nwomen have 4 times more attempts than men. &nbsp;&nbsp;The purpose\nof this fake suicide attempts by women appear to be to arm twist chosen people.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The suicidal man is\nfurious and has no outlet for anger\u2014like tears .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In men extreme changes\nin behavior such as withdrawal, sadness or expressionless appearance, or acting\nout behavior (driving recklessly, increased drinking or taking illegal drugs)\nare danger signs. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-W6Zwy1d0XjY/WTQOYFhx_WI/AAAAAAABUFI/tMUJysIFz5MfLVvqVFux35zEkCjVSl6ygCLcB/s1600/down00load.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"266\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-W6Zwy1d0XjY/WTQOYFhx_WI/AAAAAAABUFI/tMUJysIFz5MfLVvqVFux35zEkCjVSl6ygCLcB/s400/down00load.png\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Giving away valued\nbelongings is often a precursor of a suicide attempt. Read this sentence twice</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many times the most\neffective means of reducing suicidal risk is to hospitalize the person\ntemporarily on some pretext.<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of using anger\nin a healthy way depressed people often turn their anger against themselves in\nan abusive way. This abuse takes different forms, such as one form of guilt, as\ndebilitating shame, as retribution or punishment against oneself, as\nself-judgement, and more.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-25rMk7xkIsA/WTQOS5GNmZI/AAAAAAABUFE/6xz64h9NpU0MPDppKPFIWY7s4fx1ntkswCLcB/s1600/downloa7d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"195\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-25rMk7xkIsA/WTQOS5GNmZI/AAAAAAABUFE/6xz64h9NpU0MPDppKPFIWY7s4fx1ntkswCLcB/s400/downloa7d.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because this abuse of anger usually results in an\neven greater difficulty to function well, the individual ends up being even\nharder on him or herself. The resulting depression and/or apathy prevents\npositive change, and their world becomes even darker.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.Self-loathing and\nregret, when you spend a lot of time on events from the past, can stifle\ncreativity, impede happiness and can perpetuate negative feelings about\nyourself and towards others.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3f16vTeATQk/WTQPEXxRCdI/AAAAAAABUFQ/6Ldg7-tTzmI2f3_Q5BonmQqs1jTzqGgDQCLcB/s1600/im99ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3f16vTeATQk/WTQPEXxRCdI/AAAAAAABUFQ/6Ldg7-tTzmI2f3_Q5BonmQqs1jTzqGgDQCLcB/s400/im99ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you are stuck in a\ncycle of self-loathing and regret, small things can bring about an overly\nnegative response. You may become very self-critical as well as being unable to\nforgive yourself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is usually resentment, when old feelings of anger get\nrecycled and the original hurt is re-experienced over and over again. There can\nalso be unprocessed feelings of hurt and sadness.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WHATaT7CU5U/WTQOLg85VhI/AAAAAAABUFA/MoRomHbDtrcqOCTro5mXAGue8sfzhwqBgCLcB/s1600/imjages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WHATaT7CU5U/WTQOLg85VhI/AAAAAAABUFA/MoRomHbDtrcqOCTro5mXAGue8sfzhwqBgCLcB/s400/imjages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Someone suffering from\nself-loathing and regret will usually keep their feelings bottled up. This can\nresult in blasts of anger seemingly without much provocation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain can act like\nan internal bully when relationships get contaminated by anxious ruminations.\nThere can be constant negativity about the possibility of doing something new.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with significant\nregret will invariably overestimate their responsibility for past events as a\nconsequence of their entrenched negative mindset. Depression can perpetuate a\nmindset of self-loathing and constant negative introspection.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p6Gqgmm1GWs/WTQRXxpO_-I/AAAAAAABUFc/B3i4amCpzQgSoXNRB_6f6SyKe8FRuZhSgCLcB/s1600/ijmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"267\" data-original-width=\"189\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p6Gqgmm1GWs/WTQRXxpO_-I/AAAAAAABUFc/B3i4amCpzQgSoXNRB_6f6SyKe8FRuZhSgCLcB/s320/ijmages.jpg\" width=\"226\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger, pain and\ndepression are three negative experiences so closely bound together it can\nsometimes be hard to know where one ends and the other begins. Pain is a\ncomplex phenomenon that has emotional and physical components.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The emotions\nplay a huge role in the experience of pain, and pain is intimately associated\nwith depression. Psychic pain of depression feeds anger. But just as often,\nanger fuels depression.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2XfEE8rR5WI/WTQOtyzNhYI/AAAAAAABUFM/7G3gUl39980NWk-BeXq3yYbXVCjNVjFQwCLcB/s1600/vvimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2XfEE8rR5WI/WTQOtyzNhYI/AAAAAAABUFM/7G3gUl39980NWk-BeXq3yYbXVCjNVjFQwCLcB/s400/vvimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people confuse\nanger and hostility. Anger is a response to a situation that presents some\nthreat. Hostility is a more enduring characteristic, a predisposition, a\npersonality trait reflecting a readiness to express anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is usually\nanything but subtle. It has potent physiological effects. You feel it in your\nchest. You feel it in your head. You feel it coursing through your body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nevertheless, anger can\nbe insidious. Anger confers an immediate sense of purpose; it's a shortcut to\nmotivation. And if there's something depressed people need, it's motivation.\nBut anger creates a cycle of rage and defeatism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZCqNMYStAc/WTQNXY4nJFI/AAAAAAABUE8/fAPjpzy4oTAr9KjEjhxVioR5am8dTiNjwCLcB/s1600/domwnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"235\" data-original-width=\"215\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZCqNMYStAc/WTQNXY4nJFI/AAAAAAABUE8/fAPjpzy4oTAr9KjEjhxVioR5am8dTiNjwCLcB/s400/domwnload.png\" width=\"365\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger, can eventually\nlead you into self-pity, because you can't slough off the self-hurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">View your anger as a\nsignal. It is not something to be escaped. It is not something to be\nsuppressed. It is something to be accepted as a sign that some deeper threat\nhas occurred that needs your attention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Very often anger is the\nresult of beliefs that lead you to place unreasonable demands on circumstances,\nsuch as, that life must be fair. Unfairness exists. The belief that you are\nentitled to fairness results from the mistaken idea that you are special.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-l8fg7Kkp8Ec/WTQQ3sfodvI/AAAAAAABUFY/I_yPODziqHIHgZrJf63xnnQ6WYd3J5tMQCLcB/s1600/ima00ges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-l8fg7Kkp8Ec/WTQQ3sfodvI/AAAAAAABUFY/I_yPODziqHIHgZrJf63xnnQ6WYd3J5tMQCLcB/s320/ima00ges.png\" width=\"212\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\nyou feel that you are special, you will certainly find lots to be angry about,\nbecause the universe which follows laws of karma&nbsp; is indifferent</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insisting that life\nmust be fair is not only irrational, it will cause you to collect injustices\ndone to your noble self. Even if you are experiencing nothing more than your\nfair share of unfairness, such a belief can still fuel rage and lead to\ndepression.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lMr_kliOvho/WTQM9kCF4mI/AAAAAAABUE4/OVZRzj4waS8HSOV8n15hxCaAG6SG0Y0-wCLcB/s1600/nndownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lMr_kliOvho/WTQM9kCF4mI/AAAAAAABUE4/OVZRzj4waS8HSOV8n15hxCaAG6SG0Y0-wCLcB/s400/nndownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can no longer\nsee why you should go on living, your distress will seem unbearable. You may\nhate yourself and elieve that you are useless and unneeded. You may feel rage,\nshame and guilt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repeated painful\nexperiences, particularly losses, can lead you o blame yourself and feel that\nyou haven't lived up to your own standards. Faced with an unbearable situation,\nunsolvable difficulties, overpowering feelings of guilt, failures or conflicts,\nyou may start to think that death is your only option.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who get good REM\nsleep do NOT commit suicide. &nbsp;Suryanamaskar is a tool to get good REM sleep<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cQJWTyac7mA/WTQQnyxROdI/AAAAAAABUFU/zgNPjpleBB46AfFpKt5eVwmCbVKip6TugCLcB/s1600/innmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"225\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cQJWTyac7mA/WTQQnyxROdI/AAAAAAABUFU/zgNPjpleBB46AfFpKt5eVwmCbVKip6TugCLcB/s1600/innmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may feel suicidal\nfor no apparent reason. You may think that you have no reason to want to kill\nyourself. This can trigger feelings of deep guilt and shame and you may find it\ndifficult to tell others what you are going through.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you feel low and\nsuicidal for no apparent reason, this can also make you feel powerless: if you\ncan\u2019t find a cause for your difficult feelings, you may find it hard to believe\nthat there might be a solution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As much as you want to\ndie, you may also want a solution to your difficulties in life and you may want\nothers to understand how you feel and to help. Such mixed feelings and being\nunsure what to do can cause great anxiety. This is why suicidal houghts can be\nfrightening and confusing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--0h6n-wmEWQ/WTQiIzsouSI/AAAAAAABUFk/nFGFsbBFJ0Ago8kjGUPW1oMD_3_J1QVoQCLcB/s1600/AAEAAQAAAAAAAALP888AAAAJGNiNzA2MDJiLWQ1Y2QtNDU0Ny05ZmJiLTljNmIzZTdjYTFmYQ.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--0h6n-wmEWQ/WTQiIzsouSI/AAAAAAABUFk/nFGFsbBFJ0Ago8kjGUPW1oMD_3_J1QVoQCLcB/s640/AAEAAQAAAAAAAALP888AAAAJGNiNzA2MDJiLWQ1Y2QtNDU0Ny05ZmJiLTljNmIzZTdjYTFmYQ.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is also common to\nhave suicidal thoughts if you are experiencing mental health problems \u2013\nespecially if you have a diagnosis of depression, borderline personality\ndisorder or psychotic disorders such as schizophrenia or bipolar disorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have been\ndiagnosed with borderline personality disorder you may find it especially hard\nto cope with a stressful experience like losing a loved one or a job; you may\nfeel out of control, paranoid or unreal, and this can intensify thoughts of\nending it all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intense, inappropriate\nanger is one of the most troubling symptoms of borderline personality disorder\n(BPD). It is so intense that it is often referred to as \u201cborderline rage.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clinically, anger in\nBPD is called \u201cinappropriate,\u201d because the level of anger seems to be more\nintense than is warranted by the situation or event that triggered it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For\nexample, a person with BPD may react to an event that may seem small or\nunimportant to someone else, such as a misunderstanding, with very strong\nfeelings of anger and unhealthy expressions of anger, such as yelling, being\nsarcastic or becoming physically violent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Western children\nhave to cope with dysfunctional parents\u2014especially when the mother is demanding\nand the father is absent physically or emotionally\u2014they learn to suppress their\nown needs and capitulate to the needs of the parents. Essentially, the children\nlearn that hiding their true thoughts and feelings is the surest way to\nsurvive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eventually, the child\nwill carry this emotional hiding right into adulthood, where it will cause\nfrustrating difficulties in interpersonal relationships. Always holding back\nyour true thoughts and feelings, you will feel constantly misunderstood. And\nthen something odd\u2014that is, something unconscious\u2014occurs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bh2YeyFqVkg/WTQifmMmbWI/AAAAAAABUFo/Mew_VNo6yg4d16XDng_qopIXw5NCjeZBgCLcB/s1600/Bt7_32klCAAAyGxF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"457\" data-original-width=\"600\" height=\"486\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Bh2YeyFqVkg/WTQifmMmbWI/AAAAAAABUFo/Mew_VNo6yg4d16XDng_qopIXw5NCjeZBgCLcB/s640/Bt7_32klCAAAyGxF.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blind to your own\npsychological defenses, and unable to see your role in the communication\ndifficulties, you will blame others for everything. \u201cIt\u2019s your fault!\u201d &nbsp;You will\nalways be in conflict with others because, in blaming them, you fail to see\nthat you are unconsciously speaking the angry words\u2014\u201cIt\u2019s your fault!\u201d\u2014that you\nfeared so deeply to say to you own parents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many people with BPD\nreport experiencing traumatic life events, such as abuse or abandonment during\nchildhood. Others may have been exposed to unstable relationships and hostile\nconflicts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Borderline personality\ndisorder (BPD) is a serious mental disorder marked by a pattern of ongoing\ninstability in moods, behavior, self-image, and functioning. These experiences\noften result in impulsive actions and unstable relationships.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person with BPD\nmay experience intense episodes of anger, depression, and anxiety that may last\nfrom only a few hours to days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people with BPD\nalso have high rates of co-occurring mental disorders, such as mood disorders,\nanxiety disorders, and eating disorders, along with substance abuse, self-harm,\nsuicidal thinking and behaviors, and suicide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People with BPD may\nexperience extreme mood swings and can display uncertainty about who they are.\nAs a result, their interests and values can change rapidly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other symptoms include:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frantic efforts to\navoid real or imagined abandonment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pattern of intense\nand unstable relationships with family, friends, and loved ones, often swinging\nfrom extreme closeness and love (idealization) to extreme dislike or anger\n(devaluation)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Distorted and unstable\nself-image or sense of self<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Impulsive and often\ndangerous behaviors, such as spending sprees, unsafe sex, substance abuse,\nreckless driving, and binge eating<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recurring suicidal\nbehaviors or threats or self-harming behavior, such as cutting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intense and highly\nchangeable moods, with each episode lasting from a few hours to a few days<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chronic feelings of\nemptiness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inappropriate, intense\nanger or problems controlling anger<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having stress-related\nparanoid thoughts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having severe\ndissociative symptoms, such as feeling cut off from oneself, observing oneself\nfrom outside the body, or losing touch with reality<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, people\nwith BPD may feel angry and distressed over minor separations\u2014such as\nvacations, business trips, or sudden changes of plans\u2014from people to whom they\nfeel close.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mXSWvCJmqpk/WTQi2mP7PFI/AAAAAAABUFs/MlKOgaMv38sqxA9535-sS6Yb1pIcnvdmACLcB/s1600/imagerrs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"149\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"317\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mXSWvCJmqpk/WTQi2mP7PFI/AAAAAAABUFs/MlKOgaMv38sqxA9535-sS6Yb1pIcnvdmACLcB/s400/imagerrs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to demand\nthings: fairness, appreciation, agreement, willingness to do things their way.\nEveryone wants these things, and we are all hurt and disappointed when we don't\nget them, but angry people demand them, and when their demands aren't met,\ntheir disappointment becomes anger. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Listen carefully to\nwhat the other person is saying and take your time before answering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger can be an\nentrapping experience because in the heat of the moment it can obscure loving\nfeelings causing unloving words or actions to occur. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are anger\nprone often have one or more of the following ways of operating in place.--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--They are highly\njudgmental and need to be right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--They feel strongly\nentitled and expect to get their way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--They take events\npersonally that are not personally meant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--They use fresh\noffenses to revive memories of old grievances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--They attack what\u2019s\nwrong with anger by blaming others when problems arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-goFqMvUPkdQ/WTRRKnKBUwI/AAAAAAABUF8/MBA4QYOVur4wisCnkgWzZ4RK8ed7otPYgCLcB/s1600/imagB223es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"239\" data-original-width=\"210\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-goFqMvUPkdQ/WTRRKnKBUwI/AAAAAAABUF8/MBA4QYOVur4wisCnkgWzZ4RK8ed7otPYgCLcB/s400/imagB223es.jpg\" width=\"351\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is most often a\nmatter of mental choice, not only whether to get angry but in how to express\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is the power\nemotion, often used as an aggressive cover to conceal more sensitive feelings\nthat are more vulnerable and feel more risky to express \u2013 frustration, sadness,\nhurt, failure, humiliation, shame, rejection, distrust, jealousy, inadequacy,\ninsecurity, fear, nasty surprise etc<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Receptive communication\ncan be encouraged, and provoking a defensive response can be avoided.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z9H8DPdoDLU/WTRRYhwK12I/AAAAAAABUGE/0hQEd5wgq9oN4P0-RLV9i8yTmON3pDMTQCLcB/s1600/imag2Ves.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"266\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-z9H8DPdoDLU/WTRRYhwK12I/AAAAAAABUGE/0hQEd5wgq9oN4P0-RLV9i8yTmON3pDMTQCLcB/s400/imag2Ves.jpg\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use humor to help you\nface what's making you angry and, possibly, any unrealistic expectations you\nhave for how things should go. Avoid sarcasm, though \u2014 it can hurt feelings and\nmake things worse.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger helps to relieve\nbuilt-up energy and tension. Excessive anger may be a symptom of more complex\nissues<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When out of control,\nanger can turn destructive. It can significantly impact quality of life -\naffecting your relationships, your career and overall well-being.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aggression is an\ninstinctive way to express anger - relating back to the \u2018fight or flight\u2019\nreaction, which allows us to protect ourselves when in danger. But this isn\u2019t\nalways suitable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When expressing anger assertively, in a\nnon-aggressive but constructive way, you can assert your needs without hurting\nthe people around you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger results in\nexternalizing behaviors such as verbal arguments and tantrums and/or\ninternalizing behaviors such as sulking or increased symptoms of depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jst39L-NBrc/WTRRQsuH27I/AAAAAAABUGA/ddA5iEFV0UoaDTbbqM-_IdMGTTxCyXfQQCLcB/s1600/imag5MRRRes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jst39L-NBrc/WTRRQsuH27I/AAAAAAABUGA/ddA5iEFV0UoaDTbbqM-_IdMGTTxCyXfQQCLcB/s400/imag5MRRRes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing wrong\nwith feeling angry. It\u2019s normal, natural and sometimes necessary. Anger is an\nadaptive emotional response to experiences of hurt, injustice, fear and\nfrustration. Anger often inspires a powerful physical response in the body,\nsuch as a rush of adrenaline, increased blood pressure, increased heart-rate\nand fast breathing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This physical response can lead to aggressive behavior,\nwhich allows us to defend ourselves if attacked. Feeling anger is not the\nproblem, it\u2019s what we do with that volatile emotion that can lead to problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger, if not managed\nproperly, can become destructive at work, in relationships, and affect our\noverall well-being. Some indicators that you may need to consider an anger\ncounseling course or group anger management therapy sessions include: --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1)\nFeeling like you constantly have to \u201chold in\u201d or repress your anger. (2)\nFrequent arguing with your spouse, children or co-workers. (3) Trouble with the\nlaw, or reckless disregard for rules. (4) Physical violence, such as hitting,\nloud shouting, door slamming, etc. (5) Threats of violence against people or\nproperty. (6) Out-of-control behavior, such as breaking things or reckless\ndriving.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MANY ACCIDENTS ARE THE\nRESULT OF RECKLESS DRIVING WHILE IN RAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we sleep, the body\nand mind rest and rebuild damaged cells and neural pathways.&nbsp; We all know that people often feel better after\na good night\u2019s sleep.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; These cunts do NOT know that a human has a\nconscious brain unlike lab rats </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM stands for\n\"rapid eye movement\" and it named for the spike of activity in the\neyes during sleep. The activity in the eyes signals a spike of activity in the\nbrain in this stage of sleep, which takes up about 20 percent of total sleep\ntime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep interweaves\nstreams of thought with emotional values attached, as they fit or challenge the\norganizational structure that represents our identity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapid eye movement\n(REM) sleep is implicated in cross-night adaptation to emotionally negative\nevents. and downregulation of reactions to dysphoric stimuli &nbsp;( emotional adaptation )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep deprivation have\na particular effect on cognitive processes that rely on our experience of\nemotions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amygdala, an\nalmond-shaped structure involved in processing emotions, becomes increasingly\nactive during REM sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep first occurs\nabout 90 minutes after falling asleep.&nbsp;\nYour eyes move rapidly from side to side behind closed eyelids.&nbsp; Mixed frequency brain wave activity becomes\ncloser to that seen in wakefulness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your\nbreathing becomes faster and irregular, and your heart rate and blood pressure\nincrease to near waking levels.&nbsp; Most of\nyour dreaming occurs during REM sleep, although some can also occur in non-REM\nsleep.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your arm and leg muscles become\ntemporarily paralyzed, which prevents you from acting out your dreams.&nbsp; As you age, you sleep less of your time in REM\nsleep.&nbsp; Memory consolidation requires REM\nsleep.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your brain\u2019s rational\nand decision-making regions largely shut down when REM sleep is deprived.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means you may be\nin a precarious mental state that encourages you to take risks you normally\nwouldn\u2019t.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And because your brain has the ability to adapt, also referred to as\n\u201cneural plasticity,\u201d this means that if you neglect REM sleep for long enough,\nyour brain may permanently change as a result. People who stay near mosques who\nblare azaan at 0430 AM remember this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your circadian rhythm\n(or sleep-wake cycle) \u201cdrives\u201d the rhythms of biological activity at the\ncellular level. Hence disruptions tend to cascade outward throughout your\nentire body.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep deprivation\ncan cause changes in your brain activity similar to those experienced by people\nwith psychiatric disorders, and is also linked to anxiety and bipolar\ndepression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uEn5lUif0m4/WTThNzkoDyI/AAAAAAABUGU/N3HCmWsvaOYDG9vWRYnDkrpV5HNGaI94ACLcB/s1600/imZZages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"185\" data-original-width=\"273\" height=\"271\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uEn5lUif0m4/WTThNzkoDyI/AAAAAAABUGU/N3HCmWsvaOYDG9vWRYnDkrpV5HNGaI94ACLcB/s400/imZZages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth's electrons are\nthe ultimate antioxidants, acting as powerful anti-inflammatories.&nbsp; Ideally you should be in&nbsp; direct contact with the Earth, rather than\nseparated from it by a rubber mat.&nbsp;&nbsp; If\nthis is impossible walk on wet green grass immediately after the session.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ELDERLY PEOPLE MUST NOT\nDRINK TOO MUCH FLUIDS JUST BEFORE THEY SLEEP. &nbsp;GETTING UP FOR&nbsp;\nA PEE AT NIGHT AFFECT REM SLEEP.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8DjJFYglLSg/WTThZQzmisI/AAAAAAABUGY/m_mUkwGKz94hqJS3r4CrFYpTYdgWDskAwCLcB/s1600/imaDges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"160\" data-original-width=\"280\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8DjJFYglLSg/WTThZQzmisI/AAAAAAABUGY/m_mUkwGKz94hqJS3r4CrFYpTYdgWDskAwCLcB/s1600/imaDges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unexpressed anger can\ncreate other problems. It can lead to pathological expressions of anger, such\nas passive-aggressive behavior (getting back at people indirectly, without\ntelling them why, rather than confronting them head-on) or a personality that\nseems perpetually cynical and hostile.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are constantly putting others\ndown, criticizing everything, and making cynical comments haven't learned how\nto constructively express their anger.&nbsp;\nNot surprisingly, they aren't likely to have many successful\nrelationships.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people really are\nmore \"hotheaded\" than others are; they get angry more easily and more\nintensely than the average person does. There are also those who don't show\ntheir anger in loud spectacular ways but are chronically irritable and\ngrumpy.&nbsp; Easily angered people don't\nalways curse and throw things; sometimes they withdraw socially, sulk, or get\nphysically ill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are easily\nangered generally have what some psychologists call a low tolerance for\nfrustration,. They can't take things in stride, and they're particularly\ninfuriated if the situation seems somehow unjust: for example, being corrected\nfor a minor mistake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fWLibWwzOok/WTURRa_Y4zI/AAAAAAABUG0/FflD0kTF8p01F4Eked2ceBiMIwdTzRxvQCLcB/s1600/doSSwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"208\" data-original-width=\"242\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fWLibWwzOok/WTURRa_Y4zI/AAAAAAABUG0/FflD0kTF8p01F4Eked2ceBiMIwdTzRxvQCLcB/s1600/doSSwnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some children are born\nirritable, touchy, and easily angered, and that these signs are present from a\nvery early age. Another may be sociocultural.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is often regarded as\nnegative; we're taught that it's all right to express anxiety, depression, or\nother emotions but not to express anger. As a result, we don't learn how to\nhandle it or channel it constructively.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Family background plays\na role. Typically, people who are easily angered come from families that are\ndisruptive, chaotic, and not skilled at emotional communications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes, our anger\nand frustration are caused by very real and inescapable problems in our lives.\nNot all anger is misplaced, and often it's a healthy, natural response to these\ndifficulties. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The underlying message\nof highly angry people, &nbsp;is \"things\noughta go my way!\" &nbsp;&nbsp;Angry people\ntend to feel that they are morally right, that any blocking or changing of\ntheir plans is an unbearable indignity and that they should NOT have to suffer\nthis way.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maybe other people do, but not them!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IMjB7q5RRRc/WTURLdhzacI/AAAAAAABUGw/Qx4rnw4ZICsnRGxBkWChjcTeQMmVA5pCQCLcB/s1600/iGmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IMjB7q5RRRc/WTURLdhzacI/AAAAAAABUGw/Qx4rnw4ZICsnRGxBkWChjcTeQMmVA5pCQCLcB/s400/iGmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Give yourself short\nbreaks during times of the day that tend to be stressful. A few moments of\nquiet time might help you feel better prepared to handle what's ahead without\ngetting irritated or angry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forgiveness is a\npowerful tool. If you allow anger and other negative feelings to crowd out\npositive feelings, you might find yourself swallowed up by your own bitterness\nor sense of injustice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you can forgive\nsomeone who angered you, you might both learn from the situation. It's\nunrealistic to expect everyone to behave exactly as you want at all times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PE-51JpWygk/WTURGbsjeXI/AAAAAAABUGs/Jy-RyBWUgV05MWfDmQWz4kTWJq3CUWWWgCLcB/s1600/ima9ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"188\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PE-51JpWygk/WTURGbsjeXI/AAAAAAABUGs/Jy-RyBWUgV05MWfDmQWz4kTWJq3CUWWWgCLcB/s400/ima9ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Constantly operating at\nhigh levels of stress and anger makes you more susceptible to heart disease,\ndiabetes, a weakened immune system, insomnia, and high blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chronic anger consumes\nhuge amounts of mental energy and clouds your thinking, making it harder to\nconcentrate or enjoy life. Out-of-control anger hurts your career. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WPuIDjx9WHk/WTUS_xYaEhI/AAAAAAABUHE/gqWcLjk0AOMg5eF6NQfQrKCTUq67cNsvgCLcB/s1600/im4Nages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"257\" data-original-width=\"196\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-WPuIDjx9WHk/WTUS_xYaEhI/AAAAAAABUHE/gqWcLjk0AOMg5eF6NQfQrKCTUq67cNsvgCLcB/s400/im4Nages.jpg\" width=\"305\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Constructive criticism,\ncreative differences, and heated debate can be healthy. But lashing out only\nalienates your colleagues, supervisors, or clients and erodes their respect.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Out-of-control anger\nhurts your relationships with others. It causes lasting scars in the people you\nlove most and gets in the way of friendships and work relationships.\nExplosive&nbsp; anger makes it hard for others\nto trust you, speak honestly, or feel comfortable\u2014and is especially damaging to\nchildren.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YicyUJuLhvo/WTUS6Ltrj-I/AAAAAAABUHA/gXRiiOrVtu0zmYrUGD2zdGuxwNGUhr6kgCLcB/s1600/ima2Nges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YicyUJuLhvo/WTUS6Ltrj-I/AAAAAAABUHA/gXRiiOrVtu0zmYrUGD2zdGuxwNGUhr6kgCLcB/s400/ima2Nges.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger problems have\nmore to do with negative thinking patterns, such as having a rigid view of the\nway things should be and getting angry when reality doesn\u2019t match up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is it worth getting\ninto trouble with the law due to your anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger can often lead to\nphysical violence.&nbsp; If you win this fight\n, the BLIND law makes you a loser.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While you can\u2019t control\nanother person\u2019s anger, you can control how you respond to it:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF ANYBODY DISPLAYED\nHIS ANGER ON MY SHIP I WOULD TELL HIM \u201c I DON\u2019T HAVE TIME FOR THIS-- COME BACK\nWHEN YOU HAVE QUENCHED YOUR ANGER \u201c</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h_1eukUC4uo/WTUU_xkucHI/AAAAAAABUHQ/mWC84gNub6wMkyqkaErEpI5HBMdz-nuRQCLcB/s1600/dorwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"235\" data-original-width=\"215\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-h_1eukUC4uo/WTUU_xkucHI/AAAAAAABUHQ/mWC84gNub6wMkyqkaErEpI5HBMdz-nuRQCLcB/s400/dorwnload.jpg\" width=\"365\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
