font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Set clear boundaries\nabout what you will and will not tolerate.&nbsp;\nAnger isn\u2019t the real problem in abusive relationships<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite what many\nbelieve, domestic violence and abuse is not due to the abuser\u2019s loss of control\nover his temper, but a deliberate choice to control you.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is frequently a result of\nfrustration, or of feeling blocked or thwarted from something we feel to be\nimportant.&nbsp;&nbsp; Anger can also be a\ndefensive response to underlying fear or feelings of vulnerability or\npowerlessness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone can become\nangry, that is easy...but to be angry with the right person, to the right\ndegree, at the right time, for the right purpose, and in the right way...this\nis not easy.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ae_TZ4mzbWs/WTUVP-RSWNI/AAAAAAABUHU/SYqKSBpZT4QoeuucI8cv4sxybN-zpzcmACLcB/s1600/dxxownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"202\" data-original-width=\"249\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ae_TZ4mzbWs/WTUVP-RSWNI/AAAAAAABUHU/SYqKSBpZT4QoeuucI8cv4sxybN-zpzcmACLcB/s320/dxxownload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is an active\nemotion that calls the person feeling it to respond.&nbsp; People get into anger issues because both the\ninstigator and instigated lack interpersonal and social skills to maintain\nself-control.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They can train to respond to their anger as unwanted and\nunpleasant rather than react to its need.&nbsp;\nTurning a blind eye or forgiveness is a tool to turn anger off.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting\nenough sleep, exercise and good diet are tools which can assist in preventing\nanger. &nbsp;Then there aren\u2019t too many raw\nnerves on you to touch and inflict pain.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RHqRxrxi_xM/WTUVaYODVaI/AAAAAAABUHY/F47CSustw78M-uyy59dvoJAXCT6TkzmJACLcB/s1600/imagres.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RHqRxrxi_xM/WTUVaYODVaI/AAAAAAABUHY/F47CSustw78M-uyy59dvoJAXCT6TkzmJACLcB/s400/imagres.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>To stop frustration from turning into extreme\nrage , inhale deeply ( deep diaphragmatic &nbsp;) and breathe out slowly . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Last time Putin was having a press conference\nwith Macron I saw him doing it thrice. &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Then he responded by telling immature\nupstart Macron &nbsp; </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ARE NOT CHILDREN HERE\u2014 WE ARE IN THE SERIOUS BUSINESS OF\nPOLITICS </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>You automatically breathe in more (\nhyperventilation by chest breathing ) than out when you\u2019re feeling angry, and\nthe trick is to do stomach breathing \u2013exhaling slowly .&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>This will calm you down\neffectively and help you think more clearly. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Yoga does NOT allow shallow chest breathing&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/hyperventilation-followed-by-valsalva.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">I AM PUTTING THIS ECMO\nPOST SO THAT YOU KNOW THE <span style=\"color: blue;\">DANCE OF GASES</span> WITHIN OUR BODY</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/extracorporeal-membrane-oxygenation.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person in rage experiences\ntunnel vision, muffled hearing, increased heart rate, and hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While anxiety is to\nblame for hyperventilation, hyperventilation is to blame for dozens of the\nworst symptoms of anxiety. Hyperventilation can cause so many problems that\nsome doctors label it its own disorder, known as \"hyperventilation\nsyndrome.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">Hyperventilation\nliterally translates to \"over-breathing.\" &nbsp; &nbsp;Contrary to popular belief\n\u2013 and contrary to the way it makes you feel \u2013 it is not the act of getting too\nlittle air. &nbsp; Rather, it's the act of breathing out carbon dioxide too quickly,\ncausing too much oxygen to enter the lungs.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breathing too fast is\nthe most common way to hyperventilate, and very common with anxiety. During\nperiods of intense anxiety, the body goes into fight or flight mode and starts\nbreathing quickly as it prepares to fight or flee.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But since there is no\ndanger, your body just keeps hyperventilating, until you've started to\nexperience the physical symptoms that come from extensive hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation is\nrapid and deep breathing. It is also called overbreathing.. You breathe in\noxygen and breathe out carbon dioxide. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Hyperventilation creates a </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">LOW LEVEL OF CARBON\nDIOXIDE</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> in your blood. This causes many of the symptoms of hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Low carbon dioxide\nlevels lead to narrowing of the blood vessels that supply blood to the brain.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This reduction in blood supply to the brain leads to symptoms like\nlightheadedness and tingling in the fingers which ROGUE GURU WHO KNOWS SHIT\nABOUT YOGA , SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR HAS PATENTED .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Severe hyperventilation can\nlead to loss of consciousness and with a Valsava Maneuver INSTANT DEATH&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Managing your anger is\nas much about managing your happiness and contentment as your anger<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you hold your anger\ninside, it can lead to passive-aggressive behavior like ''getting back'' at\npeople without telling them why or being critical and hostile. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing how to\nrecognize and express these feelings in appropriate ways can help you handle\nemergencies, solve problems, and hold on to meaningful relationships.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unchecked anger can be\nlinked to crime, abuse, and other violent behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the six basic\nuniversal emotions that affect humankind (happiness, sadness, surprise, fear,\ndisgust and anger), it is perhaps anger that exerts the most powerful force on\nhuman behaviour. Anger has the dubious reputation of being \u2018the first emotion\nhuman beings experience and the last we learn to manage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is firmly rooted\nin our so-called reptilian brain, which we share with all living creatures.\nThousands of years ago, this primitive emotion, associated with the\nfight-or-flight response, was used as a survival method in battle or hunting.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger occurs naturally as a reaction to a perceived threat and can be useful in\nproviding us with a boost of energy thus allowing us to deal with a challenging\nsituation. In this way it is a constructive and positive component to survival.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem arises when\nanger becomes an inappropriate response to daily life stresses and can no\nlonger be controlled.&nbsp; Seldom creative\nand often destructive, anger is harmful to the body and can weaken the immune\nsystem, in addition to causing aggression and disrupting relationships.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rage,\nthe ultimate manifestation of anger, typically inhibits individuals from their\ncapacity to reason, resulting in aggressive or violent behaviours; and\nproducing physiological symptoms such as tunnel vision, muffled hearing, faster\nheartbeat and hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xZxL7EBm8y8/WTVbahCRnGI/AAAAAAABUH4/LK4ikXkUrxQATFp9L3V7Jp12yWXEGCNAgCLcB/s1600/downesaload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"240\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xZxL7EBm8y8/WTVbahCRnGI/AAAAAAABUH4/LK4ikXkUrxQATFp9L3V7Jp12yWXEGCNAgCLcB/s400/downesaload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Injustice, can be&nbsp; real or perceived\u2014mostly perceived because of\ntunnel vision caused by anger . Tunnel vision is the tendency to only see or\nfocus on a single priority while neglecting or ignoring other important\npriorities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The benefits of being able to focus our attention so narrowly\nduring a crisis are obvious \u2013 it aids survival. It can become dysfunctional\nhowever if it becomes a habit or mode of processing information in everyday\nlife, as the result of habitual mental tunnel vision can be the neglect of\nimportant priorities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason tunnel vision is a common occurrence among\npeople with Personality Disorders is they sometimes go into \u201ccrisis mode\u201d when\nthere is actually no crisis present. We can't see anything that contradicts our\nintentions and desires. We get selective perception, which limits our ability\nto remain open and to see things clearly.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n_rVeCeU6mk/WTVbmvTs9GI/AAAAAAABUH8/fjNTylHKIkIyGDMfkg3W9F0y41TxaJZEQCLcB/s1600/imaDges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n_rVeCeU6mk/WTVbmvTs9GI/AAAAAAABUH8/fjNTylHKIkIyGDMfkg3W9F0y41TxaJZEQCLcB/s400/imaDges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of being present to our\nreality, we put the blinders on and barrel ahead towards our hopes and dreams.&nbsp; There are reasons that we aren't looking at\nthe big picture. Many of them boil down to fear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Situations that cause\nsecretion of high levels of adrenaline such a physical fight can also cause\ntunnel vision. Even intense anger causes the release of high levels of\nadrenaline and can cause temporary tunnel vision.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rage causes tunnel\nvision, they can\u2019t think logically or rationally, they usually have a hard time\neven forming a coherent sentence. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3AWpnJXykcI/WTVaI1bPfxI/AAAAAAABUHs/NioMrad-qcAjl5U0_Np_oz_WOaZQIWhzACLcB/s1600/dow44wnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"244\" data-original-width=\"207\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3AWpnJXykcI/WTVaI1bPfxI/AAAAAAABUHs/NioMrad-qcAjl5U0_Np_oz_WOaZQIWhzACLcB/s400/dow44wnload.png\" width=\"339\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis one of the reasons why they neglect to see the connection between the\nfrustration of behaviors that typically get reinforced in an expected way and\nthe anger that arrives as a response to that frustration, since anger very\nclosely follows frustration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole episode is experienced with a low level\nof awareness and therefore little chance for insight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People wanting to deal\nmore effectively with their anger actually shouldn\u2019t be primarily focused on\nthe anger itself but on the anger activator, on their frustration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They behave\na certain way in order to receive a positive reinforcement or avoid a negative\nreinforcement but have nothing happen instead so that they\u2019re either denied the\npositive reinforcement or forced to continue to endure the negative\nreinforcement, which puts them in a state of frustration that quickly\ntransforms into anger.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tzqNmENVlL0/WTVZ6xJRkaI/AAAAAAABUHo/uMw9fA22srwbRRyiXd8FiL1rQOgruVWogCLcB/s1600/wdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tzqNmENVlL0/WTVZ6xJRkaI/AAAAAAABUHo/uMw9fA22srwbRRyiXd8FiL1rQOgruVWogCLcB/s320/wdownload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frustration and anger are two separate entities, two\nseparate states of being, but they tend to occur milliseconds apart from one\nanother so that they blend together from the perspective of the person\nexperiencing them, especially since decreased awareness, that tunnel vision\nwhere higher order mental processes like critical thinking are retarded, is so\ncommon during anger episodes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be objective here.\nEveryone makes mistakes, and it is through mistakes that people learn how to\nimprove.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people can be\ncynical. They can believe that others do things on purpose to annoy or\nfrustrate them, even before anything happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NnW1KmzOWA0/WTVb3fXlrAI/AAAAAAABUIA/NYlA8CO6AcYS3JX1hBead-RboAhUBSkZwCLcB/s1600/1U563818.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"788\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NnW1KmzOWA0/WTVb3fXlrAI/AAAAAAABUIA/NYlA8CO6AcYS3JX1hBead-RboAhUBSkZwCLcB/s400/1U563818.png\" width=\"355\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To build trust, be\nhonest with people. Explain your actions or decisions when you need to, and\nalways keep your word. If you do this consistently, people will learn that they\ncan trust you. They'll also follow your lead, and you'll learn that you can\ntrust them in return.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miscommunication\ncontributes to frustrating situations. The better you listen to what someone\nsays, the easier it is to find a resolution that doesn't involve an angry\nresponse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA I HAD SHORE BOSSES\nAND EVEN SHIP CAPTAINS WHO ONLY WANTED TO HEAR WHAT THEY WANT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miscommunication or\ncrossed-wires can cause anger. This is because we as humans do not like to feel\nlike we are misunderstood. However, it is very important to look at the other\nperson\u2019s perspective in any given situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As feelings are\nsubjective, it is sometimes very hard for other people to see the reasons\nbehind your behaviour. This means that unless you explain the reasons behind\nthe hurt, the upset and the anger, that they are never going to understand\nwhere you are coming from<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Od8hTY8S__c/WTVwSEahVHI/AAAAAAABUIw/aZjXe-4dH3YIppT6_ZZ1zXaclSk1MAHJwCLcB/s1600/dNNownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Od8hTY8S__c/WTVwSEahVHI/AAAAAAABUIw/aZjXe-4dH3YIppT6_ZZ1zXaclSk1MAHJwCLcB/s400/dNNownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only way that the\nother person is going to realise how much they have hurt you is through you\ncommunicating and explaining to that person what they did wrong and how it made\nyou feel.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This then gives them a chance to explain their motives and what drove\nthem to the behaviour; more often than not the person didn\u2019t intend to hurt you\nor didn\u2019t even realise that their actions would hurt your feelings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Miscommunication\nbetween men and women happen frequently as women use communication as a way of\ndiscussing a problem and through this discussion women feel better about that\nproblem. Men however, will have a discussion to find a solution to the problem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore when a woman comes to talk to her partner about a problem she faced\nat work today, he often doesn\u2019t realise that that is all she wants to do:\ndiscuss her problems with him. Whereas he may feel like they are having this\ndiscussion for the purpose of him to find a solution to the problem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/adam-vs-eve-battle-of-sexes-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/adam-vs-eve-battle-of-sexes-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, when\na man has a problem that he does not wish to discuss he will often withdraw.\nHis female partner will often feel like she is there to help him and will be\noffended at this new withdrawal, not realising that this is his way of dealing\nwith his problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-81lLV4ooW3Q/WTVpyrkkeNI/AAAAAAABUIQ/4vLGESjpW-Iw4UtTr5pqRMogu7edstwuACLcB/s1600/dowHnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-81lLV4ooW3Q/WTVpyrkkeNI/AAAAAAABUIQ/4vLGESjpW-Iw4UtTr5pqRMogu7edstwuACLcB/s640/dowHnload.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, the word is\n\"assertive,\" not \"aggressive.\"&nbsp;&nbsp; When you're aggressive, you focus on\nwinning. You care little for others' feelings, rights, and needs.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you're assertive,\nyou focus on balance.&nbsp; You're honest\nabout what you want, and you respect the needs of others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pO1UkFv-g5U/WTVqWTO6wSI/AAAAAAABUIY/GZfgG7T_IRQDajOXf-WEdnOOSD-wp9uGQCLcB/s1600/9images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"171\" data-original-width=\"295\" height=\"231\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pO1UkFv-g5U/WTVqWTO6wSI/AAAAAAABUIY/GZfgG7T_IRQDajOXf-WEdnOOSD-wp9uGQCLcB/s400/9images.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is short. If you\nspend all of your time getting angry, you're going to miss the many joys and\nsurprises that life offers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think about how many\ntimes your anger has destroyed a relationship, or caused you to miss a happy\nday with friends and family. That's time that you'll never get back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4MvJtYY7g28/WTVqD68H8YI/AAAAAAABUIU/MO7-Eyuhd4UGc3zNTQCLcibw4jpKa7UxgCLcB/s1600/assertiveness-qu88otes-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"280\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4MvJtYY7g28/WTVqD68H8YI/AAAAAAABUIU/MO7-Eyuhd4UGc3zNTQCLcibw4jpKa7UxgCLcB/s400/assertiveness-qu88otes-1.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To ensure that you make\nlong-term changes, you need to forgive people who have angered you.&nbsp; It's not easy to forget past resentments, but\nthe only way to move on is to let go of these feelings. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To manage anger, acknowledge\nthat you have a problem, keep a hostility log, and build a support network\nbased on trust.&nbsp; Anger is a normal human\nemotion and when it is managed properly it is not a problem.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wYvsHTGfQhA/WTVvbVIsUYI/AAAAAAABUIo/mPG_aKP4FXga6uejuICMcBtsIgfo7CabgCLcB/s1600/imaBY9ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wYvsHTGfQhA/WTVvbVIsUYI/AAAAAAABUIo/mPG_aKP4FXga6uejuICMcBtsIgfo7CabgCLcB/s1600/imaBY9ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone gets angry,\nand mild anger can sometimes be useful to express strong feelings and deal with\nsituations. However, if anger is expressed in harmful ways, or persists over a\nlong period of time, then it can lead to problems in relationships at home and\nat work and can affect the overall quality of your life. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry behaviours\ninclude yelling, throwing things, criticising, ignoring, storming out and\nsometimes withdrawing into a DEEP SULK, doing nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger can often lead to\nviolence if not properly controlled and some people use anger as an excuse for\nbeing abusive towards others.&nbsp; Violence\nand abusive behaviour gives someone power and control over another person\nusually through creating fear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-l__usMMqvsQ/WTVvLWk4kRI/AAAAAAABUIk/S50x9OFsu4I_2iMdgpfGMzYeSqiov5gZACLcB/s1600/dZZ88ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"163\" data-original-width=\"310\" height=\"210\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-l__usMMqvsQ/WTVvLWk4kRI/AAAAAAABUIk/S50x9OFsu4I_2iMdgpfGMzYeSqiov5gZACLcB/s400/dZZ88ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often men find it\nharder to express the feelings underneath the anger, like hurt, sadness or\ngrief. For women the reverse may often be true - the anger gets buried under\ntears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is also a problem\nwhen other people around you are frightened, hurt or feel they cannot talk to\nyou or disagree with you in case you become angry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people get\nangry&nbsp; to get what they want.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; They become angry with the people who are\nclosest to them, or with people who are less powerful than them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger lasts for a long\ntime, and well after the triggering event has passed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger affects other\nsituations not related to the original event.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is not usually a\ngood solution to problems, even if it seems helpful in the short term.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unmanaged anger creates problems - sometimes for you and often for others\naround you.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you're angry, your\nthinking can get exaggerated and irrational. Try replacing these kinds of\nthoughts with more useful, rational .. Getting angry is acting against your\nbest interests.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3IfQhAMvkyo/WTWKF27PZiI/AAAAAAABUJI/qMBJIWp4TEYuFNvkipdM5apoMwSypzMoACLcB/s1600/imNages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"170\" data-original-width=\"297\" height=\"366\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3IfQhAMvkyo/WTWKF27PZiI/AAAAAAABUJI/qMBJIWp4TEYuFNvkipdM5apoMwSypzMoACLcB/s640/imNages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is a negative reaction, and if you wish to progress on\nthe path of self-improvement or spiritual growth you should avoid it as much as\npossible.&nbsp; Everyone is entitled to his\nopinion. You can disagree with people, but still maintain tact and diplomacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try to manifest at\nleast some self-control, self-discipline and more common sense.&nbsp; Don't take everything too seriously. It is\nnot worth it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expressing anger\nthrough aggression and violence can be very damaging and frightening to those\naround you, and can affect your relationships, your career, as well as the\nlevel of respect people have for you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lswMAZomv3Y/WTWJwQ51_sI/AAAAAAABUJE/VUZ8VU4uo2oL0NhQPKfSRe9mYyNkwrAdQCLcB/s1600/im99ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lswMAZomv3Y/WTWJwQ51_sI/AAAAAAABUJE/VUZ8VU4uo2oL0NhQPKfSRe9mYyNkwrAdQCLcB/s640/im99ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ON MY SHIP IF I SAW\nPEOPLE TAKING THINGS PERSONALLY I WARN THEM . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AT\nSAFETY MEETINGS I ALLOW SAILORS TO SPEAK FREELY WITHOUT FEAR AND THAT TOO CROSS\n&nbsp;DEPARTMENT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6hY0kdbg1E4/WTWKaVYqTNI/AAAAAAABUJM/vVrzOgqQutg5_2o4ML4G4hOkjWReEUC0wCLcB/s1600/88images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6hY0kdbg1E4/WTWKaVYqTNI/AAAAAAABUJM/vVrzOgqQutg5_2o4ML4G4hOkjWReEUC0wCLcB/s1600/88images.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I WARN MY TOP OFFICERS\nLIKE CHIEF ENGINEER AND CHIEF OFFICER\u2014&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\u201c NO GETTING ANGRY \u2013 &nbsp;IT IS ABOUT COMMON\nSAFETY AND THE COMMON ADVENTURE IN WHICH WE ARE ALL PART &nbsp;\u2013 NOT YOU PERSONALLY . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IF I SEE YOU GETTING ANGRY , &nbsp;IT WILL GO AGAINST YOU \u201c<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>NOBODY DARED TO TAKE\nTHINGS PERSONALLY &nbsp;!<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YjbQ6IxQsSg/WTWJeHn4EWI/AAAAAAABUJA/pK_OoAiTO6cgtaB5lkIKOBmtwNkx884sQCLcB/s1600/downEload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"272\" data-original-width=\"185\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YjbQ6IxQsSg/WTWJeHn4EWI/AAAAAAABUJA/pK_OoAiTO6cgtaB5lkIKOBmtwNkx884sQCLcB/s400/downEload.jpg\" width=\"272\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember life is\nunfair!&nbsp; Be certain about the facts\nrelating to the conflict. (NOT your opinions!)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you begin to notice\nthat you are on edge quite a lot, do things that you later regret, are quick to\nreact instead of respond, and that you have WELL WISHERS in your life who have\ntold you that you tend to get angry, it might be helpful to do something about\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Digression : When my\nwell wishers knew that I am leaving SCI&nbsp;\nto join foreign companies , they hastened to tell me . &nbsp;\u201c Saala Ajit , you wont last 24 hours in a foreign\ncompany , considering your attitude of kicking your bosses on their collective balls\n&nbsp;(like a beehive) &nbsp;for no good reason \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Without changing my said\nattitude I was rode the crest of the wave \u2013 &nbsp;delivering the goods every time .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Personal competence matters!</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">I could fit the\nintelligence and professional competence of all my shore bosses under my prick\u2019s\nuncircumcised foreskin and have space for 99.9 % more \u2014 AARAAM SE ! .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oOv8UyjZVgI/WTWd-1UgdSI/AAAAAAABUJs/Xl15Jwj4WmoW7g7wUNIaW1fn6RLXhI_VwCLcB/s1600/imaccges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oOv8UyjZVgI/WTWd-1UgdSI/AAAAAAABUJs/Xl15Jwj4WmoW7g7wUNIaW1fn6RLXhI_VwCLcB/s400/imaccges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Perfectionism is one of\nthe more destructive aspects of low self-esteem. A perfectionist is someone who\nlives with a constant sense of failure because their achievements, no matter\nhow impressive, don't ever feel quite good enough. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recognise there is a\nhuge difference between failing at something you do and being a failure as a\nperson. Don't confuse the two. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stop sweating the small\nstuff. Perfectionists tend to nitpick at insignificant problems. They forget to\nview the bigger picture and take pride in that.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid comparing yourself to\nothers. This only leads to insecurity. Accept that everyone is different and\nremember where your strengths lie. Accept we all come with our own unique\ntalents.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3vtxsG41lpE/WTWdr0Vw68I/AAAAAAABUJo/mqrGCeYSkRsCeTe908haDmBk_sU9LFiwgCLcB/s1600/i99mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3vtxsG41lpE/WTWdr0Vw68I/AAAAAAABUJo/mqrGCeYSkRsCeTe908haDmBk_sU9LFiwgCLcB/s400/i99mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have to take pride in these to believe we are worthy people. An elephant\ndoes NOT need to go into depression because the horse beat him in a race<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being too sensitive is\none of the more painful aspects of low self-esteem. Whether you're angered by\ncriticism or literally feel demolished by any comment that's directed at you,\nit's important to desensitise yourself Really listen to what's being said. This\nway you can evaluate whether a comment is true or not, before deciding how you\nfeel about it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stand up for yourself.\nIf the criticism is unfair, say you disagree. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be proactive. If there\nis some truth in it, learn from what's being said, rather than beating yourself\nup about it. Constructive criticism can be exactly that, provided you take the\ncomments on board and make changes for the better. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Fr7Jeza4Rs4/WTWdgrO__bI/AAAAAAABUJk/V1XSwA7ivZsaZ39nb0Qmlz90t4GGN9USgCLcB/s1600/hdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Fr7Jeza4Rs4/WTWdgrO__bI/AAAAAAABUJk/V1XSwA7ivZsaZ39nb0Qmlz90t4GGN9USgCLcB/s400/hdownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Move on. Replaying over\nand over what's upset you only anchors the memory to you \u2013 which won't help.. Fear\nand a belief that you are powerless to change anything in your world are\nirrefutably linked to low self-esteem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Discriminate between genuine fears and\nunfounded ones. Challenge your anxieties with the facts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance, you may\nfeel it's pointless to go for a promotion because you don't think you can get\nit. Anger is a normal emotion, but one that gets distorted when you have low\nself-esteem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you don't think highly of yourself, you start to believe your\nown thoughts and feelings aren't important to others. Repressed hurt and anger\ncan build up, so something seemingly small can trigger outbursts of fury.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-auj_W8Lflxw/WTWdU3k_xpI/AAAAAAABUJg/zneqZXBZsb4G41M3tXyLnpHHX55kXtFLwCLcB/s1600/dow55nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"259\" data-original-width=\"194\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-auj_W8Lflxw/WTWdU3k_xpI/AAAAAAABUJg/zneqZXBZsb4G41M3tXyLnpHHX55kXtFLwCLcB/s400/dow55nload.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger\nis a normal emotion, but one that gets distorted when you have low self-esteem.\nWhen you don't think highly of yourself, you start to believe your own thoughts\nand feelings aren't important to others.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repressed hurt and anger can build up,\nso something seemingly small can trigger outbursts of fury. One of the biggest\nproblems with low self-esteem is feeling you have to please others so that they\nlike, love and respect you. As a result many people-pleasers end up feeling\naggrieved and used.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Learn how to say no. Your worth doesn't depend on others'\napproval \u2013 people like and love you for who you are, not what you do for them. People\nwith a healthy self-esteem know when it's important to put themselves first. Start\nplacing limits on what you will and won't do and your resentment will ease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-19Ciz0biGR8/WTWdA5wN2KI/AAAAAAABUJc/uk0HlY-yJzs_z0KLWdY3Egja_ZK3GpeLACLcB/s1600/ima5NCges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-19Ciz0biGR8/WTWdA5wN2KI/AAAAAAABUJc/uk0HlY-yJzs_z0KLWdY3Egja_ZK3GpeLACLcB/s320/ima5NCges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-esteem is another\nfactor of one feeling rage; evidence has shown that individuals that suffer\nfrom low self-esteem may compensate by bullying and inflicting physical harm\nonto others.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger can occur when a\nperson feels their personal boundaries are being or going to be violated. Some\nhave a learned tendency to react to anger through retaliation as a way of\ncoping. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Animals, for example,\nmake loud sounds, attempt to look physically larger, bare their teeth, and\nstare. The behaviors associated with anger are designed to warn aggressors to\nstop their threatening behavior. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The words annoyance and\nrage are often imagined to be at opposite ends of an emotional continuum: mild\nirritation and annoyance at the low end and fury or murderous rage at the high\nend. Rage problems are conceptualized as \"the inability to process emotions\nor life's experiences\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger when viewed as a\nprotective response or instinct to a perceived threat is considered as\npositive. The negative expression of this state is known as aggression.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V82UxKf8uPE/WTWgGo2Zt6I/AAAAAAABUJ0/Jobmhua3c3YtNBVd10G-eYgXryK80qNAgCLcB/s1600/d88ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"188\" data-original-width=\"268\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V82UxKf8uPE/WTWgGo2Zt6I/AAAAAAABUJ0/Jobmhua3c3YtNBVd10G-eYgXryK80qNAgCLcB/s400/d88ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The symptoms of\naggressive anger are:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bullying, such as threatening\npeople directly, persecuting, pushing or shoving, using power to oppress,\nshouting, driving someone off the road, playing on people's weaknesses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Destructiveness, such\nas destroying objects as in vandalism, harming animals, child abuse, destroying\na relationship, reckless driving, substance abuse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hurtfulness, such as\nviolence, including sexual abuse and rape, verbal abuse, biased or vulgar\njokes, breaking confidence, using foul language, ignoring people's feelings,\nwillfully discriminating, blaming, punishing people for unwarranted deeds,\nlabeling others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manic behavior, such as\nspeaking too fast, walking too fast, driving too fast, reckless spending.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Threats, such as\nfrightening people by saying how one could harm them, their property or their prospects,\nfinger pointing, fist shaking, wearing clothes or symbols associated with\nviolent behaviour, tailgating, excessively blowing a car horn, slamming doors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unjust blaming, such as\naccusing other people for one's own mistakes, blaming people for your own\nfeelings, making general accusations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unpredictability, such\nas explosive rages over minor frustrations, attacking indiscriminately,\ndispensing unjust punishment, inflicting harm on others for the sake of it,\nusing alcohol and drugs,illogical arguments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vengeance, such as\nbeing over-punitive. This differs from retributive justice, as vengeance is\npersonal, and possibly unlimited in scale.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger makes people less\ntrusting, and slower to attribute good qualities to outsiders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We may get angry or\nexpress anger if we see someone harming a small defenseless child. Reactive or\nimpulsive anger may help us at these times to do the right thing automatically.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gZEpUFEEbpw/WTWf8Vq5DXI/AAAAAAABUJw/fWgkZSZxvr8l65GXVQvVyHMqXemXML_DgCLcB/s1600/Anger-LovWWe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"395\" data-original-width=\"650\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gZEpUFEEbpw/WTWf8Vq5DXI/AAAAAAABUJw/fWgkZSZxvr8l65GXVQvVyHMqXemXML_DgCLcB/s640/Anger-LovWWe.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A LOT OF ANGER IS\nPROPELLED BY HUMAN EGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The underlying emotion\nfor the ego is fear, the fear of being a nobody.
