There is always a sense of\ninsecurity around the ego even if on the outside it appears confident ,\nperfumed and powdered. Ego strengthens itself by diminishing others.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ego is\ninsanity of the human mind. Unhappiness is an ego created mental cum emotional\ndisease. The chatter of the ego continuously disrupts the natural state of well\nbeing. Stress is from within the mind , not by external threat. Ego creates\nsuffering without recognising it. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ESdSwAwST6c/WTXuSrfiDEI/AAAAAAABUKI/cNuFL-_HBHwnMhm8GJF_4sBPr0ZTs8uHwCLcB/s1600/eeimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ESdSwAwST6c/WTXuSrfiDEI/AAAAAAABUKI/cNuFL-_HBHwnMhm8GJF_4sBPr0ZTs8uHwCLcB/s640/eeimages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ego laden\nturds would disagree with someone\u2019s point just because the is the one who said\nit. Their ego makes them take everything personally. They mistake a short\nmemory for a clear conscience and are miserable within.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are unable to\nlisten to another person's view without feeling threatened. They leave debris\nand destruction wherever they go. They are very eager to see their picture or\nname on the cover of a business periodical . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-leXX3gXiRd8/WTXvAEBLV7I/AAAAAAABUKM/BjhnhNEn_jExrv3b9bm69Vqc7rxQ7gOVwCLcB/s1600/imcages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-leXX3gXiRd8/WTXvAEBLV7I/AAAAAAABUKM/BjhnhNEn_jExrv3b9bm69Vqc7rxQ7gOVwCLcB/s400/imcages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their indifference\narises due to ego. Their ego cannot distinguish between a situation and their\ninterpretation and reaction to that situation. Cooperation is alien to ego\nexcept when there is a secondary motive. The ego becomes the grit in the system\nthat gets in the way of authentic meaningful communication. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their self-talk is the\nmouthpiece of ego, Their inflated, overbearing egos create rules for rules\u2019 sake.\nThey complicate procedures , squash good ideas and keep good people down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MYk8tqcGQYo/WTXuDnHB6LI/AAAAAAABUKE/swUZqoHuQ2UItcZqCD11rd82BqWdu0XnwCLcB/s1600/imttages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"177\" data-original-width=\"285\" height=\"248\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MYk8tqcGQYo/WTXuDnHB6LI/AAAAAAABUKE/swUZqoHuQ2UItcZqCD11rd82BqWdu0XnwCLcB/s400/imttages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ego tries to enlarge\nand strengthen by forming gangs and posses. Here the ego has simply shifted\nfrom the personal to the collective.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Good leaders surround themselves with\ntalented, outspoken individuals, not yes- men. Leadership is not an ego game\u2014 APCO\nModi please note!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since leadership is of\nspirit, the ego powered men can never be good leaders--they can never rise over\nthe post of a mangy manager. Ego makes a donkey think that he is THE champion\nrace horse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ego is a demanding unforgiving parasite .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To\nthe ego the present moment NOW hardly exists and is always concerned with\nkeeping the past alive. Ego looks at the present with jaundiced eyes of the\npast. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C3ES_hMiEa4/WTXwXIlCR5I/AAAAAAABUKQ/WK0_5hRIf3sNL3GtntkheAy90YhA-PxIACLcB/s1600/im4ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"189\" data-original-width=\"267\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C3ES_hMiEa4/WTXwXIlCR5I/AAAAAAABUKQ/WK0_5hRIf3sNL3GtntkheAy90YhA-PxIACLcB/s400/im4ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When people angrily argue\nthey will act as if they are fighting for survival and there is a imminent need\nto win at all costs. Such is the self delusion caused by ego. The ego thrives\non reactivity. To be free of ego all you need to do is to be aware of your\nthoughts and emotions as they happen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Awareness and ego cannot coexist. It is\ndifficult to see one's own ego. There is a fine line between pride and\narrogance, that line is called EGO. The danger zone is when you start thinking\nthat your accomplishments earn you the right to be condescending, obnoxious and\nabusive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arrogance is having an attitude of superiority, delighting in your own\nsignificance and thriving on others feelings of inferiority.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_jLwg0DP9Xo/WTXwmjHNTXI/AAAAAAABUKU/gQACLGxkmR4gvT_58vD_qaEz_zjHY8NjACLcB/s1600/imwages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"183\" data-original-width=\"275\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_jLwg0DP9Xo/WTXwmjHNTXI/AAAAAAABUKU/gQACLGxkmR4gvT_58vD_qaEz_zjHY8NjACLcB/s400/imwages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Three and a half\ndecades ago, as&nbsp; young men, we were all\nstanding in queue to enter the examination hall at Mumbai MMD, for the First\nMate's exam.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>One of my long lost\nfriends,&nbsp; shouted out from behind the\nlong line ( i was in front )--\" Ajit , well prepared?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I shouted back \"\nHum fail hoyenga to kaun pass hoyenga, saala \" ( Buddy, if I fail, &nbsp;who will pass ? )<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-goOf5DpN80o/WTXytgHqLFI/AAAAAAABUKc/S5mxFjAdXekERvRSNFbzu9UBN_F4n0lhgCLcB/s1600/imarges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"293\" data-original-width=\"172\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-goOf5DpN80o/WTXytgHqLFI/AAAAAAABUKc/S5mxFjAdXekERvRSNFbzu9UBN_F4n0lhgCLcB/s400/imarges.jpg\" width=\"234\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>And this made me very\nunpopular with the dumbos and the paranoids in line , some of whom who were\ngiving their 3rd and 4th shots. They were angry and upset.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Now after giving this\ncorny dialogue , If I fail, you can very well imagine my condition, for we all\nstayed together at the Seamen\u2019s club at Ballard Estate, Mumbai.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a2mr8JJzksg/WTXyOCkg8sI/AAAAAAABUKY/S6Jj13b6SJwtGka5xDlMCrNLLa8ncFDCwCLcB/s1600/imagzzzes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a2mr8JJzksg/WTXyOCkg8sI/AAAAAAABUKY/S6Jj13b6SJwtGka5xDlMCrNLLa8ncFDCwCLcB/s400/imagzzzes.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jealousy is a raw human\nemotion created when a person feels insecure about his value to other people.&nbsp; It consists of negative feelings, revolving\naround&nbsp;&nbsp; fear and anxiety over an\nanticipated loss .&nbsp; When you compare\nyourself to others , it will lead to destructive thinking. Facebook is a forum\nwhere you give others the power to make you jealous and feel miserable. Unless\nyou are ze guy who holds 3 aces all the while.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Face Book is for shared\nlaughter? Oh Yeah?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Friend or no, envy is an overwhelming emotion. When you are\njealous you count the other fellow's blessings instead of your own, and lose\nyour peace of mind\u2014rather burn up inside..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is in the character of very few\nmen to honor without envy a friend who has prospered. The sure mark of one born\nwith noble qualities, is being born without envy.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Q8aXsoJYuFQ/WTX2Pdy6IZI/AAAAAAABUKk/gORhzFTycykdlCe5EPtG8Y2EaS_8NqKeQCLcB/s1600/imbages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Q8aXsoJYuFQ/WTX2Pdy6IZI/AAAAAAABUKk/gORhzFTycykdlCe5EPtG8Y2EaS_8NqKeQCLcB/s640/imbages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of the seven deadly\nsins, only envy aint no fun at all. When jealousy stirs up anger within, boy\u2014you\nare skating on thin ice.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me digress briefly\nto \u201cdog eat dog\u201d office politics . It is purely based on jealousy.&nbsp; Jealousy is,&nbsp;\nthe worst of all faults as it makes a victim of both parties. It is not\nlove that is blind, but jealousy. Every power play attacker enjoys seeing fear\nin the victim.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a valuable skill to know when to yield. Keep your emotions\nunder a leash even when you are outraged, but don\u2019t allow yourself to be the\nscapegoat for someone else\u2019s mistakes. The truth is without engaging in some\nsort of political activity or trying to develop followers , your career will\nstagnate.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why old blunt seadogs\n, like yours truly, who are not limelight oriented are misfits ashore. Do not\nallow yourself to be emotionally blackmailed by con artists who misrepresent\ntheir authority.&nbsp; Use your intelligence\nand gut feeling here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t hurt working\nrelation ships\u2014you may need to be a hypocrite here. maintain your sense of\nhumor. There is no hypocrisy at sea. You don\u2019t see each other\u2019s faces after a\ncontract together. You can be yourself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When negative politics are used by team\nmembers or negative energies are channelised for selfish needs, the resulting\nconflict can corrode the core of the team.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Team efforts are swamped by power struggles. At the work place\nproductivity soars when everyone is working as one team instead of pointing\nfingers and trying to outdo each other.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There must be an atmosphere of \u201cwe\u2019re\nall in this together.\u201d Anger, resentment and jealousy doesn't change the heart\nof others-- it only changes yours. The jealous are troublesome to others, but a\ngreater torment to themselves.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DpILTXdXUzo/WTX2jPFdGGI/AAAAAAABUKo/jhQoLdaUackWY3at5EM7c9N2kp6vVP-iQCLcB/s1600/ima7ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DpILTXdXUzo/WTX2jPFdGGI/AAAAAAABUKo/jhQoLdaUackWY3at5EM7c9N2kp6vVP-iQCLcB/s400/ima7ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jealousy\nis the religion of the mediocre. It comforts them, it soothes their worries,\nand finally it rots their souls, allowing them to justify their meanness and\ntheir greed,&nbsp; until they believe these to\nbe virtues.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fenced-in dog always barks at the one running free.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Xp3oEea1-wY/WTZHfdpHv-I/AAAAAAABULA/9-FLBjrWiccf2wqElTlyNpfyHxheHbyUQCLcB/s1600/imnnages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"200\" data-original-width=\"200\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Xp3oEea1-wY/WTZHfdpHv-I/AAAAAAABULA/9-FLBjrWiccf2wqElTlyNpfyHxheHbyUQCLcB/s400/imnnages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\njealous behavior goes completely haywire, it can erupt into aggression and\npossibly turn violent. . Normal jealousy in a relationship generally stems from\na place of love and commitment.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\njealously gets out of control, it becomes injurious to both parties involved.\nUnhealthy jealousy uses up precious energy and steals quality time . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma , envy is a disastrous\nemotion.&nbsp; Hinduism maintains that\nanything which causes the mind to lose balance with itself, leads to\nmisery.&nbsp; Envy cannot coexist with truth\nand spiritual wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VMnOmtOviKc/WTX1wbNvv7I/AAAAAAABUKg/sU7wy7kytbI_VHJu0NZ2G3ijFIC4gWjZACLcB/s1600/iemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; NOSE ( HARMLESS AND PAINLESS BUT GREAT FLOW OF BLOOD ) WITH A KALARI TAP<br />\n<br />\nASK HIM TO USE MY WASHROOM -- MY TOWEL IS READY<br />\n<br />\nASK HIM TO SIT ON MY BED-- HAND OVER A COLD CAN OF COKE -- TO DRINK AS WELL AS STOP THE BLOOD FLOW<br />\n<br />\nEXCHANGE PLEASANTRIES-- ASK HIM ABOUT WIFE AND FAMILY<br />\n<br />\nLET HIM GO AFTER 10 MINUTES<br />\n<br />\nIT HAS ALWAYS WORKED<br />\n<br />\nHE KNOWS --CAPTAIN COULD HAVE RUINED HIS HAPPINESS-- NAY --<b><span style=\"color: red;\">FUCKED HIS HOROSCOPE&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I NEVER ALLOWED A SAILORS FAMILY TO SUFFER ( SACKING ) IF I COULD SOLVE THE PROBLEM ON BOARD</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHEN I WOULD SIGN OFF AT THE END OF MY CONTRACT --HE WOULD COME AND TOUCH MY FEET<br />\n<br />\nIF HE WOULD SIGN OFF BEFORE -- HE USUALLY EXTENDED HIS CONTRACT<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE GAMES CAPTAIN PLAYED IS TOO SHOCKING EVEN TO NARRATE -- IT BOILS DOWN TO RESPECT.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nALLOWING A SAILOR TO SIT ON CAPTAINS BED AND HAVE A COLD COKE -- &nbsp;WELL WHAT WAS THAT ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br Captain,<br />\n<br />\nBelow is the reply that I have received from PMO however, it deliberately failed to acknowledge and address the real issues from the comment (copied and pasted from your blog) such as inclusion of social responsibility and minimum wage pay clauses etc. They have attached a NASSCOM circular to corroborate the facts, that, IT industry is indeed not facing mass layoffs and that they never fails to address the issues faced by an employee such as training and skill development.<br />\nGovernment is Whitewashing illegal layoffs and malpractises by these organizations by calling them as internal processes of a company and are quite normal.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nStatus as on 06 Jun 2017<br />\n<br />\nRegistration Number:PMOPG/E/2017/029****<br />\nName Of Complainant:Debdoot Sarkar<br />\nDate of Receipt:23 May 2017<br />\nReceived by:Prime Ministers Office<br />\nForwarded to:Ministry of Electronics &amp; Information Technology<br />\nContact Address:6, CGO Complex,Electronics Niketan,New Delhi110003<br />\nContact Number:24364720<br />\n<br />\nGrievance Description:I am a software engineer and below is a pressing issue which needs your immediate attention. Kindly acknowledge,<br />\nWE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW MULTINATIONAL COMPANIES AND INDIAN IT COMPANIES ( LIKE WIPRO / INFOSYS ) TO HIRE AND FIRE ASK ALL THESE COMPANIES TO INCLUDE A POLICY KNOWN AS \"SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY \" IF THEY WANT TO WORK IN INDIA IF THE EMPLOYEE IS NO GOOD--IT REFLECTS ON THEIR SELECTION PROCESS EMPLOYEES MUST BE TRAINED BY THE COMPANY TO KEEP PACE WITH RAPID CHANGES WE WATCH-- WE WNAT THIS TO HAPPEN IMMEDIATELY PM MODI--WORK FOR THE WATAN --NOT FOR ZIONIST JEWS WHO BRANDED YOU WITH APCO WE WILL NOT ALLOW WESTERN WORKPLACE CUSTOMS IN INDIA AT SEA I TOLD SAILORS--IF YOU DONT KNOW YOUR JOB TELL ME --I WILL TEACH YOU BE WARNED IT SOFTWARE ENGINEERS ARE PAID SO LESS IN INDIA THAT THE DRIVER OF THE MANAGERs CARS GET MORE SALARY MR MODI--WHY IS THIS HAPPENING ? ARE YOU IMPOTENT TO STOP THIS NONSENSE ?<br />\n<br />\nCurrent Status:CASE CLOSED<br />\nDate of Action:06 Jun 2017<br />\nDetails:National Association of Software and Services Companies (NASSCOM) recently through its PRESS Release, clarified that the reports of mass layoffs by IT companies in India are incorrect. In fact, the industry continues to be a net hirer with talent acquisition continuing across sectors. In FY 2017, the industry added 1,70,000 new jobs (600,000 in last 3 year) and today boasts of a total employee base of 3.9 mn (95-100k in start-ups and 50-60K in eCommerce). The sector remains one of the largest employers of the nation. Workforce realignment is common to any industry and is a part of the regular exercise of yearly performance appraisal processes which only impacts 0.5-3% of the overall IT talent pool. Layoffs are an internal process of companies, where they look at their priorities and align talent; this is a key competitive strategy and there is no modification to this practice in the current year.<br />\nAttachment:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;open<br />\n<br />\nThanks and Regards,<br />\nDebdoot Sarkar</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_252BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-16pBXxI2d2Q/WTDfjWdhx_I/AAAAAAABT9g/fE3ipW0cjIgDfMUjDXWVRrbqt63DK8IIACLcB/s1600/41fd0d53401a2EE928d88396992d978db3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"236\" data-original-width=\"236\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-16pBXxI2d2Q/WTDfjWdhx_I/AAAAAAABT9g/fE3ipW0cjIgDfMUjDXWVRrbqt63DK8IIACLcB/s400/41fd0d53401a2EE928d88396992d978db3.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sailors who have sailed\nunder my command will vouch \u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Captain never got\nangry .&nbsp; He used his own anger at will to\nboost his own performance. He would hang the sword of Damocles on top of the\nCaptain\u2019s chair even before he sat on it. &nbsp;He would kick the shore bosses beehive- as a\nFIRST THINGS FIRST personal policy.&nbsp; &nbsp;Captain never used his anger to manipulate\nothers-only on himself , so that he is never in his comfort zone. &nbsp;He deliberately caused his angry shore\nbosses to waiting in &nbsp;ambush from\nhim, &nbsp;to slip up and give them half a\nchance to screw him. &nbsp; Captain never got\nambushed or screwed . &nbsp; Captain would sneak up from behind and kick the ambush\nparty on their collective asses, on his own time table telling them <span style=\"background-color: white;\">\u201cTry harder\nyou fuckin\u2019 cunts !\u201c.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often my critics and my\nwell wishers ask me why I self inflict and keep the Sword of Damocles dangling\nall the time over me . I tell them \u2013 it is mE style.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is the secret--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecurity or the sword\nof Damocles is the chief propulsive power in this world. Some mavericks, like\nyou know who-- welcome a certain amount of frustration as a challenge\u2014it gives\nthem a kick to overcome it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Treat a quickened pulse\ncaused by adrenaline rush as an ally \u2013and not as an enemy. You have the power\nnow to convert fear into excitement, flight to fight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When people gun for\nthem it gives a chance to prove themselves . Tactical anger has more to do than\nwhat meets the eye. You can now do things you would not have done normally. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people need to\nfeel angry in order to create enough leverage on themselves to make a change.\nToo little stress may be as harmful as too much stress, especially when you\nwant to get a task done. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some stress or\nstimulation is needed for optimum performance\u2014this is termed positive stress\nresponse PSR. Optimum stimulation causes creativity and change. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Performance rises as\nstress increases. Once a optimum point is crossed however, increasing stress\nimpairs judgement and alertness and performance falls off. Too much stress\ncauses panic and feeling of inability to cope. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And in any case, I\nperform best in a hostile environment. I love to hit six sixes on to a hostile\ncrowd baying for my blood\u2014bleeding their mangy noses . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have NO use for\nchamchas or favours from my bosses.&nbsp; It\nwas a measure of supreme confidence in my own abilities .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is a natural,\nadaptive response to threats; it inspires powerful, often aggressive, feelings\nand behaviors, which allow us to fight and to defend ourselves when we are\nattacked. A certain amount of anger, therefore, is necessary to our survival.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Being assertive doesn't mean being pushy or demanding; it means being\nrespectful of yourself and others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can't get rid of,\nor avoid, the things or the people that enrage you, nor can you change them,\nbut you can learn to control your reactions.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to\njump to\u2014and act on\u2014conclusions, and some of those conclusions can be very\ninaccurate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9I4faYnf444/WS91W9UEMlI/AAAAAAABT7Q/bG7xXjHGoG8UONU938cd_RYZ2gbMpf9RQCLcB/s1600/doDWWwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"202\" data-original-width=\"250\" height=\"323\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9I4faYnf444/WS91W9UEMlI/AAAAAAABT7Q/bG7xXjHGoG8UONU938cd_RYZ2gbMpf9RQCLcB/s400/doDWWwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is an emotional\nresponse to a real or imagined threat or provocation. Anger can range in\nintensity from mild irritation to extreme rage. Anger is not necessarily a\n\u201cbad\u201d emotion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; which gets its input from mindless chess\nboard logic.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Her\nqueen sized ego confuses opinions with facts.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
