line-height: 150%;\">She is unable to distinguish between action and reaction any more .&nbsp; The nagging shrew must wax indignant, opening\npast baggage strewing the sordid things around \u2013 only to get the upper hand\n,and live in it , and never to draw healing lessons.&nbsp;&nbsp; She finds it necessary&nbsp; to re-open old healed wounds on her own time\ntable , all the while moaning aloud in persecution mode.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6xN75usC0A/WTBI3urg5fI/AAAAAAABT8I/SyF-9V9iqsMz6ABNZAHnZiXCSRbxf-QRACLcB/s1600/ieemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X6xN75usC0A/WTBI3urg5fI/AAAAAAABT8I/SyF-9V9iqsMz6ABNZAHnZiXCSRbxf-QRACLcB/s400/ieemages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She revels in high\nhanded domination and intimidation\u2014some times snide hints that she might commit\nsuicide if something is NOT done the way she wants and the minute she\nwants.&nbsp;&nbsp; The man knows that if he does\nnot acquiesce she will give him an overdose of indifference, apathy and lack of\nenthusiasm , as punishment.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will blow hot and\nthen blow cold- from high pitched yodeling and melodrama to sullen silence ,\nlike how dentists pries your teeth out with a to and fro movement. She is\naddicted to self pity and gets stuck in that moment. She burns all her energy\nin sustaining her falthu ego and then gets pooped.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She shifts goal posts\nwhenever she wants and rearranges blind spots and shadow sectors in her radar\nin a vulgar and mean manner. When she is in full NAG NAGflow, the things that\nmatter most are always at the mercy of things that matter the least.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harsh words by a woman\n(who has lost her moral compass) , to her beloved husband are like nails driven\ninto wood.&nbsp;&nbsp; She may later remove the\nnails, by way of making up \u2014 but these holes remain forever in the psyche.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many men yield when\nnagged, only because they know that yielding is a valuable skill to preserve\nsanity and for the larger interests of the children.&nbsp;&nbsp; He tries to brainwash himself that his wife\u2019s\nNAG NAG is the power of accurate and wise expression and NOT cynicism at its\nfuckin' best.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DiCNVFvTn2Q/WTBJMkqdIXI/AAAAAAABT8M/mSWXcvXr_UE0f3TrPPbcIoFiTgbov-flQCLcB/s1600/fe29e8ba72c096084bdda99cbbbfe9461e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"234\" data-original-width=\"236\" height=\"317\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DiCNVFvTn2Q/WTBJMkqdIXI/AAAAAAABT8M/mSWXcvXr_UE0f3TrPPbcIoFiTgbov-flQCLcB/s320/fe29e8ba72c096084bdda99cbbbfe9461e.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will NOT understand\nthat in a home ethos is shared, and the concept of scapegoating cannot exists ,\nif there has to be harmony.&nbsp;&nbsp; That a\nhouse must be run on trust and not control.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHow lomg can the poor husband romance the stress while on the receiving\nend hour after hour.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever needs to be\ndone had to be done sans all the endless drama , without trampling on the\ndignity of everybody else in the house. The nagging woman has taken a trick out\nof \"evangelist\" religion\u2014 to create a \"sense of guilt\", so\nthat she can milk the situation.&nbsp;&nbsp; She\nuses perfectionism to achieve this goal, and this perfectionism arises out of\nrepressed sexuality .&nbsp;&nbsp; Perfectionism is\nnothing but a deep ego trip.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FtMFt4nn0DU/WTBPEcFKleI/AAAAAAABT9M/UfEDo7bTVYwV2FnrYhkgH-Ad3oL2AyDKgCLcB/s1600/downWSload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"271\" data-original-width=\"186\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FtMFt4nn0DU/WTBPEcFKleI/AAAAAAABT9M/UfEDo7bTVYwV2FnrYhkgH-Ad3oL2AyDKgCLcB/s400/downWSload.jpg\" width=\"274\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will NOT allow her\nhusband\u2019s&nbsp; life its freedom.&nbsp;&nbsp; All her so called pain is all self chosen,\nas nagging is a vicious self defeating cycle..&nbsp;\nShe is literally shooting herself in the foot by this endless nagging, as\nthis will surely deny her the joys of a happy marriage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagging&nbsp; is so busy comfortable in finding fault with\nher husband , that she fails to see any good in him . Her husband is afraid to\nshow any love and affection, for fear of caustic rejection \u2013with a kick on the\nshin for good measure.&nbsp;&nbsp; After all this\nshe may say it was not her intent but it was a faulty delivery. But Madame MIM\n, delivery is what matters.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fDGlHtNDaC4/WTBJaUxruRI/AAAAAAABT8Q/4oaL6WEbT5YnX85fn2xvHjIXbLLIdbIkwCLcB/s1600/im77nages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"262\" data-original-width=\"192\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fDGlHtNDaC4/WTBJaUxruRI/AAAAAAABT8Q/4oaL6WEbT5YnX85fn2xvHjIXbLLIdbIkwCLcB/s400/im77nages.jpg\" width=\"293\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She fails to see\ninnocence in her husband\u2019s mistakes.&nbsp; Her\nfalthu sense of justice cannot be balanced with an iota of compassion.&nbsp; She would rather spin her wheels endlessly on\nenforcing compliance to her stupid rules . You see she is the queen bee and NO\nworker drone can challenge her \u201cinflicted \u201c status quo and activity traps.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She is unable to even\nlisten to a point of view without getting threatened and flowing out a flood of\ntears.&nbsp; The husband is at the receiving\nend of her selective perceptions and distorted and pea brained interpretations.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace and honour within the confined of the\nhome , has gone for a toss.&nbsp; The\nimpressionable children die a thousand times unable to digest all this.&nbsp;&nbsp; Even these small kids know that the mother\nis trying hard to win a bullsh#t battle at the expense of losing the war \u2014\nwhich means divorce.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ONLTe0q3wKs/WTBO3VQl2WI/AAAAAAABT9I/B3QDs-SajW48qdMedboqoG5dBLA9yEwiQCLcB/s1600/doRRRRwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ONLTe0q3wKs/WTBO3VQl2WI/AAAAAAABT9I/B3QDs-SajW48qdMedboqoG5dBLA9yEwiQCLcB/s400/doRRRRwnload.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her love for her\nhusband is limited because insane ego and selfishness is contained in it , and\nhence she wastes her energy in resentment.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHer unhappiness is an ego created mental cum emotional disease. The\nchatter of her ego continuously disrupts her natural state of well being.&nbsp; Her stress is all within her mind , not by\nexternal threat from her husband or children.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her queen sized ego\ncreates suffering without recognising it.&nbsp;\nShe lugs a huge&nbsp; amount of\nunnecessary baggage, both mental and emotional through out her married life.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z1jdYNdR2YE/WTBJ33T8AWI/AAAAAAABT8U/KNx1lMP92jQkKDNln7TvL1QwB-coZ0fJQCLcB/s1600/imag88es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"199\" data-original-width=\"253\" height=\"314\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z1jdYNdR2YE/WTBJ33T8AWI/AAAAAAABT8U/KNx1lMP92jQkKDNln7TvL1QwB-coZ0fJQCLcB/s400/imag88es.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She has to hang on\nto&nbsp; old emotions to strengthen her\nidentity and gain leverage and hence an upper hand. She will&nbsp; disagree with her husband in public&nbsp; just because he is the one who said it.&nbsp; Her fathu ego makes her take everything personally.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She deliberately\nmistakes a short memory for a clear conscience and hence is miserable within.\nHer overbearing ego must&nbsp; create rules\nfor rules\u2019 sake in the home; Her family will&nbsp;\nNOT even miss her if she goes on a 3 month vacation to the Himalayas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will brood\nendlessly on her petty grievances, and can never hold a vision that can lift\nher out of herself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-c9aykYRiMzo/WTBKPoi3TJI/AAAAAAABT8Y/BAIvfJh5kyMd7-Ok-1ohfF_Sos_UId3XQCLcB/s1600/d88ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"205\" data-original-width=\"246\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-c9aykYRiMzo/WTBKPoi3TJI/AAAAAAABT8Y/BAIvfJh5kyMd7-Ok-1ohfF_Sos_UId3XQCLcB/s400/d88ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She substitutes her\nthinking capabilities with&nbsp; loud cynical\nhollering capabilities.&nbsp; When she argues\nwith her husband she will act as if she is fighting for survival and there is a\nimminent need to win at all costs. OK, she wants a sense of order and\nsecurity\u2014but hey, how about giving a sense of freedom to other people in the\nhouse, who are NOT retards, as she thinks .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such is the self\ndelusion caused by female ego which&nbsp;\nthrives on reactivity.&nbsp; The danger\nzone is when she starts thinking that her so called&nbsp; accomplishments earns her the right to be\ncondescending, obnoxious and down right abusive.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PARADOX is that\nsuffering caused by the ego eventually destroys the ego\u2014she realizes that after\na couple of divorces, and when her children refuse to acknowledge her as their\nmother.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a man gets&nbsp; verbally castrated every hour at home,&nbsp; he cannot be happy.&nbsp;&nbsp; Nor can the children who love their dad.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nz_LVvDvFB0/WTBK1HtEe6I/AAAAAAABT8g/qJyXXSEeSRgjMYSzOc4JTn5Hwwm1zVpkQCLcB/s1600/i77mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"173\" data-original-width=\"291\" height=\"237\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nz_LVvDvFB0/WTBK1HtEe6I/AAAAAAABT8g/qJyXXSEeSRgjMYSzOc4JTn5Hwwm1zVpkQCLcB/s400/i77mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women who nag their children destroy what\nbalance fragile self-esteem they might have, When a nagging woman sees her 7\nyear old son enjoying a cone of icecream ,&nbsp;\nshe has to fast-forward to obesity and diabetes.&nbsp; She has never been in the moment-- the way\nthe Bhagawat Gita want us to be..</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what she has\nbecome -- a misanthrope monster !.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the husband would\nbe enjoying the sweet sight of his dear son slurping and drooling all over the\nicecream. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is it ever possible to\nnag someone into permanent change?&nbsp;\nHaving worked as a change manager myself, I can tell you, it is\nimpossible.&nbsp;&nbsp; Nagging can&nbsp; produce only a short-term result that looks\npositive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been a ship captain and leader of men for 30 years.&nbsp; Have I ever done any nagging like a woman as\na leader of men? \u2013 all this extravagant faultfinding,&nbsp; endless whining,&nbsp; biting criticism,&nbsp; cynical tongue lashing,&nbsp; hairsplitting,&nbsp; nit-picking,&nbsp;\npersistent pestering,&nbsp; phlegmy\nwheedling , relentless swiping and sniping --</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Vp9dntelGcU/WTBLCtTkpjI/AAAAAAABT8k/Ka448n4xnLEbr20yR88jC0cJEQkLBrNaACLcB/s1600/hormon66es-were-as-potent-as-whiskey-and-twice-as-sneaky-quote-1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"800\" data-original-width=\"620\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Vp9dntelGcU/WTBLCtTkpjI/AAAAAAABT8k/Ka448n4xnLEbr20yR88jC0cJEQkLBrNaACLcB/s400/hormon66es-were-as-potent-as-whiskey-and-twice-as-sneaky-quote-1.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging puts the\nvicious disrespectful woman is the parent role and her \"inadequate\"\nhusband ( at the receiving end ) in the child role.&nbsp; This tears the marital&nbsp; relationship&nbsp;\nasunder .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the nagging woman\navoids blame game phrases, \"You always...\" and \"You\nnever...\" , &nbsp;and switches to a more\nrespectful \"would you \" rather than \"could you \"\u2014 she could\nmake things happen.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tone matters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No self respecting man\nwill respond to sniping condescending retorts \u2013 for he does not deserve the\nindignity of an elaborate response.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nRather she has to find another way to deal with her personal\nfrustrations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DVG_ZgucwNE/WTBLTeX_3KI/AAAAAAABT8o/jKa_7ctUBU8byfALbiew6rxgBVw2XDKcACLcB/s1600/im88ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DVG_ZgucwNE/WTBLTeX_3KI/AAAAAAABT8o/jKa_7ctUBU8byfALbiew6rxgBVw2XDKcACLcB/s400/im88ages.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging gives the husband a feeling that he is being scolded by\nhis mother.&nbsp; He has grown out of this\npahse of life and he does NOT to go back there again\u2014for the rest of his married\nlife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He does NOT respond\nusually because probably it is an unpalatable truth thrown at him without tact\nand he knows that his answer will disappoint his wife or get her even more\npissed off.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon he will\nfight with his wife about her nagging rather than talking about the issue at\nthe root of the nagging\u2014which could be plain sexual repression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The husband at the\nreceiving end of severe nagging may look superficially to be cool , with a glazed\nlong distance stare-- but internally he is in knots with even his brain\nclenched.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the wife has to curb\nher nagging , first of all she has to accept that she is a nagger and stuck in\na rut or mud or whatever. The nagging shrew tries to dominate her husband\nsubconsciously,&nbsp; while trying to get a\npoint across \u2013rather she piggy backs on each point,&nbsp; to rub his nose on the ground.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NLuo3Z6RU-g/WTBLmK5jOWI/AAAAAAABT8s/h59iXzeHNu4fK0QHp7XjzaydyRJ1Ufb7gCLcB/s1600/i887mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"171\" data-original-width=\"295\" height=\"231\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NLuo3Z6RU-g/WTBLmK5jOWI/AAAAAAABT8s/h59iXzeHNu4fK0QHp7XjzaydyRJ1Ufb7gCLcB/s400/i887mages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychologists will tell\nyou that wives who nag are often saddled by a deep inferiority complex and are\ninsecure. Their nagging tries to camouflage this feeling of inadequacy-- it\nprovides an illusion of power and superiority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No marital relationship\nis that perfect ( leave out Capt Ajit Vadakayil ).&nbsp;&nbsp; At one time or another, one partner\nwill&nbsp; end up doing something that upsets\nor annoys the other. Every husband perceives nagging as a form of punishment by\na control freak.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A real man can take a\nblow, but harsh demeaning words linger for ever in his psyche. Only by\neliminating nagging can you eliminate negativity, resentment and hostility.\nOnly then can the your relationship&nbsp;\nblossom .&nbsp; Marriage has to be\nviewed as a compromise, in this context\u2014if you want to foster acceptance and a&nbsp; healthy relationship. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VWMPxnmKp0o/WTBLy0n4FGI/AAAAAAABT8w/HxQF4LjcUvAhd88mYYM0CQ_K6vpXmXORQCLcB/s1600/ima6sges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"191\" data-original-width=\"264\" height=\"289\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VWMPxnmKp0o/WTBLy0n4FGI/AAAAAAABT8w/HxQF4LjcUvAhd88mYYM0CQ_K6vpXmXORQCLcB/s400/ima6sges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember it is within\nyour control to turn this situation around for the sake of happiness and peace\nat home \u2014and for the benefit of your children who are in the cross fire or wind\ntunnel or whatever.&nbsp; All it requires is\nsome emotional integrity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Home is a place to\nde-stress, if you have some commonsense , you will know what I mean. No point\nin white knuckling your life at home.&nbsp;\nRemember it never hurts to ask politely rather than complain like a\nbitch.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A husband \u2013wife relationship is inter-dependence, with of course a fair\namount of independence. There is NO need to box each other in. Get rid of the\nnegative energy in the house.&nbsp; Focus on\nthe positive in the relationship and refuse to allow negativity into your\nrelationship space.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negativity in a\nmarriage is emotionally draining, and constant negativity and complaining on\nthe part of the wife may make the husband simply give up trying to be positive.\nWhatever is needed must be requested in a polite and respectful manner.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rXcDeBN10Zo/WTBMHML5MvI/AAAAAAABT80/_tWt1Q1vWF4EMBb1gnd3Gtyv93EfvKgAQCLcB/s1600/55017.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rXcDeBN10Zo/WTBMHML5MvI/AAAAAAABT80/_tWt1Q1vWF4EMBb1gnd3Gtyv93EfvKgAQCLcB/s400/55017.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the wife wants a heart to heart , first\nask if it is a good time to talk.&nbsp; Just\nsay what you want and then shut up\u2014don\u2019t go on and on.&nbsp;&nbsp; Shed your high and mighty attitude. Remember\nyour husband does NOT have the same priorities as you.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let him do certain\nthings on his own terms.&nbsp; Men love the\nfeeling involved in making his woman happy, and they become more giving and\nproactive in response to being appreciated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0KBWJbORjAI/WTBMcOhhKeI/AAAAAAABT84/c_pEjpWWKFAC9fnE62zm6PblLrf_ocGcACLcB/s1600/ima88ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"215\" data-original-width=\"235\" height=\"365\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0KBWJbORjAI/WTBMcOhhKeI/AAAAAAABT84/c_pEjpWWKFAC9fnE62zm6PblLrf_ocGcACLcB/s400/ima88ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman may perceive\nthat thinking aloud as being a good thing at home. When you are a certified nag\n, even this is construed as nagging.&nbsp; The\npoor guy will think that by thinking aloud his wife is giving him a list of\nproblems that she expects him to fix,&nbsp;\nand will get stressed out.&nbsp;\nIt&nbsp; is better NOT to do that.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same\nway, It has been shown medically that during a woman's ovulation and\nmenstruation, particular hormones are being released and these hormones have\nsome irritable effect on the woman, which for some can be translated as\nnagging.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zYtfVaUu3os/WTBMstbUWYI/AAAAAAABT88/wXjXdkJSFv8EFMp-SgrNQfkN20s2RIy7wCLcB/s1600/177341970207255_6816244.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"294\" data-original-width=\"420\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-zYtfVaUu3os/WTBMstbUWYI/AAAAAAABT88/wXjXdkJSFv8EFMp-SgrNQfkN20s2RIy7wCLcB/s400/177341970207255_6816244.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pressure cooker is\noften used as a metaphor for anger, where anger builds up inside a person like\nsteam inside a pressure cooker. Using this analogy, there are three ways to\ndeal with the buildup of steam. One way is to keep the pressure inside the\ncooker until it explodes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A second way is reduce\nthe pressure by periodically siphoning off some of the steam, as described\nusing common terms such as \u201cventing\u201d and \u201cblowing off steam.\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third (and best)\nway is to lower the flame and reduce the heat! Rather than stuff anger inside\nor expressing it outwardly, get rid of it. Stuffing anger harms the self.\nExpressing anger harms the self and others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">When angry count from\n20 to 1 backwards. &nbsp;&nbsp;Take a slow deep breath ( diaphragmatic ) and\nexhale even slower. &nbsp;If cold water is near\nyou drink a glass.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ASK YOURSELF A QUESTION --- &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">\" WILL THIS ISSUE MATTER 6 MONTHS FROM NOW?\"</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Re-framing anger can\nhelp. &nbsp; &nbsp;Because people don\u2019t get angry at what they don\u2019t care about, all anger\nis a statement of caring.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logic defeats anger,\nbecause anger, even when it's justified, can quickly become irrational. So use\ncold hard logic on yourself.&nbsp; Remind\nyourself that the world is \"not out to get you,\" you're just\nexperiencing some of the rough spots of daily life.&nbsp; Do this each time you feel anger getting the\nbest of you, and it'll help you get a more balanced perspective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS\nBUILT PALACES WITH BRICKS HIS DETRACTORS HAVE THROWN AT HIM.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7yL1hrwwCwM/WTDei9NV26I/AAAAAAABT9c/yX0DvjNRuSMx19EfhN4MMhKjlBq0sV6vwCLcB/s1600/iDDmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"218\" data-original-width=\"233\" height=\"372\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7yL1hrwwCwM/WTDei9NV26I/AAAAAAABT9c/yX0DvjNRuSMx19EfhN4MMhKjlBq0sV6vwCLcB/s400/iDDmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga and meditation relieves\nstress, lowers blood pressure, and releases powerful endorphins that improve your\nmood. Connect regularly with friends and family.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is nothing more calming\nto your nervous system than communicating face to face with people who care\nabout you. Your friends don\u2019t have to be able to fix your stress; they just\nneed to be good listeners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Roll your shoulders if\nyou are tensing them Focus on the counting backwards , to let your rational\nmind catch up with your feelings. &nbsp;If you\nstill feel out of control by the time you reach from 20 to 1, start counting\nagain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Knowing\nhow to turn a bad situation into a good one can make the difference between\nsuccess and failure, or happiness and unhappiness. If you perceive any negative\nsituation in beneficial ways you'll feel more confident in dealing with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing\na bad situation will give you the power to overcome anger while boosting your morale- t</span><span style=\"font-family: cambria, serif; font-size: 14pt;\">his will assist you to find the silver lining in every cloud.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing is all about taking a negative situation and turning it around to make it positive. &nbsp; &nbsp;Reframing let's you uncover the\nhidden positive aspects of a dark situation and &nbsp;control over a difficult situation... &nbsp;this helps you to overcome anger&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing\nwon't make a bad situation go away, but it will help you to survive a bad event&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each\nproblem is a hidden opportunity to reframe a situation &nbsp;. &nbsp;By solving one\nproblem at a time, you'll gain confidence&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing\nunfortunate circumstances will give you a sense of accomplishment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nIS A RECORD IN MY LIFE .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHENEVER ANY\nMISFORTUNE HAPPENED TO ME, MY NEXT THOUGH WAS, WHAT AM I GAINING FROM\nTHIS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 200%;\">THERE\nIS GREAT POWER IN TRUTH&nbsp; IT CAN BE HIDDEN\nONLY FOR A WHILE , LIKE THE CLOUD COVERING THE BRILLIANT SUN.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; THIS BLOGSITE DOES NOT CARE FOR POLITICAL\nCORRECTNESS .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZAV1fbvLvVQ/WTFbtmjKgOI/AAAAAAABT-w/nEqF_NWhDfwgzynmJ37N3HQ7KP6o40qbgCLcB/s1600/imdages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"212\" data-original-width=\"238\" height=\"356\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZAV1fbvLvVQ/WTFbtmjKgOI/AAAAAAABT-w/nEqF_NWhDfwgzynmJ37N3HQ7KP6o40qbgCLcB/s400/imdages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Find\nthe good in a bad event and turn it to your advantage by strategically\nreframing it along more hopeful lines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing\ninvolves identifying our unhelpful thoughts and replacing them with more\npositive or adaptive ones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A\nlimiting belief is a thought that prevents you from accepting your full\npotential.. When you counter a limiting belief by reframing thoughts based on\nthem, you weaken the belief and reduce the chance of it getting in the way of\nyour goals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That\ninner voice of yours that expresses negativity is only doing so because it\nwants to help you in some way. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\nfinding the positive intentions behind your thoughts, you can work with your\nmind to find a positive reframe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ask\nyourself: \u201cWhat can I learn from this?\u201d Now, instead of having a problem, you\nhave a way to improve yourself. Every challenge is also an opportunity to\nlearn, so take advantage of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;\u201c See we are not retreating\u2026we\u2019re just advancing in\na different direction!\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; When the\nwhite invader got fucked he would beat the retreat with band and baaja.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consistently\napplied, you will find yourself instinctively thinking positively in situations\nthat you had previously had horrible thoughts of.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many\nof the negative thought patterns you probably experience involve a cognitive\ndistortion, or your mind putting \u201cspin\u201d on the events that happen to you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reframing\ninvolves changing your perspective on a given situation to give it a more\npositive or beneficial meaning to you. Look at it from another perspective and\nangle.. I have seen people looking totally devastated when they lose their job.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Look at it another way\u2014a better one is waiting for you just around the\ncorner\u2014go for it !<span style=\"background: yellow; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">HAVE THE GAAND MEIN TATTI TO FIGHT BACK ,&nbsp; WHEN YOU ARE UP SHIT CREEK WITHOUT A PADDLE .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I DARE ANY SHIP CAPTAIN ON THIS PLANET TO DECLARE A WHITE\nMANs LAB&nbsp; ( NO 1 LAB ON THIS PLANET ) &nbsp;INCOMPETENT , USING &nbsp;WHITE P&amp; I LAWYERS </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; mso-highlight: yellow;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is the emotional\nopposite of guilt, which is activated when an individual perceives themselves\nas hurting an important other, which in turn leads to feelings of culpability\nand self-sacrifice<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_IdekgIVhJ0/WTEQVHZRjvI/AAAAAAABT9w/T2qOztoN4ZoILU-x9mimH-I0HvJ1Ye77ACLcB/s1600/irmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_IdekgIVhJ0/WTEQVHZRjvI/AAAAAAABT9w/T2qOztoN4ZoILU-x9mimH-I0HvJ1Ye77ACLcB/s640/irmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remind yourself that\nthe world is not after your ass-- you're just experiencing some of the rough\nspots of daily life.&nbsp; Every body has his\nown problems.&nbsp; &nbsp;Remind yourself each time you feel anger\ngetting the best of you, and it'll help you get a more balanced perspective. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to\ndemand things: fairness, appreciation, agreement, willingness to do things\ntheir way. Everyone wants these things, and we are all hurt and disappointed\nwhen we don't get them, but angry people demand them, and when their demands aren't\nmet, their disappointment becomes anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-72NYaL4digY/WTERCCfvTdI/AAAAAAABT90/rhPP8GeVGG0dn0W-KiqVvXKSo9ABspN8ACLcB/s1600/d0Pownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"232\" data-original-width=\"217\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-72NYaL4digY/WTERCCfvTdI/AAAAAAABT90/rhPP8GeVGG0dn0W-KiqVvXKSo9ABspN8ACLcB/s400/d0Pownload.jpg\" width=\"374\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to\njump to\u2014and act on\u2014conclusions, and some of those conclusions can be very\ninaccurate..&nbsp; Angry people make\nassumptions based on scanty information..&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UopnHHuwu6A/WTET510XybI/AAAAAAABT98/cNM5CHrZB5osHLRfCPp23cM8YL49d9PIACLcB/s1600/dowswnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"214\" data-original-width=\"235\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UopnHHuwu6A/WTET510XybI/AAAAAAABT98/cNM5CHrZB5osHLRfCPp23cM8YL49d9PIACLcB/s400/dowswnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't say the first thing that\ncomes into your head, but slow down and think carefully about what you want to\nsay. At the same time, listen carefully to what the other person is saying and\ntake your time before answering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8ceiaP4orUs/WTETp4qkcCI/AAAAAAABT94/1Y3QcydNxZAm74mv2KjENcg_TUHRWxGswCLcB/s1600/downloeead.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"271\" data-original-width=\"186\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-8ceiaP4orUs/WTETp4qkcCI/AAAAAAABT94/1Y3QcydNxZAm74mv2KjENcg_TUHRWxGswCLcB/s1600/downloeead.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is often regarded\nas negative; we're taught that it's all right to express anxiety, depression,\nor other emotions but not to express anger. As a result, we don't learn how to\nhandle it or channel it constructively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's best to find out\nwhat it is that triggers your anger, and then to develop strategies to keep\nthose triggers from tipping you over the edge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are easily\nangered generally have&nbsp; a low tolerance\nfor frustration.. It's natural to get defensive when you're criticized,.\nKeeping your cool can keep the situation from becoming a disastrous one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to\nfeel that they are morally right, that any blocking or changing of their plans\nis an unbearable indignity and that they should NOT have to suffer this way.\nMaybe other people do, but not them!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1YPA8T6cpik/WTFTqS2DslI/AAAAAAABT-I/CEee_Zv_fbMuOCKZm_rKx9o35zSmPbd8QCLcB/s1600/ssw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"139\" data-original-width=\"232\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1YPA8T6cpik/WTFTqS2DslI/AAAAAAABT-I/CEee_Zv_fbMuOCKZm_rKx9o35zSmPbd8QCLcB/s400/ssw.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people tend to\ncurse, swear, or speak in highly colorful terms that reflect their inner\nthoughts. When you're angry, your thinking can get very exaggerated and overly\ndramatic.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remind yourself that\ngetting angry is not going to fix anything, that it won't make you feel better -and\nmay actually make you feel worse.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Problems and\nresponsibilities can weigh on you and make you feel angry at the\n\"trap\" you seem to have fallen into and all the people and things\nthat form that trap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Very few of us have any\ndifficulty recognizing that crying conveys hurt. But far fewer of us realize\nthat getting mad\u2014as a reaction to some perceived threat, insult, or\ninjustice\u2014is a desperate attempt to cover up that hurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XDwKS6ZbbA0/WTFUCRm_nZI/AAAAAAABT-M/dR2GlwkrlrYDJsTsyX-Zdc4j8A3yzuudgCLcB/s1600/imRDges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"235\" data-original-width=\"215\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XDwKS6ZbbA0/WTFUCRm_nZI/AAAAAAABT-M/dR2GlwkrlrYDJsTsyX-Zdc4j8A3yzuudgCLcB/s400/imRDges.jpg\" width=\"365\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people seem to\nact first, and think later. Angry people often spout off hurtful comments to\nloved ones that they cannot later retract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are three\npossible approaches to deal with anger: (1) lump it (2) express it, and (3) get\nrid of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One standard approach\nto deal with anger is to hide it. This approach is endorsed by most societies.\nThis approach can prompt people to stuff their anger deep inside and repress\nit.&nbsp;&nbsp; This bottling stuffing anger inside\ncan have negative health consequences, such as increasing the risk of illnesses\nsuch as heart disease. On the other hand, if people try to hide their anger,\nsome anger might be diminished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second approach to\ndeal with anger is to express it.. Catharsis theory fits in this second\napproach because it holds that expressing anger produces a healthy release of\nemotion and is therefore good for the psyche. Catharsis theory, which can be\ntraced back through Sigmund Freud which is bullshit.&nbsp; Venting harms the self and others. However,\nexpressing anger has another drawback\u2014it increases aggression against others.&nbsp; One variation of venting is intense physical\nexercise. To use another analogy, venting anger is like using gasoline to put\nout a fire: It just feeds the flame. Venting keeps arousal levels high and\nkeeps aggressive thoughts and angry feelings alive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UhYwEqsA9aU/WTFbhYXultI/AAAAAAABT-s/7yCCu8Ku3S4Yef4fUNMl0uizKMsab64cACLcB/s1600/imarges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"234\" data-original-width=\"216\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UhYwEqsA9aU/WTFbhYXultI/AAAAAAABT-s/7yCCu8Ku3S4Yef4fUNMl0uizKMsab64cACLcB/s400/imarges.jpg\" width=\"369\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The third approach to\ndeal with anger is to try to get rid of it.. The key thing is to stop feeling\nangry. All emotions, including anger, consist of bodily states (such as\nphysiological arousal) and mental meanings. To get rid of anger, you can work\non either of those. Anger can be reduced by getting rid of the arousal state,\nsuch as by relaxing (e.g.,&nbsp; slow\ndiaphragmatic breathing with slower exhale ) Mental tactics can also reduce\nanger, such as by reframing the problem or conflict.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1YaZmSbabPw/WTGVG6HQz4I/AAAAAAABUAQ/qaGQgLe4Tdwr-mSV0C1HNTnTtaCoXc9egCLcB/s1600/images4NDE.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-1YaZmSbabPw/WTGVG6HQz4I/AAAAAAABUAQ/qaGQgLe4Tdwr-mSV0C1HNTnTtaCoXc9egCLcB/s400/images4NDE.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, rather than\nbeing angered by a friend\u2019s rude comment, one might reinterpret the comment as\na sign of the friend\u2019s exhaustion or having a bad day , rather than as a\nvicious personal attack. Distracting oneself and turning one\u2019s attention to\nother, more pleasant topics, also works because angry people tend to ruminate\nabout what made them angry. For example, petting a puppy, watching a comedy,or\nperforming a good deed can help, because those acts are incompatible with anger\nand therefore they make the angry state impossible to sustain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a61Jj5ISdPc/WTFV6NJTytI/AAAAAAABT-U/l8Js0vEj7cAwZv2Yq9M9FVR-wLUd2jHQwCLcB/s1600/imVV88ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"247\" data-original-width=\"204\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a61Jj5ISdPc/WTFV6NJTytI/AAAAAAABT-U/l8Js0vEj7cAwZv2Yq9M9FVR-wLUd2jHQwCLcB/s400/imVV88ages.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger patrols our\nwellbeing for violations: &nbsp;\u201cThat feels\nwrong!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cThat shouldn\u2019t have happened!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cThat hurts!\u201d \u201cThat\u2019s not fair!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cThis is not what I expected!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cI feel mistreated!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cThis is not what I deserve!\u201d &nbsp;\u201cThat ungrateful bitch has chewed my balls \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotional intelligence\nhas three major elements: perceiving, understanding, and regulating\nemotions.&nbsp; Perceiving emotions is your\nability to recognize different feelings. When looking at someone\u2019s face, do you\nknow the difference between joy and contentment, anxiety and sadness, or\nsurprise and contempt?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EfsUl0Z6lTg/WTFY8Ox948I/AAAAAAABT-g/w4Dv9oz61KUBuofldgzA-9hzUi8AYuEwgCLcB/s1600/im2Xages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"301\" data-original-width=\"167\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EfsUl0Z6lTg/WTFY8Ox948I/AAAAAAABT-g/w4Dv9oz61KUBuofldgzA-9hzUi8AYuEwgCLcB/s400/im2Xages.jpg\" width=\"221\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Understanding\nemotions is how well you identify the causes and consequences of different\nfeelings. For example, can you figure out what will make your colleagues\nfrustrated versus angry? Frustration occurs when people are blocked from\nachieving a goal; anger is a response to being mistreated or wronged.\nRegulating emotions is your effectiveness in managing what you and others feel.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recognize the emotion.\nIs it disgust? Probably not\u2014that\u2019s usually reserved for gross foods, sights,\nand smells. Is it hostility? &nbsp;More\nlikely: hostility is anger directed toward other people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Regulate the emotion.\nMaybe this isn\u2019t as terrible as it seems&nbsp;\n.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER A YEAR THIS IRRITANT WOULD\nNOT MATTER AT ALL IN YOUR LIFE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P2sRiANC2sA/WTFY0aP5x2I/AAAAAAABT-c/C_GWMMBTQvQHKwvdYaxCHgPjdRxyFGN3ACLcB/s1600/dWRownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-P2sRiANC2sA/WTFY0aP5x2I/AAAAAAABT-c/C_GWMMBTQvQHKwvdYaxCHgPjdRxyFGN3ACLcB/s400/dWRownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aggression is what\nneeds to be managed, not feelings of anger.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perceptual trigger\nfor angry feelings is that one\u2019s rights and interests were violated, which in\nturn activates a desire to restore equilibrium, either by asserting one\u2019s\nposition or extracting a cost on another by inflicting some form of punishment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is a normal and\neven healthy emotion \u2014 but it's important to deal with it in a positive way.\nUncontrolled anger can take a toll on both your health and your relationships.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UDo_QzB_cb8/WTFbS6iuycI/AAAAAAABT-o/EML8i-AqKxEjDLulMb_q2iQxtSD3c87tACLcB/s1600/vcdownload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"181\" data-original-width=\"279\" height=\"259\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UDo_QzB_cb8/WTFbS6iuycI/AAAAAAABT-o/EML8i-AqKxEjDLulMb_q2iQxtSD3c87tACLcB/s400/vcdownload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid criticizing or\nplacing blame \u2014 which might only increase tension \u2014 use \"I\"\nstatements to describe the problem.&nbsp;&nbsp; Be\nrespectful and specific. There are faces you need to see daily till you die or\nhe dies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At sea, I was free of this. After a 4 month contract probably I would\nnever see that face again. I did NOT need to be a hypocrite&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if you can forgive\nsomeone who angered you, you might both learn from the situation and strengthen\nyour relationship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R3A_nISn6uo/WTFbARMU28I/AAAAAAABT-k/wdjqFL31PDEbARv3c7EMfHD8pYo5gEdRwCLcB/s1600/dowwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"185\" data-original-width=\"272\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R3A_nISn6uo/WTFbARMU28I/AAAAAAABT-k/wdjqFL31PDEbARv3c7EMfHD8pYo5gEdRwCLcB/s400/dowwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger is a completely\nnormal, usually healthy, human emotion. But when it gets out of control and\nturns destructive, it can lead to problems\u2014problems at work, in your personal\nrelationships, and in the overall quality of your life. When you are at the mercy\nof an unpredictable and powerful emotion, this is when it gets dangerous .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unexpressed anger can\ncreate problems. It can lead to pathological expressions of anger, such as\npassive-aggressive behavior (getting back at people indirectly, without telling\nthem why, rather than confronting them head-on) or a personality that seems\nperpetually cynical and hostile.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People who are constantly putting others down,\ncriticizing everything, and making cynical comments haven't learned how to\nconstructively express their anger.
