Not surprisingly, they aren't likely to have\nmany successful relationships.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mi3KzvEaNBo/WTF-ehfF5BI/AAAAAAABT_M/f0LtSKt0bOcnjzbNz3OePE_owCKUUx6hgCLcB/s1600/Iimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mi3KzvEaNBo/WTF-ehfF5BI/AAAAAAABT_M/f0LtSKt0bOcnjzbNz3OePE_owCKUUx6hgCLcB/s400/Iimages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger like other emotions,\nit is accompanied by physiological and biological changes; when you get angry,\nyour heart rate and blood pressure go up, as do the levels of your energy\nhormones, adrenaline, and noradrenaline. Anger turned inward may cause\nhypertension, high blood pressure, or depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger fuels the body\u2019s\n\u201cfight or flight\u201d response so while you might feel that you just explode\nwithout warning, there are physical warning signs that your body is preparing\nto react. Recognizing these signs allows you to take steps to manage your anger\nbefore it boils over.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tK2qEtQtoZo/WTF9-P1E7sI/AAAAAAABT_I/-u6fz-ia7SwAFZy9mM9EdPqlH9nCcCxVgCLcB/s1600/i88mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-tK2qEtQtoZo/WTF9-P1E7sI/AAAAAAABT_I/-u6fz-ia7SwAFZy9mM9EdPqlH9nCcCxVgCLcB/s400/i88mages.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note how anger feels in\nyour body. Is your stomach knotted, your hands or jaw clenched, your muscles\ntense? Do you feel clammy or flushed? Is your heart pounding or are you\nbreathing faster?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recognize situations\nthat trigger anger. Stressful events don\u2019t excuse anger, but understanding how\nthese events affect you can help you avoid unnecessary aggravation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger, is a common clinical\npresentation that features across an array of different mental health problems,\nsuch as depression, anxiety, post-traumatic stress disorder, substance use\ndisorders and many more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we sense danger,\nthere is an intuitive response of \u201cfight or flight.\u201d If we are afraid, then we\nwant to take flight or flee the potential confrontation that is in front of us.\nIf we are angry, then we want to get ready to defend or fight. These emotions\nare primal in nature and help guarantee our survival.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b5sid8KNnqY/WTF9mFXzuWI/AAAAAAABT_E/hFOYknxgTM8SRAg4GBh_d9XIABueglhEQCLcB/s1600/imSages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b5sid8KNnqY/WTF9mFXzuWI/AAAAAAABT_E/hFOYknxgTM8SRAg4GBh_d9XIABueglhEQCLcB/s400/imSages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two\nalmond-shaped structures (amygdala) in our brains that are responsible to\nrecognize danger and sound the alarm to your system. When danger is near, your\ncentral nervous system releases its physiological floodgates. This can often\nhappen before the thinking part of your brain (prefrontal cortex) is even aware\nof the danger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you become angry,\nthere are neurotransmitters (catecholamines) in your brain that release and\ncause a bolt of energy for about five to ten minutes. Your heart beats faster;\nyour blood pressure rises, and your arms and legs get extra blood flow.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IeDTucMHTCY/WTGU-sB3z_I/AAAAAAABUAM/8jvcJx_-coQMJhh-D3QFxK6fmlmMW_4cwCLcB/s1600/imageTSSs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"201\" data-original-width=\"251\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IeDTucMHTCY/WTGU-sB3z_I/AAAAAAABUAM/8jvcJx_-coQMJhh-D3QFxK6fmlmMW_4cwCLcB/s400/imageTSSs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You get\na rush of adrenaline, norepinephrine, and cortisol and enter an altered state\nof consciousness, ready to \u201cfight.\u201d You might even stop thinking\n(rationalizing). That is why you might not recall what you said or did when you\nwere extremely angry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Women often misdirect\ntheir anger toward a \u201csafe\u201d target (such as a spouse or child) instead of the\nprimary source. Guilty feelings in women are often traced to misdirected anger.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">A unfaithful wife will hit her own child if he comes in between her and her\nclandestine lover at the moment her twat is lubricated and her nipples get\nerect<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_uwLQpOROFk/WTF9Xy7ecUI/AAAAAAABT_A/JdATxz3y9ssJVW6NzSbY3BozBtkODgcBQCLcB/s1600/imWWages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_uwLQpOROFk/WTF9Xy7ecUI/AAAAAAABT_A/JdATxz3y9ssJVW6NzSbY3BozBtkODgcBQCLcB/s400/imWWages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we get angry, the\nheart rate, arterial tension and testosterone production increases, cortisol\n(the stress hormone) decreases, and the left hemisphere of the brain becomes\nmore stimulated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression and anger\nare influenced by an imbalance of hormones. This is a primary reason why women\nwho are perimenopausal or menopausal, might have emotions of both depression\nand anger during this time of change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mood swings and\nirritability are two symptoms of fluctuations in hormone levels and occur\nduring pregnancy, PMS, perimenopause and/or menopause. In your body, the\nemotion of anger creates pro-inflammatory molecules. Estrogen has some\nanti-inflammatory qualities, and progesterone has a calming effect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nexplains why women might find themselves angrier when their\nprogesterone-to-estrogen ratios become erratic during perimenopause. Some women\nexperience cortisol dominance or testosterone imbalance and this contributes to\nanxiety and hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O-z2Zs3W1xk/WTGU3ubcwoI/AAAAAAABUAI/b-GrA9BEr-QQVpzgTXUmPKtDiZ9GACvaQCLcB/s1600/imageW33s.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-O-z2Zs3W1xk/WTGU3ubcwoI/AAAAAAABUAI/b-GrA9BEr-QQVpzgTXUmPKtDiZ9GACvaQCLcB/s400/imageW33s.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotions more or less\nbegin inside two almond-shaped structures in our brains which are called the\namygdala. The amygdala is the part of the brain responsible for identifying\nthreats to our well-being, and for sending out an alarm when threats are\nidentified that results in us taking steps to protect ourselves.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amygdala\nis so efficient at warning us about threats, that it gets us reacting before\nthe cortex (the part of the brain responsible for thought and judgment) is able\nto check on the reasonableness of our reaction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In other words, our brains are\nwired in such a way as to influence us to act before we can properly consider\nthe consequences of our actions. This is not an excuse for behaving badly -\npeople can and do control their aggressive impulses and you can too with some\npractice. An amgdala hijacking can feel like panic<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During an overriding\nevent, the amygdala goes into action without much regard for the consequences\n(since this area of the brain is not involved in judging, thinking,&nbsp; or evaluating). This reactive incident has\ncome to be known as an amygdala hijacking.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I1Kg2rSjr2s/WTGUwmRuGhI/AAAAAAABUAE/P62jzzmEvDIgGoEYL0lZgDuIZ-vICi--QCLcB/s1600/imagXXNNLes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"229\" data-original-width=\"220\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-I1Kg2rSjr2s/WTGUwmRuGhI/AAAAAAABUAE/P62jzzmEvDIgGoEYL0lZgDuIZ-vICi--QCLcB/s400/imagXXNNLes.jpg\" width=\"384\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the amygdala is\nhijacked, a flood of hormones are released that cause physical and emotional\nalarm.&nbsp; A surge of energy follows,\npreparing the person for the fight or flight response.&nbsp; The impact of this hormonal flush last for\nseveral minutes during which time the person is usually out of control and may\nsay or do things he or she will later regret, when the thinking part of the\nbrain reengages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As you become angry\nyour body's muscles tense up. Inside your brain, neurotransmitter chemicals\nknown as catecholamines are released causing you to experience a burst of\nenergy lasting up to several minutes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This burst of energy is behind the common\nangry desire to take immediate protective action. At the same time your heart\nrate accelerates, your blood pressure rises, and your rate of breathing\nincreases. Your face may flush as increased blood flow enters your limbs and\nextremities in preparation for physical action.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-weBlkc1Q-NM/WTGUqJlBv4I/AAAAAAABUAA/Or2UydPPSaIUOn67t53IfnD7RatZKPDIACLcB/s1600/imaV66ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-weBlkc1Q-NM/WTGUqJlBv4I/AAAAAAABUAA/Or2UydPPSaIUOn67t53IfnD7RatZKPDIACLcB/s400/imaV66ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your attention narrows and\nbecomes locked onto the target of your anger. Soon you can pay attention to\nnothing else. In quick succession, additional brain neurotransmitters and\nhormones (among them adrenaline and noradrenaline) are released which trigger a\nlasting state of arousal. You're now ready to fight.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although it is possible\nfor your emotions to rage out of control, the prefrontal cortex of your brain,\nwhich is located just behind your forehead, can keep your emotions in\nproportion. If the amygdala handles emotion, the prefrontal cortex handles\njudgment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The left prefrontal cortex can switch off your emotions. It serves in\nan executive role to keep things under control. Getting control over your anger\nmeans learning ways to help your prefrontal cortex get the upper hand over your\namygdala so that you have control over how you react to anger feelings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among\nthe many ways to make this happen are relaxation techniques (which reduce your\narousal and decrease your amygdala activity) and the use of cognitive control\ntechniques which help you practice using your judgment to override your\nemotional reactions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SrGoWn_VnhE/WTGUi7PB4uI/AAAAAAABT_8/uZeDedgAwHQ6TaNLwxqThBDLNW82rbtZwCLcB/s1600/imawages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SrGoWn_VnhE/WTGUi7PB4uI/AAAAAAABT_8/uZeDedgAwHQ6TaNLwxqThBDLNW82rbtZwCLcB/s400/imawages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It is difficult to relax from an angry state,\nhowever. The adrenaline-caused arousal that occurs during anger lasts a very\nlong time (many hours, sometimes days), and lowers our anger threshold, making\nit easier for us to get angry again later on.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though we do calm down, it takes\na very long time for us to return to our resting state. During this slow\ncool-down period we are more likely to get very angry in response to minor\nirritations that normally would not bother us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hormones are type of\nchemical messengers that are responsible in regulating normal functions of the\nvarious tissues and organs inside the body. They travel through the bloodstream\ncarrying sensory messages to the brain which gives out the command for organs\nto perform their daily function; thus, affecting the metabolism, growth and\nbody development, sexual functions, as well as mood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, hormones need\nto be at a proper balance to maintain its functions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans are comprised of\na wide variety of hormones in the body which are mainly produced by a\nspecialized group of cells known as Endocrine glands. However, there are some\nspecific hormones that greatly affect human emotions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3FgRnOnGqQs/WTGUb1NsrYI/AAAAAAABT_4/J-SY47-aYtM-VQHDG0tJCtnzcCEdr_hTACLcB/s1600/imffages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"299\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3FgRnOnGqQs/WTGUb1NsrYI/AAAAAAABT_4/J-SY47-aYtM-VQHDG0tJCtnzcCEdr_hTACLcB/s400/imffages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These hormones include\nEstrogen, Progesterone, Testosterone, Norepinephrine and Epinephrine,\nSerotonin, GABA, Dopamine, Acetylcholine, and Oxytocin.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen is the primary\nsex hormone of women that is produced by the ovaries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progesterone is another\nhormone which serves as a key element to reproductive success in women. This\nhowever, has greater influence to brain while its effect to emotion depends on\nits balance with estrogen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Norepinephrine is\nanother type of hormone that greatly affects emotion. Also known as\nnoradrenalin, this type of hormone functions like adrenaline which surge at\ntimes of panic and emergency.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a\nperson is at jeopardy, this hormone works to provoke the stress hormone and\ncause the blood pressure to rise while leaving the body with high temperature,\nspeedy metabolism, and faster heart rate which makes the person more alert and\nfocused.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EG2hMwXoWbU/WTGUUHPBkSI/AAAAAAABT_0/DveZxR5OigkZ5Coc6i3uUBlougXkaSj4gCLcB/s1600/imHYages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EG2hMwXoWbU/WTGUUHPBkSI/AAAAAAABT_0/DveZxR5OigkZ5Coc6i3uUBlougXkaSj4gCLcB/s400/imHYages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, Epinephrine\nis another type of adrenaline which also brings out the arousal of extreme\nemotions such as fear, anger, or amusement in reaction with the different\ninstances a person is involved in. People commonly call emotions that are\nrelated to such as \u201cadrenaline rush.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In case when there is low serotonin level, a\nperson may become aggressive and impulsive and will have difficulty in coping\nup strong emotions such as depression and sensitivity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low levels of such can\ncause mood swings and cognitive problems. In this case, a person may feel\ndepressed and worried.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acetylcholine is a type\nof hormone that tempers more severe effects of adrenaline to humans. In this\ncase, when a person is angry, Acetylcholine weakens the heart and stiffens\narteries which trigger one to feel various other emotions such as depression\nand anxiety which then leads one to suddenly burst out into tears..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-49CQgP4Rrdw/WTGUOhxdlnI/AAAAAAABT_w/67xkSUArYV8CXUFw2eiSl0khc3dHjtz0ACLcB/s1600/imMERRages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"174\" data-original-width=\"290\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-49CQgP4Rrdw/WTGUOhxdlnI/AAAAAAABT_w/67xkSUArYV8CXUFw2eiSl0khc3dHjtz0ACLcB/s400/imMERRages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If Anxiety,\nIrritability or Anger has taken over your personality, you\u2019re not alone.&nbsp; Many women with hormone imbalances experience\nthese feelings.&nbsp; When Estrogen levels\ndrop, or wildly fluctuate, the diameter of a woman\u2019s blood vessels can change\nand that can result in the feeling of anxiety.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When experiencing decreased levels of Progesterone, irritability often\narises. Likewise, when a woman has Testosterone deficiency, anxiety is often\nthe result along with fear and social withdrawal.&nbsp; On the reverse side, an excess of Testosterone\nmay result in intolerance to stress and a tendency to jump to anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you get angry,\nadrenaline and other hormones are released into the bloodstream. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger may result in\nexternalizing behaviors such as verbal arguments and tantrums and/or\ninternalizing behaviors such as sulking or increased symptoms of depression. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angry people may appear\nstrong, willful, or certain, but be assured that beneath the veneer are fear\nand loneliness and insecurity and pain. Especially, there is pain. Whether they\nadmit it or not, angry people are hurt people, and they have somehow come to\nbelieve that they can resolve their own pain by inflicting pain on others.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iLldCKgyzxA/WTGUGdP6bFI/AAAAAAABT_s/egx8SN-c7DkCK1uPuR64_x5jr1vZJeCVQCLcB/s1600/imZXages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-iLldCKgyzxA/WTGUGdP6bFI/AAAAAAABT_s/egx8SN-c7DkCK1uPuR64_x5jr1vZJeCVQCLcB/s400/imZXages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their reasoning is usually subconscious; nonetheless, each time anger is\nmisapplied, it is a reflection of a deep wound that longs to be healed<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Anger is like fire. It\ncan be a useful tool, or it can be hideously destructive.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>I USED IT TO\nCOOK.&nbsp; ALMOST EVERYBODY BURNT THEIR HOMES</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rage can sometimes lead\nto a state of mind where the individual experiencing it believes, and often is\ncapable of doing things that may normally seem physically impossible. Those\nexperiencing rage usually feel the effects of high adrenaline levels in the\nbody.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A-7eXUfUNL8/WTGTyIDIGdI/AAAAAAABT_o/2a3_vVQfVcU9N6cT5QMfzTVs8pJX9sQCgCLcB/s1600/im3Qages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A-7eXUfUNL8/WTGTyIDIGdI/AAAAAAABT_o/2a3_vVQfVcU9N6cT5QMfzTVs8pJX9sQCgCLcB/s400/im3Qages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This increase in adrenal output raises the physical strength and\nendurance levels of the person and sharpens their senses, while dulling the\nsensation of pain. High levels of adrenaline actually impair memory, Temporal\nperspective is also affected: people in a rage have described experiencing\nevents in slow-motion. High levels of adrenaline actually impair memory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time\ndilation occurs due to the individual becoming hyper aware of the hind brain\n(the seat of fight or flight). Rational thought and reasoning would inhibit an\nindividual from acting rapidly upon impulse.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human perception of time is a\nsocial construct that required rational thought and reasoning to become what it\nis today. The concept of minutes, hours, days (etc.) are socially constructed\nideas that we use to encapsulate experience <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-39ujqYfDPDY/WTGTrBcwV1I/AAAAAAABT_k/Pc1V3uJ-CDonI7R9BCgGe5hEbftSVk80QCLcB/s1600/i0Lmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"218\" data-original-width=\"232\" height=\"375\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-39ujqYfDPDY/WTGTrBcwV1I/AAAAAAABT_k/Pc1V3uJ-CDonI7R9BCgGe5hEbftSVk80QCLcB/s400/i0Lmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An older explanation of\nthis \"time dilation\" effect is that instead of actually slowing our\nperception of time, high levels of adrenaline increase our ability to recall\nspecific minutiae of an event after it occurs.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since humans gauge time based on\nthe amount of things they can remember, high-adrenaline events such as those\nexperienced during periods of rage seem to unfold more slowly.&nbsp; It is safe to assume that there is truth in\nboth theories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A person in rage may\nalso experience tunnel vision, muffled hearing, increased heart rate, and\nhyperventilation.&nbsp; They often focus only\non the source of their anger. The large amounts of adrenaline and oxygen in the\nbloodstream may cause a person's extremities to shake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rage is the full,\nuncontrolled, physical and psychological expression of the classic\nfight-or-flight response. Rage anger is extreme but not common for most people.\nIt hijacks the mind and body. Rage reactions (or rage attacks) may include a\nsense of relief or even joy in the release of pent-up, painful feelings.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vWP8esTaK5Y/WTGTf1vc3eI/AAAAAAABT_g/6tePsNKKE6oKJyg7umxdbhC4ERGcz3vigCLcB/s1600/dWWownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-vWP8esTaK5Y/WTGTf1vc3eI/AAAAAAABT_g/6tePsNKKE6oKJyg7umxdbhC4ERGcz3vigCLcB/s400/dWWownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nraging, control of one's social perception, judgment, speech, and motor\nbehavior in seriously weakened. Rage attacks may followed by selective or\npartial amnesia for the facts of the event.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unbridled anger, or\nrage, is frequently associated with hostile actions that prove ineffective in\nresolving conflict, inducing more frustration and ultimately resulting in harm.\nSuch actions are frequently maladaptive because they serve to compromise\npersonal and interpersonal functioning.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acting-out in rage can do irreparable\ndamage to relationships, place lives and property in danger, and result in a\nhost of unwanted outcomes. Too frequently, rage leads to unwanted outcomes, or\neven arrest and incarceration if domestic violence ensues.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vaLyZPGAiJ8/WTGTZp1oGjI/AAAAAAABT_c/icki3a5jMRccna6i5KSa1iOf7eoxhm5DgCLcB/s1600/dQB5ownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"185\" data-original-width=\"272\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vaLyZPGAiJ8/WTGTZp1oGjI/AAAAAAABT_c/icki3a5jMRccna6i5KSa1iOf7eoxhm5DgCLcB/s400/dQB5ownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychiatrists consider\nrage to be at one end of the spectrum of anger, and annoyance to be at the\nother side. Rage occurs when oxytocin, vasopressin, and corticotropin-releasing\nhormone are rapidly released from the hypothalamus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This results in the\npituitary gland producing and releasing large amounts of the\nadrenocorticotropic hormone, which causes the adrenal cortex to release\ncorticosteroids. This chain reaction occurs when faced with a threatening\nsituation. The most frequent cause of anger is someone interfering with what we\nare intent on doing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An irritable mood\nduring PMS, are all common triggers for anger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger by its nature\nneeds a target to attack. And this target is often the person who we are in\nconflict with.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It would be helpful to\nassume that the basic intention of another is not malevolent, and shift the\ntarget of our anger from the \u201cperson\u201d to the \u201cthings.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9-8QkfRqxg0/WTGTS3jHWAI/AAAAAAABT_Y/FCCLvrWCSCgnTCMc3XJL332AXatPB0A7gCLcB/s1600/dowWQnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9-8QkfRqxg0/WTGTS3jHWAI/AAAAAAABT_Y/FCCLvrWCSCgnTCMc3XJL332AXatPB0A7gCLcB/s400/dowWQnload.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manipulative or\ninstrumental anger is the intentional use of angry feelings or aggression in\norder to get one's way or to control a person or situation.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manipulative anger is dysfunctional when it\nis used as an emotional weapon or tool for resolving conflicts with family\nmembers, peers, and others. Ultimately, manipulative or instrumental anger is\nself-defeating as a long-term strategy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, angry conduct\ncan also be extremely maladaptive, counterproductive, excessive, destructive,\nand abusive. Pathological anger is characterized by an inability to maintain\nbehavioral control or to moderate the impulse to act-out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SwgKt6demRE/WTGrHu72gTI/AAAAAAABUAg/eY6DwBjCzN4xMzp0-XcKeKHeU6APzNF8ACLcB/s1600/imagB5es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"266\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SwgKt6demRE/WTGrHu72gTI/AAAAAAABUAg/eY6DwBjCzN4xMzp0-XcKeKHeU6APzNF8ACLcB/s400/imagB5es.jpg\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Verbal abuse includes\ntemper tantrums, verbal rage reactions, bullying, intimidation, and brow\nbeating.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By contrast, people who\nare too afraid to assert themselves may repress angry feelings rather than\nthink realistically about what they need to do for themselves.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The repressed\nanger can build up and erupt against others or themselves at a later time. &nbsp;Some of them get drunk and beat their wives, for\nwhat happened at the workplace .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Y6oQRaAa8SA/WTGrBtwNDLI/AAAAAAABUAc/ckV8tDYgiIQnx-AHVbKDcEAbDr6Clvv7ACLcB/s1600/imagC1es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"275\" data-original-width=\"183\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Y6oQRaAa8SA/WTGrBtwNDLI/AAAAAAABUAc/ckV8tDYgiIQnx-AHVbKDcEAbDr6Clvv7ACLcB/s400/imagC1es.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">KABIR\nBEDIs SON SIDDHARTH , A COMPUTER SCIENCE STUDENT AT CARNEGIE MELON USA\nCOMMITTED SUICIDE AT THE AGE OF 26. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LiE-Uwd-mGI/WTI9p6FxFXI/AAAAAAABUBU/i9MtqVZbAPAZ2STewzZ4mcsrTvIuASBaQCLcB/s1600/ujp_sad_Rsuicide_quotes._.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AFTER\nREADING THAT POIGNANT LETTER WHERE HE LEFT SOME DOLLARS FOR HIS FUNERAL ( AT\nTHE END OF THE NOTE ) &nbsp;, I DID SOME DEEP\nTHINKING.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;IT WAS\nHEART WRENCHING TO SAY THE LEAST.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AHbjsptMHcc/WTI-BCgnsvI/AAAAAAABUBY/Za999o1TwHUwMIfugyAb98SwWjfcFDOLACLcB/s1600/tuNmblr_n62ezbcSI61shqmvso1_500.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HIS\nPARENTS WERE DIVORCED . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HIS\nMOTHER PROTIMA ( A REBEL NYMPHOMANIAC ) HAD STREAKED NUDE AND SPLASHED HER PICTURES FOR THE WORLD TO\nSEE. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHEN HER TITS WERE FLATTENED AGAINST HER\nCHEST, &nbsp;WHILE RUNNING, &nbsp;SHE WAS UPSET AND HAD A RETAKE\nTHE NEXT DAY WITH HER TITS BOUNCING UPWARDS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The NUDE\npictures are there in the post below\u2014</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">HIS\nFATHER WAS TAKING ON OTHER WOMEN AT A REGULAR RATE .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; In spite of all\nyour efforts, things will happen that will cause you anger; and sometimes it\nwill be justifiable anger.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>HOW\nGOOD IS A PSYCHIATRIST WHO PRETENDS TO UNDERSTAND DEPRESSION</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>WHEN HE JUST\nCANNOT UNDERSTAND AN EMOTION CALLED ANGER ?</b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>All psychiatrists\nargree that depression and suicide have to do with the individual feeling\nempty, hopeless and deeply despairing.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>None of them ever thought of examining the potent emotion called ANGER\ndirected inwards.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ETnpH7qZ3a8/WTJGD-PkwII/AAAAAAABUB4/Ef9IRbYBoHoSOloYfzw98OvFHQgVwylHgCLcB/s1600/im37Sages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>This shows that all\npsychiatric books written by mediocre minds , must be burnt , and this vital\nbranch taken back to the drawing board.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">This post on ANGER intends to do\nexactly this&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TkPx44OzrR4/WTJF9KXYJsI/AAAAAAABUB0/1W8jfdKBh2AutditfniKaN-AKyBK2zN6ACLcB/s1600/downloa5Sd.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TkPx44OzrR4/WTJF9KXYJsI/AAAAAAABUB0/1W8jfdKBh2AutditfniKaN-AKyBK2zN6ACLcB/s400/downloa5Sd.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Suicide is murder of\nthe self and most of the time, it transmits permanent guilt to another person\npermanently who failed his expectations. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">This guilt deprives the recipient, &nbsp;of REM sleep \u2014 the greatest retribution .</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychiatrists must know\nthat the act of suicide is an expression of anger towards a loved one. Mediocre\nminds just cannot accept the notion that a suicidal person is doing anything\nbut suffering. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes, they are hurt. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, there are times when this suffering\ncan be used as an effective weapon to punish the person who caused it. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p_0jeaIf0VQ/WTJM6ilhX8I/AAAAAAABUCA/64il5HLbdm8VtmegcMKgc1M1IRzZvrHcgCLcB/s1600/7f39aab5d1ed42ff12a5276e35502ad9f.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"618\" data-original-width=\"736\" height=\"536\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p_0jeaIf0VQ/WTJM6ilhX8I/AAAAAAABUCA/64il5HLbdm8VtmegcMKgc1M1IRzZvrHcgCLcB/s640/7f39aab5d1ed42ff12a5276e35502ad9f.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression is often the\nresult of feeling both hopeless and helpless. The depressed person feels like a\nvictim. Therefore, they have a strong sense that they cannot influence the flow\nof their lives. There is no worse feeling than helplessness, which is why it\nresults in depression and, sometimes, suicide. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An existential crisis\nhas to do with the fact that we are all going to die one day. Often, this leads\nto the negative thought that life has no meaning because it ends in death and,\ntherefore, what\u2019s the point of living? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For someone who is\ntruly depressed, the logical answer to this question is that life has no point.\nWell, if life has no meaning because I\u2019m going to die someday, why not take\ncommand of my own fate and end it now, rather than sitting around, waiting\naround for the inevitable?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Defiance propelled by\nanger comes into play when the depressed, suicidal person insists that he is\nnot afraid and will gladly commit suicide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UmGb1zStjCs/WTJNgAcnFMI/AAAAAAABUCE/YFigog_Vy1wr43TKX7Kjx_7J1BHAlhkZACLcB/s1600/iamages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UmGb1zStjCs/WTJNgAcnFMI/AAAAAAABUCE/YFigog_Vy1wr43TKX7Kjx_7J1BHAlhkZACLcB/s400/iamages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">A MAN WHO IS CONTEMPLATING SUICIDE MUST TEACH SOMEONE , SOMETHING THAT HE IS GOOD AT &nbsp; . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZDt3YWNciE/WTJcxAPxHiI/AAAAAAABUCU/Q37BoASLvEUv046eNsg4h0O-c2hlG1SWQCLcB/s1600/imasges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AZDt3YWNciE/WTJcxAPxHiI/AAAAAAABUCU/Q37BoASLvEUv046eNsg4h0O-c2hlG1SWQCLcB/s400/imasges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TEACHING IS THE GREATEST ACT OF OPTIMISM</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are healthier\nways to express anger at loved ones than to commit suicide. &nbsp;You may commit suicide to teach your wife a\nlesson\u2014 but hey\u2014&nbsp; what about your\nchildren or your parents ? Why traumatize them for life.?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression afflicts\nmillions of people in the industrialized world today. It impairs the digestive,\nnervous and circulatory functions in the body and depletes any remnant of joy\nand happiness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By itself, depression is not an independent emotion but is\ndirectly linked to repressed anger. People who are depressed need spirituality\u2014NOT\nreligion.&nbsp; Religion makes it worse<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless anger is\nexpressed in a positive, active way, it accumulates in a passive way and\nbecomes the \u2019emotion\u2019 of depression. The effects can be devastating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress and depression\ntrigger the release of emergency hormones, causing brittle bones, infections\nand even cancer. Brittle bones are a major cause of death among women today. In\nmany people, these stress hormones are no longer merely triggered occasionally\nbut they are kept at constant \u2018hyper-readiness\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When they are turned on and\nstay on for a long time, they destroy appetite, impair the immune system, block\nsleep, break down bone and shut down the processes that repair cell tissue.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Chronically depressed women have high levels\nof stress hormones and enormous loss of bone density.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Levels of serotonin, an\nimportant neurotransmitter that is linked to the experience of pleasure, are\n25% lower in patients who are at high risk of suicide.&nbsp; Serotonin is particularly active in a part of\nthe brain that controls inhibition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lack of serotonin , a&nbsp; neurotransmitter, or its related chemicals,\nlowers the amount of control a person has over his actions. This predisposes a\nperson to act on suicidal thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low brain serotonin\nmade communications between specific brain regions of the emotional limbic\nsystem of the brain ( amygdala) and the frontal lobes weaker<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
