, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever you feel\nangry, you are never really angry with somebody else, but you are frustrated\nover your own inability to fulfill your desires, both past and present\u2014not to\ntalk about the hurt of dashed expectations .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YK-4wZyWKC8/WTJgyOQOXcI/AAAAAAABUCs/wcNsfqVVa-8EYvv6U2OltzyBpMOJ-WJ8ACLcB/s1600/dowswnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"215\" data-original-width=\"234\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YK-4wZyWKC8/WTJgyOQOXcI/AAAAAAABUCs/wcNsfqVVa-8EYvv6U2OltzyBpMOJ-WJ8ACLcB/s1600/dowswnload.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nLORD KRISHNA DEALT WITH ARJUNAs DEPRESSION--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">BE IN THE MOMENT--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">ACT WITHOUT EXPECTATIONS&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZgE79Q8NKnA/WTJiqUC_ehI/AAAAAAABUC0/MdKI4KJJSQcyrXH0qtTD0yLaJYvdOoipgCLcB/s1600/imSages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZgE79Q8NKnA/WTJiqUC_ehI/AAAAAAABUC0/MdKI4KJJSQcyrXH0qtTD0yLaJYvdOoipgCLcB/s400/imSages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">6000 YEARS AGO, &nbsp;KRISHNA MADE ARJUNA DO SURYANAMASKAR EVERY SINGLE DAY OF THE BATTLE AT DAWN.&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE KAURAVAS WERE GRACIOUS ENOUGH TO WAIT FOR THE BELATED PANCHAJANYA SHANKH CALL , &nbsp;SIGNALING THE RESUMPTION OF &nbsp;BATTLE&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-11sP2gEIS5M/WTJiL7ojEFI/AAAAAAABUCw/LUhPxTn8Q7UNrR7wX0eh-nuOj20GlhVagCLcB/s1600/2_Krishna_BlowinTg_Conch_in_Mahabharata.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"304\" data-original-width=\"179\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-11sP2gEIS5M/WTJiL7ojEFI/AAAAAAABUCw/LUhPxTn8Q7UNrR7wX0eh-nuOj20GlhVagCLcB/s400/2_Krishna_BlowinTg_Conch_in_Mahabharata.jpg\" width=\"235\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The longer someone\nsuffers from depression the more entrenched the condition can become, making\ntreatment and recovery more difficult.&nbsp;\nThe most common picture most people have of depression is that someone\nsuffering from depression is withdrawn, sad and passive.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You might expect them to want to stay at\nhome, avoid people and keep to themselves.&nbsp;\nYou may associate depression with suicidal thoughts or statements or a\nfeeling that the person would be better off dead.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cekf7niHdBQ/WTJlQXan6JI/AAAAAAABUDA/XWUd32Qo8aMuNAG1hAGPy52Sl1xuWCslwCLcB/s1600/ima432ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"240\" data-original-width=\"210\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-cekf7niHdBQ/WTJlQXan6JI/AAAAAAABUDA/XWUd32Qo8aMuNAG1hAGPy52Sl1xuWCslwCLcB/s400/ima432ges.jpg\" width=\"350\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The symptoms described above ARE often\npresent in depression and are a common subtype but depression can appear in a\nvariety of guises and can be perplexing to recognize.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A very common way that\ndepressed people behave is with ANGER.&nbsp;\nThis is&nbsp; seen more commonly in men\nor teenagers but there are also depressed women who react primarily with anger.&nbsp; A definition of depression is \u201canger turned\ninward.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger turned outward is just as\ncommon and often convinces family members that the person is not\ndepressed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I95vo5GbZlQ/WTJlCqHyH3I/AAAAAAABUC8/y9WUaGTnO9wPfvk_AlQHbeK5cVG47ht6ACLcB/s1600/im22ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"198\" data-original-width=\"255\" height=\"310\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-I95vo5GbZlQ/WTJlCqHyH3I/AAAAAAABUC8/y9WUaGTnO9wPfvk_AlQHbeK5cVG47ht6ACLcB/s400/im22ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In depression, we lose\nthe ability to enjoy life.&nbsp;&nbsp; When good\nthings happen, the depressed person may not be able to recognize it or fail to\nexperience the positive aspects even though they know they \u201cshould.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Depression could cause one to feel irritable\nand antagonistic to the people around them that are enjoying life in a normal\nway.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often people who are\ndepressed don\u2019t understand why they feel so bad.&nbsp; &nbsp;Sometimes\nthere is NO reason. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All they need to do is\nto take a deep slow breath\u2014 &nbsp;exhale , have\na glass of cold water and ask themselves \u201c </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WHAT THE FUCK AM I WORRYING ABOUT</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BE IN THE MOMENT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE PRESENT IS FOOD ON\nTHE TABLE. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THE PAST IS SHIT IN THE\nSEPTIC TANK.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>YOU DON\u2019T KNOW YOUR\nFUTURE</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Below: This shit has killed thousands of people--beware !</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WLUwarQZoN4/WTJpQaifJKI/AAAAAAABUDE/KzKsmC0keAgBX2nyhdjfslHJAY9dYNjCQCLcB/s1600/imaewges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"201\" data-original-width=\"251\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WLUwarQZoN4/WTJpQaifJKI/AAAAAAABUDE/KzKsmC0keAgBX2nyhdjfslHJAY9dYNjCQCLcB/s400/imaewges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teenagers commonly\nexpress depression through anger.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often professional help\nis sought when the teenager finally exclaims during an angry outburst, \u201cI hate\nyou and I wish I was dead!\u201d&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For many parents , the\nshock of hearing such a statement makes them react in ways they would have\nnever done before<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In&nbsp;\nBREAKING BAD Walt\u2019s son tells him on the phone \u201c I hate you, why don\u2019t\nyou die \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Walt\u2019s\nheart wrenching gasp of \u201cIt can\u2019t all be for nothing\u201d was the sound of a man\nstaring into the deep dark abyss.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmilk had curdled, the glass has shattered .&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time\nwas ripe for mind boggling redemption on Walt\u2019s own terms.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/breaking-bad-tv-serial-review-where.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This toxic mix of\nsadness and hostility is as confusing to the teenager as it is to the\nfrustrated parent.&nbsp; Parents and children\nare stuck living with each other for much longer than earlier generations.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confusion and uncertainty can also contribute\nto anger.&nbsp; Teenagers who are relatively\npowerless may manage to contain their anger with friends and in school where\nthe price of losing control is very high.&nbsp;\nParents then may be the only ones who have the dubious pleasure of\nexperiencing their child\u2019s anger.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern culture still\nrewards men for machismo-showing courage and strength, not exhibiting\nweakness.&nbsp; Men are still punished for\nbeing weak; labeled as sissy, feminine, gay, unmanly.&nbsp; Depression is a form of ultimate weakness; an\ninability to cope with life.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anger in\nmen is a much more acceptable emotion than sadness or vulnerability.&nbsp; That pattern develops early in life when\nlittle boys are instructed not to cry but to \u201cbe a man.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men in our society became adept at\ntransforming their emotions into anger and aggression.&nbsp; If you feel frightened, act tough.&nbsp; If you feel sad, figure out whom to blame or\npunish.&nbsp; Anger becomes a habitual way to\ndeal with tender and disturbing feelings.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI don\u2019t want to talk about it\u201d is still, sadly a, far too common\nresponse in how American men respond to stress.&nbsp;\nAll this contributes to a dangerous breeding ground for depression and a\ndepression that will end up being expressed as anger.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART , 2 BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-part-2-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/anger-management-part-2-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; SHE WAS VERY HAPPY WHEN I WAS VINDICATED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN THE CASE OF GENIUS DIVYA NARENDRA , HIS SLEEING PARTNERS THE VINKLEVOSS TWINS HAD THE WHEREWITHAL TO SUE JEW MARK ZUCKERBERG --AND THEY CATAPULTED THEMSELVES TO FAME --USING A HOLLYWOOD MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHAT IS A SLEEPING PARTNER ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT CORNELL ONCE A KOREAN UNDERGRADUATE BOY TEAMED UP WITH MY ELDER SON ( MASTERS ) FOR A PROJECT IN COMPUTER SCIENCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THEY DECIDED ON WHAT THEY WOULD DO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE KOREAN BOY THEN WROTE THE ENTIRE CODE \"LIKE HOW HE WOULD WRITE A LETTER TO HIS FRIEND\"-- THIS WAS WHAT MY SON TOLD ME AND MY WIFE ON SKYPE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AT FREQUENT INTERVALS HE WOULD CRAVE THE INDULGENCE OF MY SON\u2014IMPLORING \"SIR, AM I RIGHT\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS SO EMBARRASSED -- THE KOREAN DID THE WHOLE PROJECT IN ONE FLOWING SHOT -- LITERALLY THANKFUL WHEN MY SON SAID-- \" YES , CONTINUE\" TO HIS \" SIR- AM I RIGHT SO FAR ? \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">WHEN THE CODE WAS WRITTEN AND TESTED -- MY ELDER SON TOLD HIM&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\"SO FAR YOU HAVE DONE EVERYTHING&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;-- I WILL WRITE THE FINAL PROJECT REPORT \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SO MY SON WROTE THE CODE PRESENTATION OVERNIGHT AND SHOWED IT TO THE KOREAN BOY THE NEXT DAY -- HE LOOKED ON MY SON AS AN ABSOLUTE HERO -- STARS IN HIS EYES AND CRIED \" WOW\u2014 I COULD HAVE NEVER DONE THIS , SIR\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON WAS A SLEEPING PARTNER IN THIS PROJECT. HE WAS HONEST TO ADMIT IT .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MY SON INSISTED AND WROTE THE KOREAN BOYs NAME FIRST FOLLOWED BY HIS NAME-- THROUGH COLLEGE RULES REQUIRED THE MASTERs STUDENTS NAME FIRST AND THEN THE UNDERGRADUATE STUDENTs NAME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN WAS A MEDIOCRE BRAIN\u2014HE WAS ABSOLUTE DISGRACE IN MATH\u2014EINSTEIN DID NOT HAVE A MATHEMATICAL BRAIN-- HE OUTSOURCED ALL HIS MATH..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ALL HIS AWARD WINNING IDEAS OF EINSTEIN IS STOLEN FROM FROM VEDAS AND SECONDARY ONES -- STOLEN FROM AN INTELLECTUAL PATENT POOL OF WHICH HE WAS CLEVERLY PLACED AS THE GUARDIAN CLERK BY JEW ROTHSCHILD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN THE INDIAN MATH GENIUS --LOST HIS DIARY, IN WHICH HE HAD RECORDED ALL HIS PRICELESS FINDINGS . THE JEW BASTARDS STOLE IT. AFTER THAT RAMANUJAN USED TO DO HIS WORK ON A SLATE , RUB IT OFF AND RETAIN RESULTS INSIDE HIS HEAD<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN WAS POISONED \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">HIS YOUNG WIFE STARTED CRYING BITTERLY ( SHE WAS NOT THE CRYING TYPE ) AS SOON AS THE PYRE WAS LIT AND FEL INTO A FAINT -- WHEN WELL WISHERS PRESSED HER, SHE REVEALED THE TRUTH ABOUT THE \"LOST DIARY\"..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/sox-and-nox-emissions-from-ships.html?showComment=1512920248008#c4300396988934819416\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_23.html?showComment=1529836889823#c5001973479494635782\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2018 at 4:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_38MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1---</span></div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">The&nbsp;</b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><b>constitution</b></span><b style=\"font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;of JOHN DEWEY</b></span><b style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\">&nbsp;( with BR Ambedkar as a front ) was adopted by the Constituent Assembly on 26 November 1949, and came into effect on 26 January 1950..</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Judiciary interprets the Constitution as its final arbiter.. judiciary cant create laws.. The Indian constitution is the longest written constitution of any sovereign country in the world..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It imparts constitutional supremacy and not parliamentary supremacy, as it is not created by the Parliament but, by a constituent assembly, and adopted by its people, with a declaration in its preamble.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Parliament cannot override the constitution.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the Constitution of India came into force on 26 January 1950, it repealed the Indian Independence Act. India ceased to be a dominion of the British Crown and became a sovereign democratic republic.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY DID JEW ROTHSCHILD KEEP THE BRITISH CONSTITION AS A BUNCH OF LOOSE PAPERS ?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WELL HE COULD INSERT AND REMOVE LAWS AT WILL.&nbsp; &nbsp; THE BEST PART IS NOBODY BUT ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS (&nbsp; JUDGES / POLITICIANS) KNEW THE CONTENTS OF THE BRITISH CONSTITUTION..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The DEEP STATE of America too do not want citizens to know the US law ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXAMPLE : The State of Georgia has sued Malamud for providing the Official Code of Georgia Annotated on his website, describing it as \"a form of 'terrorism. If you publish Georgia\u2019s state laws, you\u2019ll get sued for copyright ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.theregister.co.uk/2015/07/25/georgia_sues_terrorist_for_publishing_its_own_laws/</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Carl Malamud is an America public domain advocate, known for his foundation Public.Resource.Org. He founded the Internet Multicasting Service. During his time with this group, he was responsible for developing the first Internet radio station, for putting the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's EDGAR database on-lineand for creating the Internet 1996 World Exposition.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">For the past over 25 years, an amazingly dedicated man named Carl Malamud has taken it upon himself to singlehandedly publish for free on his website Public.Resouce.org every local, State and US Federal government law ever enacted\u2014a stupendous feat...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">United States, became the first society in all of recorded human history to outlaw its citizens from knowing the laws they live under!</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; &nbsp;&nbsp;IT IS\nA HINDU STRUCTURE</span></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">LEAVE ASIDE\nTHE STUFF HE HAS STOLEN FROM INDIA AND PATENTED IN HIS OWN NAME.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE\nWHITE MAN &nbsp;( BLACK BALLED FOR STEALING AND\nPATENTING ) USED BRIBED ARABS AS MIDDLEMEN TO STEAL KNOWLEDGE FROM KODUNGALLUR\nUNIVERSITY<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PUNT\nAS LAND OF GODS?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">YES\nIMHOTEP , THE NINTH AVATAR OF VISHNU WENT TO EGYPT FROM THE LAND OF PUNT AND\nBUILD THE PYRAMIDS <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IMHOTEP\nWAS MORE POWERFUL AND MORE RESPECTED THAN THE PHARAOH HIMSELF. &nbsp; &nbsp;EGYPTIANS CALLED HIM THE GOD WHO CAME FROM THE EAST-- THE LAND OF PUNT&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PYRAMIDS\nUSED THE GOLDEN MEAN AND SPIRAL.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">GOLDEN\nMEAN, &nbsp;GOLDEN SPIRAL, &nbsp;FIBONACCI SERIES, &nbsp;PASCALS TRIANGLE ( MERU ) &nbsp;ARE EMBEDDED IN THE VEDIC SRUTI VERSES (\nPROSODY/ METER ) WHICH WENT DOWN ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE BEING PENNED\nDOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND MY REVELATIONS WILL JUMP UP TO 47.5 % <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The southern shaft were\npointed towards Alnilam of the Orion Constellation while the Northern shaft (\nangle 32.5 deg ) pointed like a gun barrel towards Thuban of Draco\nconstellation , when the Giza pyramid was made<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the basis I\nsaid IMHOTEP ( Vishnu\u2019s 9<sup>th</sup> avatar ) made the Giza pyramids in 3900\nBC \u2013 at that time the North star was star <b style=\"background-color: white;\">THUBAN</b> of the SISUMARA constellation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya\nquoted Vedic text Taittir\u012bya \u0100ra\u1e47yaka&nbsp;\n(2.19)&nbsp; 5000 BC&nbsp; to&nbsp;\nexplain&nbsp; that&nbsp; Vi\u1e63h\u1e47u&nbsp;\nresides&nbsp; at&nbsp; the&nbsp;\nnavel&nbsp; of&nbsp; the&nbsp;\nSisumara&nbsp; figure&nbsp; regulating&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp; 26000 year precession\nwheel&nbsp; of&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp; nak\u1e63hatras.&nbsp; He&nbsp;\nalso&nbsp; mentions&nbsp; that&nbsp;\nthe&nbsp; star named Dhruva&nbsp; as Thuban&nbsp;\nis&nbsp; stationed at&nbsp; the tail&nbsp;\nend of the Sisumara constellation ( Draco constellation ) . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orion rises in the\nsouth, while Draco descends in the north. The cycle is about 13 thousand years\nlong. Then Orion descends, and Draco rises. This cycle is everlasting, and this\nis written in our Vedas and puranas<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Sisumara</b></span></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"> is Vishnu\u2019s first Matsya avatar DOLPHIN</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AETl1DEuvL8/WSlEbxEIf8I/AAAAAAABTsk/MTXZ44PSZKUeGs5UUzmhJPYIB5aotEGhQCLcB/s1600/thuRRban.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"280\" data-original-width=\"368\" height=\"303\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AETl1DEuvL8/WSlEbxEIf8I/AAAAAAABTsk/MTXZ44PSZKUeGs5UUzmhJPYIB5aotEGhQCLcB/s400/thuRRban.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why I dated Adi\nShankaracharya at 2000 BC ( I am not revealing a dozen other reasons ). Bastards in Wikipedia dated Adi Shankaracharta as 820 AD ( 2820 years later ) .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The star Thuban\n(Draconis) was the northern pole star when pyramids was made by Imhotep,\nVishnu\u2019s 9th avatar<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But Earth wobbles on\nits axis. It takes about 26,000 years to make one full wobble, and in that\ntime, the north pole points to different stars.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the pyramids were built,\nthe star closest to the pole was Thuban, in Sisumara constellation ( Draco )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7WXklnk7c30/WSlHEeEJMwI/AAAAAAABTs0/4_l_0D_N95QbvcprROlnz-T84nE2zq8ZgCLcB/s1600/11july2J7_430.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"430\" data-original-width=\"430\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7WXklnk7c30/WSlHEeEJMwI/AAAAAAABTs0/4_l_0D_N95QbvcprROlnz-T84nE2zq8ZgCLcB/s1600/11july2J7_430.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 7000 year old Vedic\ntexts declare that devout people who know the 14 stars of Sisumara&nbsp; constellation are blessed.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; This is why after marriage in Kerala , the\ncouple before consummating the marriage have to see Thuban star together , as a\nrite of passage \u2013Vivaha Samskara<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5chcO0wT5bM/WSldJras-UI/AAAAAAABTvQ/PxYuAHpQVPICuHfKq5UXHoi8-NLi3ESXwCLcB/s1600/7-f6ak14d5c49.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1194\" data-original-width=\"446\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5chcO0wT5bM/WSldJras-UI/AAAAAAABTvQ/PxYuAHpQVPICuHfKq5UXHoi8-NLi3ESXwCLcB/s1600/7-f6ak14d5c49.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 7000 year old Vedas\nsay that Sisumara is like the clay in the middle of the potter\u2019s wheel . It\nmoves slowly sitting at the navel ,&nbsp;\nDhruva rotates on this navel . Dhruva moves in circles day and night\nconsisting of 30 muhurtas in the middle of the two directions (north and south).\nLike the navel of the potter\u2019s wheel stays in the same place, so also Dhruva\nshould be known to be rotating there itself.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Ch 21.v 94, 95,96)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dhruva the son of\nUtt\u0101nap\u0101da, has become the main pivot of the pole in the sky. Verily, he\nrotates the sun, the moon and the planets continuously. The stars follow him\nwho is himself moving like a wheel.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; (Ch 22. v5, 6,7 )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14 stars of Sisumara\nare :-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1) Dharma 2.Uttanapada 3.Kratu 4.Narayana 5.Samvatsara 6-7\nAshvins 8-9. Aryama-Varuna 10.Mitra 11.Agni 12.Indra 13.Kashyapa 14.Dhruva.&nbsp;\nThe last four stars ending with Dhruva are circumpolar and can be seen\nthoughout the year from Bharata<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7z1FQHZ1BJY/WSlJ0fFcjmI/AAAAAAABTtI/1cGNcXhMmBUxh6d3exvKHy7gFFCpUFuIgCLcB/s1600/1-9giza-13.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"432\" data-original-width=\"442\" height=\"390\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7z1FQHZ1BJY/WSlJ0fFcjmI/AAAAAAABTtI/1cGNcXhMmBUxh6d3exvKHy7gFFCpUFuIgCLcB/s400/1-9giza-13.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: Mind you these are Sanskrit verses written in 7000 BC when the white man was doing GRUNT GRUNT for language and running around naked with his WEE willy and balls &nbsp;flapping' in the wind.. &nbsp; All this ancient astronomy was stolen by Ptolemy when he studied in Kodungallur Univeristy --he stole and patented in his name with fancy Greeko and Latin names.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JAwOlYaeGeM/WSlJMZLONMI/AAAAAAABTtA/Lp7IJtzViUADK9hO4Sqn-jJg9toLt_WLACLcB/s1600/10-34G7380ad2e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: When the three stars of belt of Orion is super imposed on the three Hindu Vishnu avatar Ayyappa ( Imhotep ) made pyramids of Egypt, &nbsp;very far away the 14 stars of Sisumara gets superimposed on another Ayyappa made temple named Angkor Wat in Cambodia&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Orion-Osiris, known in\nancient India as Kal-Purush, 'Time Man',</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: x-large;\">around the planet resonate BRR TRR KRRRR</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Nazca and Angkor Wat\nare exactly opposite each other, 180 degrees apart \u2013 this had to be planned by\na civilization that navigated the world on a VIMANA . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h8hN8KlKEAY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/h8hN8KlKEAY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Maya\nDanava escaped to Peru on a Vimana .&nbsp; On\nthe same line, the pyramids in Egypt are 72 degrees west of Angkor Wat (one\nfifth of a 360 degree circle.)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Easter\nIsland is about 144 degrees longitude away from both of them.&nbsp; Other less prominent ancient sites are also\non this line-- a former equator from two pole shifts back when the North Pole\nwas in what we now call southeast Alaska.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Easter Island and Mohenjo-Daro\nare&nbsp; 20.000 km apart, in both directions\n(east and west) directly opposite each other on the globe!&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red;\"><b>THE GIZA PYRAMID ALSO HAS THE SAME GOLDEN MEAN&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hHe7h-3eZX4/WSlPec29U9I/AAAAAAABTuI/TJ5ZiAWif482JM6wY-WZLrQe1H_3NgRRACLcB/s1600/000%2B%25287RR%2529%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"123\" data-original-width=\"320\" height=\"246\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hHe7h-3eZX4/WSlPec29U9I/AAAAAAABTuI/TJ5ZiAWif482JM6wY-WZLrQe1H_3NgRRACLcB/s640/000%2B%25287RR%2529%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--M7x70rjZtw/WSlZAMaQu8I/AAAAAAABTvA/dp6Bod_ZDqok7wPTTIFFs58U78ok03OMwCLcB/s1600/Phi-Pi-ej-GP-555.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"544\" data-original-width=\"555\" height=\"626\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--M7x70rjZtw/WSlZAMaQu8I/AAAAAAABTvA/dp6Bod_ZDqok7wPTTIFFs58U78ok03OMwCLcB/s640/Phi-Pi-ej-GP-555.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SO WHAT IS THIS SWINGING PENDULAM OF 13,000 YEARS ( HALF OF THE 26,000 YEAR PRECESSION &nbsp;) BETWEEN GIZA PYRAMIDS AND ANGKOR WAT ?</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V1GY6qdoNQw/WSlRJSiNQuI/AAAAAAABTuU/liQ3wqbZk5Ez7inw42UQkNPJ4fVK0o1LgCLcB/s1600/downloTTad.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"181\" data-original-width=\"278\" height=\"416\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-V1GY6qdoNQw/WSlRJSiNQuI/AAAAAAABTuU/liQ3wqbZk5Ez7inw42UQkNPJ4fVK0o1LgCLcB/s640/downloTTad.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Distance from Ankor Wat\nto Giza pyramids is 4754 miles. This multiplied by the Vedic Golden ratio of\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">1.618 </b>gives 7692 miles which is the distance from Giza to Nazca . &nbsp; &nbsp;Now 7692\nmiles multiplied by the golden ratio again gives 12446, which is the distance\nfrom Nazca to Ankor Wat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Xx70UV2LNzs/WSlTz_oCdHI/AAAAAAABTuk/A45CD0jvJdk3YccMDJ_4stts-p9HOmzKwCLcB/s1600/yrrr.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"139\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"220\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Xx70UV2LNzs/WSlTz_oCdHI/AAAAAAABTuk/A45CD0jvJdk3YccMDJ_4stts-p9HOmzKwCLcB/s640/yrrr.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spherical triangle\nbetween Alaska at the apex, Giza and Nazca gives the Sri Yantra angle of <b style=\"background-color: white;\">51\ndegrees 49 minutes 38.25 seconds </b>, which is the same as the Egyptian pyramid,\nand also the Vedic <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>Sri Yantra.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Orion's altitude at the\nsouth meridian steadily rises and Draco's altitude at the north meridian\nsteadily falls. When Draco reaches its lowest point, Orion reaches its highest\npoint. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the opposite side\nof the cycle begins with Draco steadily rising and Orion steadily falling. The\n'up' motion takes &nbsp;13,000 years. The\n'down' motion takes 13,000 years. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a SEE SAW of --\nup for 13,000 years, down for 13,000 years - for ever. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sky-ground plans of\nAngkor and Giza have succeeded in capturing the highest point in Draco's\ntrajectory and the lowest point in Orion's . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is this coincidence ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh Yeah ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because I can come up\nwith many more that ancient Hindu built structures all over the planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya Danava who created\nthe Mayan calendar , &nbsp;built the amazing\nstructures in Peru , central America and Mexico<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The three Aztec\npyramids </span>at Teotihuacan is made by Maya Danava .&nbsp; This is also perfectly aligned to Orion\u2019s\nBelt -- ancient city located 40 kilometers northeast of modern-day Mexico City--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">See left side of the picture below&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RxG9PoQxu2Y/WSlVgjUyU2I/AAAAAAABTu0/Qe52996pG5UTjoP4TrhC6pzY0hZGWRzBACLcB/s1600/w1-0011-teotihuaWcan-giza-orion-500x333.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"293\" data-original-width=\"440\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RxG9PoQxu2Y/WSlVgjUyU2I/AAAAAAABTu0/Qe52996pG5UTjoP4TrhC6pzY0hZGWRzBACLcB/s640/w1-0011-teotihuaWcan-giza-orion-500x333.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-17ShcEsXuMs/WSlVZ_mFqnI/AAAAAAABTuw/TxyrMdiw2YEnIBo3hf2LcUL0hoIegE4fgCLcB/s1600/300px-SSA4F1434.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-17ShcEsXuMs/WSlVZ_mFqnI/AAAAAAABTuw/TxyrMdiw2YEnIBo3hf2LcUL0hoIegE4fgCLcB/s640/300px-SSA4F1434.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader stole\nprecession from India and patented in his name \u2013though precession is written in\nour 7000 year old Vedas. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Precession was only\ndiscovered (sic ) by modern astronomers relatively recently,</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thuban was the North\nPole star from 3942 to 1793 BC.&nbsp; It is\n250 times more luminous than the Sun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Around the period of\n4,000 to 2,000 BC Thuban was used by the ancients as the pole star as it was\nthe closest star to the North Pole at that time. &nbsp; &nbsp;Our Sapt Rishis made a perfect circle around Thuban ( Dhruv )&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sisumara ( Draco ) is circumpolar, meaning that it never\nsets below the horizon and is always visible in the Northern Hemisphere, but\ncannot be seen in the Southern Hemisphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thuban, also designated\nAlpha Draconis &nbsp;is a star in the\nconstellation of Draco. &nbsp;&nbsp;A relatively\ninconspicuous star in the night sky of the Northern Hemisphere, it is\nhistorically significant as having been the north pole star from the 4th to 2nd\nmillennium BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to the precession\nof Earth's rotational axis, Thuban was the naked-eye star closest to the north\npole from 3942 BC, when it moved farther north than Theta Bo\u00f6tis, until 1793 BC,\nwhen it was superseded by Kappa Draconis.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having gradually\ndrifted away from the pole over the last 4,800 years ( 200 years after the Vedas which mentioned this was penned down ) , Thuban is now seen in the\nnight sky at a declination of 64\u00b0 20' 45.6\", RA 14h 04m 33.58s.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After\nmoving nearly 47 degrees off the pole by 10000 AD, Thuban will gradually move\nback toward the north celestial pole. In 20346 AD, it will again be the pole\nstar, that year reaching a maximum declination of 88\u00b0 43' 17.3\", RA 19h\n08m 54.17s</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sisumara is explained in\nthe Taittiriya Aranyaka (II.19)&nbsp; --part\nof Vedas -- This hymn names all the 14 stars and also names the last star\nAbhaya and Dhruva; that is fearless and fixed. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The star at the mouth of the dolphin fish is\nPolaris (\u03b1 Ursae Minoris) and the one at the tail end is called Marka\u1e6d\u012b in\nSanskrit (\u03b2 Ursae Minoris or Kochab). If these two were joined by a straight line,\nthis line would rotate like the hand of a clock and make a full circle in a\nsidereal day of 23 hours and 56 minutes.\u201d</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1752977097897296032\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_19M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/09347370490597607459\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Pratik</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html?showComment=1495881473527#c1752977097897296032\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 27, 2017 at 4:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_19MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMind boggling sir, how could have lord ayyappa made these temples exactly and precisely with the accurate distances between each other inherent with golden mean ???
