max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1381625987412541036\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_166M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html?showComment=1495999637920#c1381625987412541036\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2017 at 12:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_166MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">GIZA PYRAMIDS AND ANKOR WAT SITES ( SPOT ) REPRESENTED THE TIME OF 10,600 BC</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THUBAN WAS HIGHEST IN 10,600 BC AND ORION LOWEST<br /><br />ORION IS HIGHEST IN 2012 AD AND THUBAN LOWEST<br /><br />FROM NOW ON DRACO WILL RISE FOR NEXT 12900 YEARS \u2013 WHILE ORION WILL FALLING</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS LIKE A SEE -SAW</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">When Imhotep built the Pyramids Thuban was Druv the Polar Star. It is recorded in our Vedas..</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThuban, also designated Alpha Draconis is a star (or star system) in the constellation of Draco.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCurrently the North Pole of the Earth is aligned with the fixed star Polaris. This was not the in 10,600 BC years ago; and by the year 14,100 A.D., the North Star will be Vega, not Polaris</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nApollonius of Tyana wrote that in India the first references to astronomy are to be found in the Rig Veda which is dated around 5000 B.C. &nbsp; Jesus Christ never existed --Jesus was modelled after Kerala sage Apollonius of Tyana</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPrecision of the Equinox, shifts by about 50.23 seconds per year. . The Sun would come to the same point of the ecliptic, as the equinotical Sun, in about 25765 years</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe \"wobble\" and the precession of the equinoxes were written down in our Aranyakas section of Vedas</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIt was during this time, starting around. 10,600 BC ( 12600 years ago ) that the world was brought to its knees by a global cataclysm.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe site of Pyramids at Giza reflect the skies as they appeared when Orion was at its nadir, the lowest point in its precessional cycle around 10,600 BC.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA date of 10,600 BC is chosen because they maintain this is the only time in the precession of the equinoxes when the astrological age was Leo and when that constellation rose directly east of the Sphinx at the vernal equinox.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis epoch the angles between the three stars of Orion's Belt and the horizon were an \"exact match\" to the angles between the three main Giza pyramids.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBefore the 12th millennium BC Sirius was below the horizon line as seen from the region of Cairo/Giza. &nbsp;It made its first appearance in the skies at that place in 10,600 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe southern shaft of the Queen's Chamber was directed to Sirius.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Pyramids of Giza are located 31.15 degrees to the east of the Greenwich meridian-whereas Angkor Wat temples are at 103.5 degrees East.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSuch a precessional cycle evolves at a speed of 1 degree per 72 years? Angkor Wat is located approx. 72 degrees to the east of Giza, where the Sphinx and pyramids are.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe sunrise at the vernal equinox in 10,600 BC occurred at the moment when the entire layout of the Earth and the sky was in precise correspondence.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOrion appeared precisely in the south on the meridian \u2013 just like in Giza; the only difference was in the perspective change caused by Angkor\u2019s lower latitude \u2013 13 degrees 26 minutes north compared to Giza\u2019s 30 degrees 3 minutes.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAt that, Leo appeared precisely in the east, right above the rising sun, like in Giza. The only difference was a slight slope of the constellation as a result of the latitude change.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedI3wAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_167b+seedI3wAD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dq2PGR56xgI/WSsk_IbICfI/AAAAAAABT1c/lkuhWVq806QSdyunWzTyBoazQ_R6TcdsgCLcB/s1600/imaege002.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"270\" data-original-width=\"520\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dq2PGR56xgI/WSsk_IbICfI/AAAAAAABT1c/lkuhWVq806QSdyunWzTyBoazQ_R6TcdsgCLcB/s640/imaege002.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/qlVgEoZDjok/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/qlVgEoZDjok?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-naufxZ0FMZg/WSstkEobxkI/AAAAAAABT1s/50_76oXAwt0f1PQd1in5Uf_5U30PGT7DQCLcB/s1600/precessioRn_north_pole.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"268\" data-original-width=\"440\" height=\"388\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-naufxZ0FMZg/WSstkEobxkI/AAAAAAABT1s/50_76oXAwt0f1PQd1in5Uf_5U30PGT7DQCLcB/s640/precessioRn_north_pole.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Ramses II is hailed as THE\ngreatest Pharaohs who ruled Egypt from 1279 to 1212 BC. Examination of his\nmummy led to a tiny, yet astounding, discovery about international trade in the\nancient world.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Found tucked inside the nostrils of the pharaoh were fragments\nof pepper, a plant indigenous to Malabar coast. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b9wlXAXKH-A/WgxPIAfFnlI/AAAAAAABWqA/6v3YIRBW8xk8qVUEYERggmKYjRtNHKFsACLcBGAs/s1600/220px-Ramesses_II_muwwmmy_in_profile_%2528colored_picture%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"329\" data-original-width=\"220\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-b9wlXAXKH-A/WgxPIAfFnlI/AAAAAAABWqA/6v3YIRBW8xk8qVUEYERggmKYjRtNHKFsACLcBGAs/s640/220px-Ramesses_II_muwwmmy_in_profile_%2528colored_picture%2529.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">The Western Historians\nwho wrote about Punt \u2013hid this truth.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And yet it had\napparently travelled from flowering vines in Kerala to the hands of Egyptian\nembalmers as far back as over a millennium before Christ ( who never existed ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramses II is regarded\nas the greatest, most celebrated, and most powerful pharaoh of the Egyptian\nEmpire. His successors and later Egyptians called him the \"Great\nAncestor\".&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ozvjE0tys3I/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ozvjE0tys3I?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramses II had made Egypt rich from all the supplies\nand riches he had collected from Punt.&nbsp;\nHe is named after RAMA , the avatar of Vishnu..</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nLand of Punt is described in ancient Egyptian texts as \"the land of the\ngods\" and a region rich in resources<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1255 BCE Ramesses\nand his queen Nefertari had traveled into Nubia to inaugurate a new temple, the\ngreat Abu Simbel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At age fourteen,\nRamesses was appointed Prince Regent by his father Seti I.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On\nhis death, he was buried in a tomb in the Valley of the Kings; his body later\nwas moved to a royal cache where it was discovered in 1881, and is now on display\nin the Cairo Museum. Nine more pharaohs took the name Ramesses in his honour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramses II fathered more\nchildren than any other pharaoh<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lost temple of\nRamses II was unearthed at Giza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/HCDQikYVnCA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/HCDQikYVnCA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dubbed Ramses the Great\nby the Egyptologists of the 19th century, his reign from 1279 to 1213BC marked\nthe last peak of Egypt's imperial power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WEHBAQkLgvE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/WEHBAQkLgvE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All over Egypt they show\nRamses II\u2019s favourite wife Neferteri burning incense from Punt in alabaster\nbowls<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasco Da Gama had to\nwait for a few days to meet the king of Calicut as he had gone to Guruvayur\ntemple on his elephant. &nbsp;&nbsp;Vasco da Gama saw black skinned Tunisian\nmerchants who had begun trading spices\u2014and they had been doing it for hundreds\nof years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2017 at 1:10 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nORION IS PRAJAPATI ( OSIRIS )<br />\n<br />\nPRAJAPATIs VIRGIN DAUGHTER IS ROHINI ( ALDEBARAN )<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_171b+seedI1axD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_171b+seedI1axD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is testified by Herdotus, Plato, Salon,\nPythagoras, and Philostratus that the religion and royal dynasty of Egypt\nproceeded from India. &nbsp;This has been sunk\nby the jealous white man ( who used bribed JNU commie professors ) , who wanted\nIndians to be self loathing and have a slave mentaility .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Egyptians pharaohs used a rosary of 108\nbeads- the digital equivalent of OM , which originated from the Sri Yantra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Egyptians royalty used dyes\nfrom Punt. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gustav Oppert\n(1836-1908) born in Hamburg, Germany, a Sanskrit scholar wrote a book Die\nGottheiten der Indier (\"The Gods of the Indians\") in 1905.&nbsp;&nbsp; In his book Oppert that Indian Goddess Aditi\nis Egyptian Isis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arnold Hermann Ludwig\nHeeren (1760-1842) an Egyptologist has observed:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Whatever weight\nmay be attached to Indian tradition and the express testimony of Eusebius\nconfirming the report of migrations from the banks of the Indus into Egypt,\nthere is certainly nothing improbable in the event itself, as a desire of gain\nwould have formed a sufficient inducement.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0Pbw4js5gVE/WSuqNLtqXKI/AAAAAAABT2Q/e-HQbxdIXk0EqdqqUPj3f8hgcUK_LgrtACLcB/s1600/82126DD317.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"451\" data-original-width=\"379\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0Pbw4js5gVE/WSuqNLtqXKI/AAAAAAABT2Q/e-HQbxdIXk0EqdqqUPj3f8hgcUK_LgrtACLcB/s640/82126DD317.jpg\" width=\"536\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It is testified\nby Herdotus, Plato, Salon, Pythagoras, and Philostratus that the religion of\nEgypt proceeded from India....It is testified by Neibuhr, Valentia, Champollian\nand Weddington that the temples of upper Egypt are of greater antiquity than\nthose of lower Egypt...that consequently the religion of Egypt, according to\nthe testimony of those monuments....came from India...The chronicles found in\nthe temples of Abydos and Sais and which have been transmitted by Josephus,\nJulius Africanus, and Eusebius, all testify that the religious system of the\nEgyptians proceeded from India.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"We have Hindu\nchronologies (besides those of the Puranas concerning the Yuga) which go still\nfurther back in time than the Tables of the Egyptian kings according to\nManetho.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adolf Erman (1854-1937)\nauthor of Life in ancient Egypt and A handbook of Egyptian religion wrote:--- &nbsp;\u201c The\npersons who were responsible for a highly developed Egyptian civilization were\nfrom Punt, an Asiatic country, a description of which is unveiled by this\nscholar from the old legends - a distant country washed by the great seas, full\nof valleys, incense, balsum, precious metals and stones; rich in animals,\ncheetahs, panthers, dog-headed apes and long tailed monkeys, winged creatures\nwith strange feathers ( peacocks ) to fly up to the boughs of wonderful trees,\nespecially the incense tree and the coconut trees.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Below: I have seen all this and come to conclusions long ago .. it takes a blogger &nbsp;to reveal all this in the year 2017 , right ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4-BBKJbUdJo/WSupPIH2lLI/AAAAAAABT2E/et20-3iEAds-nPy-hWFwKtDWpuJWo462gCLcB/s1600/1603e_HatEshepsut_1_attractions.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">M A Murray author of\nLegends of Ancient Egypt &nbsp;wrote \" as a race the Egyptians are more\nAsiatic than African . Present day Cranganore ( Kodungallur/ Muziris ) &nbsp;in Kerala, identified with the ancient\nMuziris, claims to have had trade contacts with Ancient Egypt under Queen\nHatsheput, who sent five ships to obtain spices, as well as with ancient Israel\nduring King Soloman's reign.&nbsp; Apparently,\nthe contact did not break off after Egypt was conquered by Greece and later by\nRome.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heinrich Karl Brugsch\nagrees with this view and writes in his History of Egypt that, --<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"We have a right\nto more than suspect that India, eight thousand years ago, sent a colony of\nemigrants who carried their arts and high civilization into what is now known\nas Egypt.\" The Egyptians came, according to their records, from a mysterious\nland (now known to lie on the shores of the Indian Ocean).\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eXQdLwpoW_s/WSupCL3kwdI/AAAAAAABT2A/8gtmmnRCP04dkQzf5a11rEIYtlCGVMTtQCLcB/s1600/250px-PTietra_di_Palermo_%2528geroglifici%2529_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"393\" data-original-width=\"250\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-eXQdLwpoW_s/WSupCL3kwdI/AAAAAAABT2A/8gtmmnRCP04dkQzf5a11rEIYtlCGVMTtQCLcB/s640/250px-PTietra_di_Palermo_%2528geroglifici%2529_1.jpg\" width=\"406\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Egyptians came,\naccording to their own records, from a mysterious land...on the shore of the\nIndian Ocean, the sacred Punt; the original home of their gods...who followed\nthence after their people who had abandoned them to the valley of the Nile, led\nby Amon, Hor and Hathor. This region was the Egyptian 'Land of the Gods,'\nPa-Nuter, in old Egyptian, or Holyland, and now proved beyond any doubt to have\nbeen quite a different place from the Holyland of Sinai. By the pictorial\nhieroglyphic inscription found on the walls of the temple of the Queen Haslitop\nat Der-el-babri, we see that this Punt can be no other than India. For many\nages the Egyptians traded with their old homes, and the reference here made by\nthem to the names of the Princes of Punt and its fauna and flora, especially\nthe nonmenclature of various precious woods to be found but in India, leave us\nscarcely room for the smallest doubt that the old civilization of Egypt is the\ndirect outcome of that the older India.\"&nbsp;\n(source: Theosophist for March 1881 p. 123).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fr5EeBYpd_w/WSuo3bLi8dI/AAAAAAABT18/9cOWSV5kaIgsKChCu1HHvfD_u0ILFU5mwCLcB/s1600/wpid-Photo-Oct-25-2012FF-906-PM.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Both the Jewish and the\nHindu calendars are lunar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yom Kippur in the\nJewish calendar coincides with Durga puja in the Hindu calendar. This year in\n2017, Durga Puja and Yom Kippur are on 30th Sept 2017. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yom Kippur is a legal\nholiday in the modern state of Israel. There are no radio or television broadcasts,\nairports are shut down, there is no public transportation, and all shops and\nbusinesses are closed\u2014as people fast. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is like AYUDHA\nPUJA (the last day of Navratri )\u2014ALL WORK AT STANDSTILL .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2015 the United\nNations ( controlled by Jew Rothschild ) officially recognized Yom Kippur,\nstating that from then on no official meetings would take place on the day\u2026\nThis was the first time the United Nations officially recognized any Jewish\nholiday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don care if Zionist\nJews agree or not. Judaism and Hebrew language was created by disgraced\nNamboodiris from Kerala. Hebrew is written from left to write\u2014by these left\nhanded disgraced Namboodiris who cannibalized their twins from inside the womb<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On top of Mount Masada\nwas a temple for Shiva and Parvati. Parvati is Durga. The symbol of Shiva\nShakti ( Parvati ) merge is SIX POINTED STAR .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pancha diyas ( five\nlamps) used in Hinduism are similar to the menorah lit during Hanukkah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/navratri-festival-durga-puja-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ABRAHAM WAS BRAHMA .\nSARA WAS SARASWATI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On Mount Moriah, that\nIsaac was bound for sacrifice. And it is here that his son Jacob dreamed of the\nladder ascending to heaven<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/brahma-and-sarawati-abraham-and-sara.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ never\nexisted . He was cooked up as a similar character to Apollonius of Tyana a sage\nfrom Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Christians believe that\nJesus was a descendant of Abraham. Both in Christian and Jewish traditions,\nAbraham is the father of Israelites, and is the father of Isaac. he has another\nson Ishmael through Sara's maid servant Hagar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Isaac is considered the\nancestor of the Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacob , later given the\nname Israel, is regarded as a Patriarch of the Israelites. Jacob is the son of\nIsaac and Rebecca, the grandson of Abraham and Sarah. In Koran Yakub is Jacob\u2014a\npatriarch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jacob's Ladder as an\nanalogy for the spiritual ascetic of life.. it is a ladder of seven rounds, the\npassage through them being symbolical of the soul's approach to perfection.\nThis is lifted from the Hindu souls 7 astray layers , the highest and seventh\none being Vaikunta \u2013meant for Moksha souls<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">2950 years ago, King\nDavid purchased Mount Moriah and made Jerusalem his capital. His son Solomon\nbuilt the Holy Temple, and the entire Jewish nation gathered together three\ntimes each year on the pilgrimage festivals. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; HEROD\nASKED THREE? THE ASTROLOGER SAID THIRTY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LATER WHEN HEROD\nACTUALLY BECAME KING --HE HAD A GOOD EQUATION WITH ESSENES --HE WAS SO MUCH\nIMPRESSED <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PART OF THE DEAD SEA\nSCROLLS WAS FOUND INSIDE MESADA FORTRESS AND REPLANTED IN QUMRAN CAVES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEROD MADE MASADA HIS\nROYAL CITADEL ONLY BECAUSE HE WAS SHOCKED BY THE PROPHECY OF A ESSENE SAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KING HEROD BUILT TWO\nORNATE PALACES AND CRATED AN AQUEDUCT WHICH COULD TRANSPORT WATER UP THE\nMOUNTAIN-- A MARVEL -- DESIGNED BY ESSENES <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The queen of Sheba came\nto Jerusalem \"with a very great retinue, with camels bearing spices, and\nvery much gold, and precious stones\" (I Kings 10:2). \"Never again\ncame such an abundance of spices\" (10:10; II Chron. 9:1\u20139) as those she\ngave to Solomon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe geographical\nlocation of Ophir is described in exactly the same way as the Land of\nPunt.&nbsp;&nbsp; Both countries lie \u2018far away, to\nthe south-east'; the ships set sail from a port on the Red Sea\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The goods brought from\nOphir are more or less the same as those the Egyptians brought from Punt and\ntheir other ports of call: precious woods like sandalwood, teak/ rosewood ,\nincense, spices, peacocks, tiger cubs etc <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sheba is a region that\nis repeatedly mentioned by name in the Bible, and also known from other\nhistorical texts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1- Kings 10:1 we\nread that the queen that ruled Ophir visited Solomon in Jerusalem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The merchants of Sheba\nand Raamah traded with you, they exchanged for your wares the best of all kinds\nof spices and all precious stones and gold. Please clear that one question which i have asked in Point 2.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_215BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_215B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_216B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8278579904541976052\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_216M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html?showComment=1496038727449#c8278579904541976052\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 29, 2017 at 11:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_216MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://astro.wsu.edu/worthey/astro/html/lec-precession.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCHECK THIS OUT<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />THIEF HIPPARCHUS IS GIVEN THE CREDIT FOR DISCOVERING PRECESSION.<br /><br />THIS GREEKO STUDIED IN THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSINCE WE DID NOT HAVE THE CUSTOM OF OWNING KNOWLEDGE AND AFFIXING AUTHORs NAMES THIS GREEKO CUNT STOLE \"PRECESSION\" AND PATENTED IT IN HIS OWN NAME<br />\n<br />\nThe angle of the Earth's axial tilt with respect to the orbital plane (the obliquity of the ecliptic) varies between 22.1\u00b0 and 24.5\u00b0, over a cycle of about 41,000 years. The current tilt is 23.44\u00b0, roughly halfway between its extreme values. &nbsp; The tilt last reached its maximum in 8,700 BCE. It is now in the decreasing phase of its cycle, and will reach its minimum around the year 11,800 CE. Axial precession is the trend in the direction of the Earth's axis of rotation relative to the fixed stars, with a period of <span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>25,771.5 years.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">OUR YUGAS HAVE BEEN BASED ON A ROUND FIGURE OF 24,000 YEARS --AS OUR VEDAS HAVE BEEN TRANSMITTED ORALLY FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS WRITTEN DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO<br /><br />EVEN THE WEIGHT OF ICE ON THE ARCTIC ICE CAP AFFECTS THE PRECESSION RATE</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCurrently, perihelion occurs during the southern hemisphere's summer.<br />\n<br />\nThe perihelion and aphelion are the nearest and farthest points (apsides) of a body's direct orbit around the Sun.<br />\n<br />\nThis means that solar radiation due to (1) axial tilt aiming the southern hemisphere toward the Sun and (2) the Earth's proximity to the Sun, both reach maximum during the summer and both reach minimum during the winter.<br />\n<br />\nTheir effects on heating are additive, which means that seasonal variation in irradiation of the southern hemisphere is more extreme. In the northern hemisphere, these two factors reach maximum at opposite times of the year: The north is tilted toward the Sun when the Earth is furthest from the Sun. The two forces work in opposite directions, resulting in less extreme variation.<br />\n<br />\nIn about 13,000 years, the north pole will be tilted toward the Sun when the Earth is at perihelion. Axial tilt and orbital eccentricity will both contribute their maximum increase in solar radiation during the northern hemisphere's summer. Axial precession will promote more extreme variation in irradiation of the northern hemisphere and less extreme variation in the south.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Earth's axis is aligned such that aphelion and perihelion occur near the equinoxes, axial tilt will not be aligned with or against eccentricity.<br />\n<br />\ni have mentioned YUGAS in the post below<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</span><br />\n<br />\nANCIENT GREEKS HAVE STOLEN 100% FROM OUR VEDAS .. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/false-narrative-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1496161985460#c3503523216591995159\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 30, 2017 at 10:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_32MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHE SITES ( GROUND ) FOR THE EQUATOR WITH NORTH POLE AT SE ALASKA STONEHENGE WAS CHOSEN IN 10,600 BC<br />\n<br />\nTHE STRUCTURE AT GIZA WAS BUILT BY IMHOTEP ( AYYAPPA ) IN 3900 BC<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/flight-of-vedic-vimana-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE BLOGPOST ABOVE WAS RIDICULED.<br />\n<br />\nI LOST INTEREST AND INSTEAD OF JUSTIFYING MYSELF --I SHIFTED AWAY<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT A RARE COINCIDENCE--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Distance from Ankor Wat to Giza pyramids is 4754 miles. This multiplied by the Vedic Golden ratio of 1.618 gives 7692 miles which is the distance from Giza to Nazca . Now 7692 miles multiplied by the golden ratio again gives 12446, which is the distance from Nazca to Ankor Wat.<br /><br />The spherical triangle between Alaska at the apex, Giza and Nazca gives the Sri Yantra angle of 51 degrees 49 minutes 38.25 seconds , which is the same as the Egyptian pyramid, and also the Vedic Sri Yantra.</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">IT IS NOT GEOMETRY ALONE -- IT IS AMAZING SUPER IMPOSITION OF ORION AND THUBAN</span></b><br />\nI AM TRAINED IN GNOMONIC CHART GREAT CIRCLE NAVIGATION-- &nbsp;AS I AM A MASTER MARINER . &nbsp; I WROTE AN EXAM. &nbsp; &nbsp;I AM AN EXPERT , NOT AN AMATEUR<br />\n<br />\nI DONT WANT TO ARGUE WITH MONKEYS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Hatshesput brought\nhuge quantities of fertile humus top soil from Kerala for her temple garden.\nShe planted Ayurvedic medicinal herbs but it was no use as the climate was\nunsuitable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Vasco Da Gama\nlanded in Calicut in 1498 AD , he asked his men to steam pepper vines and\nfertile topsoil at night . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">When the\nCalicut king was told about this he laughed loudly and said \u201c &nbsp; This white trader\ncan steal my plants and soil\u2014but can he steal my &nbsp;THIRUVATHIRA NJAATTUVELA ( climate ) \u201c&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All were\nsurprised as they had never seen their king laugh so loudly in great glee .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NJAATTUVELA&nbsp; a typical weather where heavy rain and hot\nsunshine is intermittent</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are twenty seven\nnjattuvelas and <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thiruvathira Njattuvela </span>being the heart and soul of the old\nagrarian Kerala society\u2014the seeding time..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Njattuvela is the time when njaru or\nsaplings are planted in the paddy fields, it also means \u2018the position of the\nSun\u2019&nbsp; (njayarinte nila).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any kind of\nseeds or saplings planted would flourish at this time. This is the time to\nplant black pepper, the \u2018Black Gold\u2019 of Kerala.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without any set methods or\nfertilizers any sapling will flourish.. Flourishing crops are assured by the\nuniform availability of sunlight and rains.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Branches of trees and plants are\ncut to grow back and flourish and old timers even say that even your tresses\nwould cascade back to thick growth if you trim them during this period!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/anger-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1496373988435#c288617230463547909\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 2, 2017 at 8:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_76MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDONALD TRUMP<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE JEW HAS NO RIGHT TO BE IN PALESTINE -- THE LAND DOES NOT BELONG TO HIM. REMEMBER THIS WHEN YOU SHIFT THE US EMBASSY FROM TEL-AVIV TO JERUSALEM.. &nbsp;BLACK NIGERIAN MUSLIMS CANNOT CLAIM MECCA .<br />\n<br />\nTHE ANCIENT JEWS WERE DISGRACED NAMBOODIRIS FROM KERALA<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE HOMOSEXUALS AND LEFT HANDED<br />\n<br />\nKERALA NAMBOODIDIRS CREATED JUDAISM AND HEBREW<br />\n<br />\nJUDAISM WAS THE FIRST TO INSIST ON CIRCUMCISION --AS SHIT UNDER THE FORESKIN AFTER ANAL SEX CAUSES DEATH<br />\n<br />\nHEBREW WAS CREATED TO BE WRITTEN FROM RIGHT TO LEFT --AS LEFT HANDERS CAN WRITE BETTER AND FASTER<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT HEBREW WAS CREATED AS VSO ( VERB SUBJECT OBJECT )<br />\n<br />\nNAMBOODIRIS USED VSO FOR CLASSICAL ARABIC TOO LATER<br />\n<br />\nS is the subject, V is the verb and O is the object; the three exhaustive elements of a simple sentence.<br />\n<br />\nMalayalam is subject\u2013object\u2013verb (SOV) language is one in which the subject, object, and verb of a sentence appear or usually appear in that order.<br />\n<br />\nModern Hebrew switched later to SVO like English-- a stupid language<br />\n<br />\nIf English were SOV, \" Dick apple ate\" would be an ordinary sentence, as opposed to the actual Standard English \" Dick ate apple\". Hindi is SOV.<br />\n<br />\nHebrew is subject\u2013verb\u2013object (SVO) is a sentence structure where the subject comes first, the verb second, and the object third. English is SVO.<br />\n<br />\nHindi is SOV like Malayalam and Sanskrit<br />\n<br />\nSanskrit's grammatical structure, words carry extra information with them. Because of this extra information, word order is more flexible in Sanskrit than in English.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSubject/ In a sentence, the thing that performs an action<br />\nVerb/ In a sentence, the word that describes the action<br />\nObject/ In a sentence, the thing that is affected by the action<br />\n<br />\nIN STUPID ENGLISH BANANA CAN EAT ELEPHANT, WHICH CANNOT HAPPEN IN SANSKRIT OR MALAYALAM.<br />\n<br />\nMalayalam and Hindi employs postpositions, whereas English employs prepositions<br />\n<br />\nBOTH MALAYALAM AND SANKRIT HAVE 54 ALPHABETS CORRESPONDING TO SRI YANTRAs TRIPLE INTERSECTIONS<br />\n<br />\nEUROPEAN JEWS NEVER KNEW HEBREW !<br />\n<br />\nNASI IS A HEBREW TERM FOR LEADER OF JEWS OR PRESIDENT OF THE SANHEDRIN . NAZI IS DERIVED FROM NASI.. JEW HITLER WAS A NASI.<br />\n<br />\nThe Sanhedrin trial of Jesus Christ is a cooked up story \u2013as Jesus never existed<br />\n<br />\nKing Phillip II of Spain termed the Jesuits \u201ca synagogue of Hebrews.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe Eden of Genesis (2:8) is Kerala in India.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Old Testament or the Hebrew Bible Zipporah was one of the seven daughters of JETHRO --A SAGE FROM KERALA,<br />\n<br />\nMoses has two sons with the daughter of Jethro, Zipporah- Gershom and Eliezer.<br />\n<br />\nDark skinned Zipporah, cuts her son\u2019s foreskin ( circumcision ) with a sharp stone as a sacrifice to God .<br />\n<br />\nJethro is revered as the spiritual founder, chief prophet, and ancestor of all Druze.<br />\n<br />\nThe Druze have only one pilgrimage site \u2013the tomb of Jethro ( Nabi Shu'ayb) in Hittin in the Lower Galilee .<br />\n<br />\nSome Druze even go for pilgrimage to Ein Qiniyye where the tomb of Jethro\u2019s Hindu sister Shahwana exists.<br />\n<br />\nThere are almost two dozen verses in the Hebrew and Christian Scriptures which state or imply that Moses was the author of Exodus and Deuteronomy.<br />\n<br />\nThis is a LIE\u2014 it was written by a Hindu named Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_76BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When Abraham\u2019s grandson Esau married Hittite women, this was \u201ca source of bitterness of spirit to Isaac and Rebekah,\u201d Esau\u2019s father and mother.\u2014Ge 26:34, 35; 27:46.<br />\n<br />\nGod described the land that the Hittites and other associated nations occupied as \u201ca land flowing with milk and honey.\u201d (Ex 3:8)<br />\n<br />\n\u201c The Hittites in their mountain stronghold would be a formidable foe\u201d. (De 7:1, 2)<br />\n<br />\nUriah was a Hindu Hitite whose wife\u2019s name was Bath Sheba.<br />\n<br />\nKing David saw Uriah's wife naked taking an open bath as was Kerala Namboodiri custom and usurped her.<br />\n<br />\nSolomon was born to Bath Sheba from David\u2019s seed.<br />\n<br />\nKing Solomon levied men from among the Hittites for slavish forced labor. (2Ch 8:7, 8) However, his foreign wives, among whom were Hittite women, caused Solomon to turn away from Jehovah his God. (1Ki 11:1-6)<br />\n<br />\nJehovah, speaking through the prophet Ezekiel, used the term \u201cHittite\u201d in a figurative sense in speaking to Jerusalem. He said: \u201cYour origin and your birth were from the land of the Canaanite. Your father was the Amorite, and your mother was a Hittite.\u201d (Eze 16:3)<br />\n<br />\nThrough King David, sitting on \u201cJehovah\u2019s throne\u201d (1Ch 29:23), with the ark of the covenant on Mount Zion, and finally, the glorious temple built by David\u2019s son Solomon, the fame of Jerusalem came to be spread about among the nations. But Jerusalem became like the Canaanite nations around her, corrupt and immoral, for which Jehovah finally brought desolation upon her.\u2014Eze 16:14, 15.<br />\n<br />\nSorry Rothschild !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_76b+seedK6JD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6093191500896246993\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; SUN NEVER RISES EXACTLY IN THE EAST 090 DEGREES ALL THE TIME<br />\n<br />\nVARAHA AVATAR OF VISHNU TILTED THE EARTHS AXIS TO 23.4 DEGREES<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MEANS THE SUN WILL TRAVEL ENDLESSLY TO AND FRO THE TROPIC OF CANCER TO TROPIC OF CAPRICON OF LAITUTUDE 23.4 DEG<br />\n<br />\nIT WILL RISE EXACTLY EAST ONLY IF THE LATITUDE OF THE PLACE YOUR HOME IS SAME AS THE DECLINATION OF THE SUN.<br />\n<br />\nFOR MY HOME IN CALICUT AT LATITUDE AT 11.25 NORTH -- THE SUN WILL BE EXACTLY OVERHEAD AT NOON ( A STICK ON THE GROUND WILL NOT HAVE A SHADOW ) AND SUN WILL RISE IN THE EAST ( 090 DEG ) WHEN THE SUNS DECLINATION IS 11.25 DEG NORTH--<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL HAPPEN ONLY TWICE IN A YEAR --ONCE WHEN THE SUN IS ON THE PASSAGE NORTHWARD TO THE TROPIC OF CANCER AND ONCE WHEN THE SUN IS ON THE PASSAGE SOUTHWARDS TO THE TROPIC OF CAPRICON<br />\n<br />\nTHEORETICALLY THIS WILL BE THE HOTTEST TWO DAYS IN CALICUT IN YEAR 2017 ( APRIL 19TH AND AUGUST 23RD )<br />\n<br />\nThe site for Giza pyramids and Sphinx was chosen in the year 10600 BC<br />\n<br />\nLatitude of Sphinx is 30 deg and latitude of Mount Kailash is 31 deg<br />\n<br />\nHeight of Mount Kailash ( the pineal gland of the planet ) is 6666 metres and its distance from the North pole is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\ndistance from Giza to North pole is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\nI say the British pyramids were made by Hindu sages because the distance of Mount Kailash to stonehenge is 6666 kms<br />\n<br />\nI CANT PUT DIAGRAMS --SO IT WILL PUT IT IN THE BOTTOM OF THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDue to precession the belt of Orion 'slides' up and down the meridian in the course of 25,765 years or one precessional cycle. It takes 12,883 years for Orion to descend from top to bottom and another 12,883 years to ascend from bottom to top again..<br />\n<br />\nBy generating a simulation of the night sky at 10,600 BC, we can see that the Orion crosses the meridian at an altitude of only 9 degrees 20' above the horizon. This is the lowest altitude it will reach in its precessional cycle.<br />\nThus, by mimicking the layout of the belt stars in the sky in 10,60 BC, the pyramids not only signifies a specific epoch but also marks the beginning of a precessional half-cycle<br />\n<br />\nSPHINX SHOWS LEO ( LION ) CONSTELLATION OF 10600 BC.. The deglaciation ultimately caused a 300-foot rise in the sea level.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_159B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1491028585062963036\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_159M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1496923291948#c1491028585062963036\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 8, 2017 at 5:31 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_159MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nUSING ROUNDED OFF FULL NUMBERS --each sign of the zodiac is composed of 30 degrees, each astrological age might be thought to last about 72 (years) \u00d7 30 (degrees) = about 2160 years. This means the Sun crosses the equator at the vernal equinox moving backwards against the fixed stars from one year to the next at the rate of one degree in seventy-two years, one constellation (on average) in about 2160 years, and the whole twelve signs in about 25,920 years, sometimes called a Platonic Year.<br />\n<br />\nINDIANS WERE THE FIRST TO WRITE DOWN ALL THIS. KERALA SAGES WROTE THE BIBLE COSMOLOGY FOR THE ROMAN EMPEROR --ONLY WE KNEW ASTROLOGY THOSE DAYS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo_22.html<br />\n<br />\nIn the pre-dawn on the vernal equinox in 10600BC with the sun some 12 degrees below the horizon, the Great Sphinx would have gazed directly at his own celestial counterpart, the constellation of Leo- which experienced what astronomers known its 'helical rising' at this moment<br />\n<br />\nThe sphinx site was chosen 30 degrees north of the Equator so that as the Earth turns it comes as close as 6.5 degrees to the ecliptic-- a shocking statement which is pointing directly to the obliquity of the Earth's polar axis .<br />\n<br />\n30 minus 6.5 is 23.5 deg --tilt of the earth's axis<br />\n<br />\n2 x 23.5\u00ba = 47\u00ba is shocking as 47\u00ba is the radius of the precessional circle traced in the sky over 25,765 years by the Earth's tilted axis.<br />\n<br />\nThe sloping side of the great pyramid is 51.8 deg --the Sri Yantra angle are 51.84 deg<br />\n<br />\nThe great pyramid of Cheops Egypt has a base angle 51 deg 49 minutes like the 10000 year old Sri Yantra large pyramid, showing exactly the same relationship between pi and phi .<br />\n<br />\nThe ratio of the hypotenuse to half the base is phi, the Golden Ratio-- or 'divine proportion', given by (1 + square-root 5)/2 (its value to five decimal places is 1.61803). It is a sure indication that the Pharaoh's architects were NOT from Egypt.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedFpFHD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedFpFHD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
