font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAHU AND KETU ARE\nCOSMIC ALLEGORIES WHO SUBSTITUTE PLANETS URANUS, NEPTUNE AND PLUTO -- ALONG\nWITH MOON<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN EAGLE GARUDA FLEW\nOFF WITH THE POT OF AMRIT --4 DROPS FELL ON EARTH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">4 drops fell on 4\nplaces on earth- Prayag ( named by Muslim invaders as Allah- abad ), Hardwar,\nUjain and Nasik. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since then, Rahu and\nKetu were deprived of the amrit by Sun and Moon sneaking to Mohini , they\ndeveloped bitter enmity against the Sun and the Moon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nodal points of the\nMoon what we call Rahu and Ketu are, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces\nof two celestial bodies, the Moon and the Earth and hence are very influential\non the life of mankind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These points affect our\ncentral nervous system as well as sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous\nsystems which work on the principles of electro-magnetic systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have direct\nimpacts on the generation of signals of informations in neurons and\nneuro-transmitters and their movement from brain to various parts of our body\nand back to the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nodal points (Rahu\nand Ketu) are psycho-somatic which govern not only the stress level of our mind\nbut also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the\nheart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild used his\nFAKE KaliDASA to inject poison into Rahu and Ketu in his FAKE work Uttar\nKalamrita .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalidasa was a FAKE\npoet created and backdated by Jew Rothschild. NOT an astronomer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">North node Rahu is like\ngravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether\nwe have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter\nin a natal chart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL\nANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING\nCRITICAL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Moon (Chandra)\ncompletes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of\nearth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at\nanother time while travelling from north to south.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ascending point is\ncalled \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have\nretrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has been established\nbeyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more\nthan other planets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since Rahu and Ketu are\nin exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered\nsimultaneously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu has the properties\nof Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They indicate the\nprecise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our\nlife- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important\npart in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their role as Karmic\nindicators of our life is connected with their power to cause eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The eclipses occur in\nthe vicinity of Rahu Ketu during the Full Moon and the New Moon. (During New\nMoon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place.\nAt the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse\ntakes place.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As they symbolically\neclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part\nto play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal\nwith the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have been given\nthe status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed\non eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have no substance\nand are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and\nspiritual significance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They work in unison 180\ndegrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our\nlives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with\ntheir shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is always difficult\nto gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup.\nThey effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at\nthe time..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ketu deals with the\npast Karma and Rahu with the future.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five instincts that\nkeep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire,\npassions) Krodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment)\nLobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We need to control our\ninstincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu\nand Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by\nexaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are tied down to the\ncycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower\nselves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of\nthe earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu Ketu deals with\nthe inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to\nconstantly make and the inner dilemmas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahu takes people off\ntheir Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is\nconsidered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When all the planets\nare hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's\nsouth node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalasarpa yogam is a\nkarmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">People go for Kalsarpa\nShanti Pooja to Trimbakeshwar Temple at Nasik .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A FAKE GURU AND A DROHI\nNAMED SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TWEETED AND TOLD ON NDTV, THAT LORD AYYAPPA ( 9TH\nAVATAR OF VISHNU ) IS A PRODUCT OF A HOMOSEXUAL UNION BETWEEN LORD SHIVA AND\nLORD VISHNU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE HAS USED THE STORY\nOF MOHINI AND RAHU/ KETU TO LIE THAT SANATANA DHARMA SUPPORTS ANAL SEX --AND\nTHAT VISHNU ( MOHINI ) AND SHIVA HAD ANAL SEX TO PRODUCE LORD AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs\n9TH AVATAR )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI GAVE THIS DROHI\nSRI SRI RAVISHANKAR A PADMA VIBHUSHAN--INDIAs SECOND HIGHEST AWARD.. ON 16TH\nNOV 2017, THIS RASCAL WILL BE RUNNING TO AYODHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY -- VISHNU AND\nSHIVA ARE COSMIC FORCES-- VISHNU AVATAR AYYAPPA ( IMHOTEP ) WAS A MORTAL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">November 13, 2017 at\n8:18 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">VISHNU CAME AS\nBEAUTIFUL DAMSEL MOHINI \u2026 TWO DANAVAS RAHU AND KETU WERE SITTING IN LINE TO\nHAVE THEIR SHARE OF AMRIT ( AMBROSIA ). ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHIVA WAS IN A DAZE\nHAVING DRUNK HALAHALA ( POLYMERISED POISON ) THE SIDE PRODUCT OF COSMIC OCEAN\nCHURNING ( SAMUDRA MANTHAN )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR\nSAID ON TV AND TWEETED THAT VISHNU AND SHIVA HAD MALE ANAL SEX AND PRODUCED\nAYYAPPA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SORRY THIS RASCAL SRI SRI\nRAVISHANKAR DOES NOT KNOW THAT VISHNU/ SHIVA / RAHU/ KETU ARE ALL COSMIC\nALLEGORIES. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI GAVE THIS FELLOW\nINDIAs SECOND HIGHEST AWARD\u2014PADMA VIBHUSHAN.. PM ATAL BIHAREE VAJPAYEE ( LIKE\nNARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI ) ALSO PUSHED HOMOSEXUAL ANAL SEX\u2026 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I APPRECIATE ASADUDDIN\nOWAISI FOR DECLARING THAT SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR IS A INSIGNIFICANT FELLOW AT WHOM\nEVEN A DOG DOES NOT BARK\u2014AND THAT THIS RASCAL DOES NOT REPRESENT HINDUS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE NEED CHECKS AND\nBALANCES IN INDIA.. RSS/ CHP/ AVBP/ BENAMI MEDIA/ MODI / WHITE ZIONIST JEWS/\nWHITE COMMIES , ALL WERE SHORING UP FAKE GURU SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR \u2013WHO DOES NOT\nREPRESENT HINDUS OR INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET ME EXPLAIN RAHU AND\nKETU.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY VESTIGE OF\nASTRONOMY KNOWLEDGE WENT OUT FROM ANCIENT KERALA KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAHU AND KETU IS MAJOR\nPART OF KERALA ASTROLOGY. WE DON\u2019T USE URANUS , NEPTUNE AND PLUTO AS THESE\nPLANETS STAY IN ONE SINGLE RASHI FOR TOO LOG AND ARE TOO FAR AWAY. WE USE RAHU/\nKETU/ MOON INSTEAD ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lunar eclipse happens\nwhen the Earth, sun and moon align in space, with Earth in between the sun and\nmoon. At such times, Earth\u2019s shadow falls on the full moon, causing a lunar\neclipse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A solar eclipse happens\nat the opposite phase of the moon \u2013 new moon \u2013 when the moon passes between the\nsun and Earth. Why aren\u2019t there eclipses at every full and new moon?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moon takes about a\nmonth to orbit around the Earth. If the moon orbited in the same plane as the\necliptic \u2013 Earth\u2019s orbital plane \u2013 we would have two eclipses every month.\nThere\u2019d be an eclipse of the moon at every full moon. And, two weeks later,\nthere\u2019d be an eclipse of the sun at new moon for a total of at least 24\neclipses every year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the moon\u2019s orbit is\ninclined to Earth\u2019s orbit by about 5 degrees. Twice a month the moon intersects\nthe ecliptic \u2013 Earth\u2019s orbital plane \u2013 at points called nodes. If the moon is\ngoing from south to north in its orbit, it\u2019s called an ascending node.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the moon is going\nfrom north to south, it\u2019s a descending node. If the full moon or new moon is\nappreciably close to one of these nodes, then an eclipse is not only possible \u2013\nbut inevitable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Solar and lunar\neclipses always come in pairs, with one following the other in a period of one\nfortnight (approximately two weeks). For example, in 2017, the descending node\npartial lunar eclipse on August 7-8 was followed by an ascending node total\nsolar eclipse on August 21.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, the lunar nodes\nare the orbital nodes of the Moon, that is, the points where the orbit of the\nMoon crosses the ecliptic. The ascending or north node is where the moon\ncrosses from south of the ecliptic to north of the ecliptic. The descending or\nsouth node is where it crosses from north of the ecliptic to south of the\necliptic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eclipses occur only\nnear the lunar nodes: Solar eclipses occur when the passage of the Moon through\na node coincides with the new moon; lunar eclipses occur when passage coincides\nwith the full moon. A lunar eclipse may occur if there is a full moon within\n11\u00b0 38' (Celestial Longitude), of a node, and a solar eclipse may occur if\nthere is a new moon within 17\u00b0 25' of a node.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The plane of the lunar\norbit precesses in space and hence the lunar nodes precess around the ecliptic,\ncompleting a revolution (called a draconic or nodal period) in 6798.3835 days\nor 18.612958 years (note that this is not the same length as a saros). The same\ncycle, measured against an inertial frame of reference such as ICRS (relative\nto the stars) is 18.599525 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two solar eclipses\nin July 2000 (Solar eclipse of July 1, 2000 and Solar eclipse of July 31, 2000)\nwere around the time that the moon was at its ascending node. Ascending-node\neclipses recur after one draconic year on average, which is about 0.94901\nGregorian years, and the same goes for descending-node eclipses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ascending node is\nreferred to as RAHU its symbol is U+260A.svg. The descending node is called\nKETU and its symbol is the inversion of that of the ascending node: U+260B.svg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&amp;v=xwGs8_otT64<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lunar orbit is\ninclined by about 5.1 degrees to the ecliptic: hence the Moon can be up to\nabout 5 degrees north or south of the ecliptic. The ecliptic is inclined by\nabout 23.4\u00b0 to the celestial equator, the plane that is perpendicular to the\nrotational axis of the Earth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a consequence, once\nduring the 18.6-year nodal period, when the ascending node of the Moon's orbit\ncoincides with the vernal equinox, then the Moon reaches extreme northern and\nsouthern declinations. Then it also has its extreme northern and southern\nazimuth points of rising and setting on the horizon; its extreme lowest and\nhighest altitude when crossing the meridian; and potentially extreme late first\nsightings of the new moon. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furthermore,\noccultations by the Moon of the star group the Pleiades ( Karthika ) , which\nare over 4\u00b0 North of the ecliptic, occur during a comparatively brief period\nonce every nodal period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The constellation of\nKarthika are the Pleiades, the Seven Sisters in the Western. In the Indian they\nare the seven wives of the Sapta Rishis !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JNU COMMIES AND LITERARY\nFEST DROHIS RIDICULED THAT LORD SHIVA WAS CREWING THE WIVES OF THE SAPT RISHIS\nWHILE THEY WERE MEDITATING IN DEODHAR FOREST \u2013SHIVA USED TO WALK WITH HIS ERECT\nPRICK OUT AND THE HRNY WOVES WOULD RUN AFTER HIM SHEDDING THEIR CLOTHES. SORRY\n, SHIVA AND SAPT RISHIS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES. SWASTIKA SYMBOL ADOPTED BY JEW\nHITLER IS SAPT RISHIS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/polaris-and-great-bear-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">############# Husband -\nstar/ Wife ############# <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krathu- Dubhe /\nSanthati<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atri- Megrez / Anasuya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vasishta - Mizar /\nArundhathi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Angiras - Alioth /\nShraddha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pulaha- Merak /\nHavubhuh<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pulastya -Phecd /Gathih<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhrigu -Alkaid / Puloma<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Western Astronomy,\ntheir names of the wives are Maia, Electra ,Taygete, Alcyone, Caleano, Sterope and\nMerope. Every vestige of western astronomy is lifted from Kodungallur\nUniversity owned by the Calicut king.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/aghoris-corpse-eaters-of-india-capt.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Sun transits\nthe constellation of Karthika ( from May 11th onwards ), Kerala gets relief\nfrom extreme heat ( as it lies 10.30 North of the Equator ) from the months of\nSidereal Aquarius and Pisces, Kumbham and Meenam and the parched earth begins\nto get rainfall. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rain accelerates during\nthe Sun's transit of Rohini ( Aldebaran, from May 25th onwards ) and then from\nMriga Sira Njattuvela ( solar transit of Meissa ) onwards ( from June 8 ),\nKerala gets tremendous rains !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN 1498 AD VASCO DA\nGAMA s MEN STARTED STEALING PEPPER VINES AND STARTED STASHING AWAY IN POTS\nFILLED WITH KERALAs FERTILE SOIL.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN THE KING OF\nCALICUT AMRIN WAS TOLD HE STARTED LAUGHING LOUDLY\u2014HE CRIED \u201c CAN THAT PORUGUESE\nFELLOW STEAL OUR THIRUVATHIRA NJATHUVELA ( SEASON OF ALTERNATE HEAVY RAIN AND\nBLAZING SUN )?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In our ancient Vedic\ntexts it is written that it was nectar that rained during Thiruvathira\nNjattuvela .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rains will be incessant\nduring Thiruvathira Njattuvela ( Thiri muriyathe peythu nirayunna Thiruvathira\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sun position in the\n27 star signs is called \u2018Njattuvela\u2019 each being thirteen and a half days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today we collect\nthis Thiruvathira rain water ( straight to a wide mouthed glass bowl ) for\nmaking herbal LEHYAM for lactating mothers <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Njattuvela before\nKarthika, is good for digging wells. The wells dug during the Karthika\nNjattuvela ( when the Sun transits the Pleiades ), will be everlasting as their\nwater will not dry up. ( Karthika kalil kakkakalu nananjal mukkathil mukkum ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seeds planted after\nRohini Njattuvela ( Alpha Tauri ) need only little care. ( Rohinikappuram vitha\nkuruchu mathi ). Meaning you can get the fruits effortlessly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Heavy rains will lash\nduring the Earth's transit of Lamda Orionis ( Makirythil Mazha Madhichu ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fierce rains to be\nexpected during the Earth's tranist of Beta Geminorum ( Punarthathil\npulappikkunna mazha ) ( Punartha thadiyan poozhi therippikkum ). ( Punarthathil\npoozhan keruka ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good rains also during\nthe Earth's transit olf Delta Cancri ( Pooyathil pothumpurahtum nellu ). (\nPooyathil mazha peythal pullum nellu ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Monsoon fails,\nif the Njattuvelas fail, there wil be famine and drought ! It has NOT happened\nin Kerala in living memory<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The major Four Seasons\nof the Western System ( spring, summer, autumn and winter ) and the six seasons\nof the Indian system ( vasanta, greeshma, varsha, sharat, hemanta, sisira ) are\ncaused by the apparent solar transits or the real Earth's transits of the\nConstellational Zodiac.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The six seasons of\nKerala based on the Sun position Varsham (Cancer-Leo), Sarath (Virgo-Libra),\nHemandam(Scorpio-Saggitarius), Sisiram(Capricon-Aquarius), Vasantham (Pisces \u2013\nAries), Greeshmam (Taurus-Gemini) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian astronomical\nsystem is more detailed in that it deals with 27 stars signs coming from 18\nRasis but within the influence of the Zodiac for charting the movement of the\nSun and the Moon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Panchangam day\ncommences at sunrise with 60 units called Nazhikas (24 minutes) subdivided into\n60 units of Vinazhikas (24 seconds) for each nazhika.. The 60 Nazhikas are\ndivided into 4 quarters called padam. A star could be partly in one\nConstellation and the rest in the next. As an example Karthika (Pleiades) has\nthe first quarter in Medam (Aries) and the balance in Taurus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishu 8 or the Sun's\nentry into the eighth degree of sidereal Aries, is the time for the farmers to\nsow. Vishu is an agricultural festival, based on the Wisdom of the Heavens and\nnot a religious festiva<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/vishu-new-year-festival-of-kerala-capt.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Py0iGumX5Hg<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5350110826110378293\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_185M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1510757898942#c5350110826110378293\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 15, 2017 at 8:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe most famous Egyptian queen was Nefertari , principal wife of King Ramses II.<br />\n<br />\nShe is the most celebrated and widely depicted among the 4 famous Egyptians queens - Cleopatra, Nefertiti, and Hatshepsut.<br />\n<br />\nNefertari was born in the Land of Punt ( North Kerala \u2013where I am from ).&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n&nbsp;I have seen several depictions of Nefertari burning incense ( from Punt ) in alabaster bowls\u2014which is nothing but a BHARANI from Calicut.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNefertari appears as Ramesses II\u2019s consort on many statues in both Luxor and Karnak.. &nbsp;&nbsp;Nefertari is depicted in statue form at the great temple, in Abu Simbel..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe small temple at Abu Simbel was dedicated to Nefertari and Goddess Hathor.. The dedication text on one of the buttresses states :&nbsp; \u2018\u2019 A temple of great and Mighty monuments, for the Great Royal Wife Nefertari Meryetmut, for whose sake the very sun does shine, given life and beloved\u201d<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe two colossal standing statues of Nefertari in front of the small temple are equal in size to those of Ramesses II. &nbsp;&nbsp;I have seen this and the pyramids / sphinx of Giza.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAfter Nefertari\u2019s death she was buried in tomb QV66 in the Valley of the Queens.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBelow Goddess Hathor giving the Aankh to Nefertari<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG7DJM9MIAE\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG7DJM9MIAE</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nQueen Nefertiti was the chief wife of &nbsp;of Pharaoh Akhenaten<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNefertiti had many titles including Lady of two lands Punt and Egypt..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nQueen Nefertiti ruled Egypt when her &nbsp;husband Pharaoh Akhentaten was in ill health for a few years before he died. She is remembered as a wise ruler.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAfter Akhentaten died the people wanted her to continue .. Nefertiti, like &nbsp;female Pharaoh Hatshepsut, assumed the kingship under the name Pharaoh Neferneferuaten after her husband's death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_189M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WIVES OF TRINITY GODS ARE PART OF THIS DANCE WHICH SUSTAIN THIS COSMOS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">SARASWATI WIFE OF BRAHMA IS THE MOTHER LIGHT ENERGY FROM QUASARS ( FASTER THAN LIGHT IN SPEED )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</a><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KALI THE WIFE OF SHIVA IS DARK ENERGY OF THE COSMOS --SHE REPRESENTS THE BLACK HOLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; I HAVE VISITED THE GRAVE ..<br />\n<br />\nBALLS ---YOU LYING WHITE HISTORIANS ..<br />\n<br />\nTEAK TREES DONT GROW OVERNIGHT--IT TAKES CENTURIES FOR A TEAK TREE TO AGE AND MATURE FOR SHIP BUILDING WOOD.<br />\n<br />\nBEYPORE HAS BEEN RECEIVING TEAK WOOD FOR MILINNIUMS FROM NILAMBUR --WHEN THE WHITE MAN WAS DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE<br />\n<br />\nTHE PEOPLE WHO FLOATED THE WOODEN LOGS FROM NILAMBUR TO BEYORE WERE CALLED MARAKKARS ( WOOD PEOPLE )--MARAM MEANS WOOD.<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALICUT KINGs ADMIRALS WERE CALLED MARAKKAR ( FROM THIS ANCIENT CLAN )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kunhali_Marakkar</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TRIED TO MAKE THE LAST MUSLIM MARAKKAR NO 4 TO TAKE OVER AS KING OF CALICUT BY DECEIT ( COUP ) ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE CALICUT KING FUCKED HIM WHEN MARAKKAR BABY NO 4 , GOT TOO BIG FOR HIS BOOTS.<br />\n<br />\nHE CUT OFF THE TAIL OF THE KINGs ELEPHANT AND CUT OFF THE EARS OF THE KINGs EMISSARY WHO WENT TO HIM TO ARRANGE A MEETING .<br />\n<br />\nAND CONOLLY DID NOT BUILD ANY CANAL--HE JUST DEEPENED A CANAL WHICH EXISTED FOR MILLINIUMS FROM BEYPORE TO CALICUT<br />\n<br />\nBEYPORE BUILD SHIPS FOR KING SOLOMON 2950 YEARS AGO WITH INNDER FITTINGS OF SANDAL WOOD. KING SOLOMON HAD MARRIED QUEEN OF SHEBA --SHEBA IS THE NAME FOR MALABAR ( PUNT/ OPHIR / NORTH KERALA )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE ROMAN CIVILIZATION DIED BECAUSE THE CHRISTIAN CUNTS USED LEAD TO LINE THE FRESH WATER AQUEDUCTS --WHICH BROUGHT WATER TO ROME..<br />\n<br />\nTHE VANDALS / VISIGOTHS INVITED BY POPE TO SACK HIS OWN BASTION ROME ( TO DESTROY HINDU TEMPLES ) --IN FACT DID A FAVOUR IN DISGUISE ..<br />\n<br />\nTO KILL ROME AS A CITY , THE VANDALS / VISIGOTHS ( CANNIBALS PAID IN PEPPER ) CUT OF FRESH WATER SUPPLY BY DAMAGING CRITICAL PARTS OF THE AQUEDUCTS ..<br />\n<br />\nIF THEY HAD NOT DONE IT-- PROBABLY ITALIANS WOULD LOOK LIKE CUNTS TODAY --WITH LEAD POISON DAMAGED DNA..<br />\n<br />\nPOOR ITALIAN WAITRESS AND HER HALF BREED CHILDREN -- THEY KNOW SHIT !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><b style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: xx-large;\"></b></span>\n\n<br />\n<div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4300396988934819416\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; color: black; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_158M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; In the same way, Hindu Gurus and spiritual texts do not command you to believe; they lead you to understand.<br />\n<br />\nThe goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely believe in God, but to know God directly.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is the first step in one's search for God.
