Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1513299301098#c2062343270619180569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">December 15, 2017 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME TO EXPOUND ON QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT IN VEDAS</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHY DOES WIKIPEDIA BAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL. BECAUSE I GO WITH VEDAS AGAINST STUPID PEOPLE LIKE ISAAC NEWTON AND ALBERT EINSTEIN ( WHO SAYS FASTER THAN SPEED OF LIGHT IS IMPOSSIBLE ) \u2013 BOTH THIEVES WHO STOLE FROM VEDAS WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ANCIENT VEDIC ASTROLOGY FACTORED IN QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One of the core objections to astrology is that there is no known scientific mechanism to account for how it all works. Well for this modern scientists have to work hard for another 500 years . The lack of a mechanism using 5 low bandwidth human senses is MAD justification for dismissing a Quantum entanglement phenomenon.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement says that two entangled particles affect each other irrespective of distance and time. We humans are NOT what you see in the mirror, we are balls of energy called SOULS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">IN KERALA ASTROLOGY WE RUSTLE COWRIE SHELLS. MY WIFE MATCHED MORE THAN 500 HOROSCOPES FOR MY ELDER SONs BRIDE . AT EVERY INSTANCE THE ASTROLOGER RUSTLED COWRIE SHELLS TO PICK UP A RANDOM NUMBER OF SHELLS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The lodestone (compass) was used successfully for several millennia in India. Kerala navigators traded with crete . Yet, no white man understood the Earth's magnetic field until the 20th century.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Mahabharata Arjuna shot his arrow into the red ruby eye of a magnetic fish floating unsteadily overhead in a transparent rotating bowl filled with water, by looking at its reflection in a placid pool of water below. He won the hand of Princess Draupadi at the Swayamvar. This is the ultimate test of human consciousness .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only a couple of mammals like elephant, dolphin and bonobos can pass the mirror and colour test.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement breaks the bedrock rules of standard physics: that nothing can travel FASTER THAN LIGHT , that objects are only influenced by their immediate surroundings\u2014that we need to verify by using our limited bandwith five sense for scientific approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through quantum entanglement, seemingly independent particles become intertwined. Entangled atoms can no longer be considered separate entities, but make sense only as part of a whole \u2014 even though the atoms may be far apart.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entangled particles can be used for \u201cquantum communication\u201d \u2014 a means of sending super secure messages that doesn't rely on cables, wireless signals, or code.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through a trick of quantum mechanics, you can link two particles in a special way, separate them, and then observe the effects of one upon the other over large distances. This is known as quantum entanglement \u2014 placing two objects in the same entangled quantum state.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entanglement can be demonstrated in the lab with particles of light. When these two particles, or photons, are separated over large distances, they are still correlated with each other. If you measure one particle, the other particle's state will be determined immediately no matter how far it is away.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because any interference with an entangled particle, even the mere act of observing it, automatically affects its partner, these missives can't be hacked. To hear quantum physicists tell it, entangled particles could help build a \u201cquantum internet,\u201d give rise to new kinds of coding, and allow for faster-than-light communication \u2014 possibilities that have powerful appeal in an era where hospitals, credit card companies, government agencies, even election systems are falling victim to cyber attacks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement is a quantum mechanical phenomenon in which the quantum states of two or more objects have to be described with reference to each other, even though the individual objects may be spatially separated. This leads to correlations between observable physical properties of the systems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"font-size: medium; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_18T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5166903869757240958\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">For example, it is possible to prepare two particles in a single quantum state such that when one is observed to be spin-up, the other one will always be observed to be spin-down and vice versa, this despite the fact that it is impossible to predict, according to quantum mechanics, which set of measurements will be observed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">As a result, measurements performed on one system seem to be instantaneously influencing other systems entangled with it. Quantum entanglement has applications in the emerging technologies of quantum computing and quantum cryptography, and has been used to realize quantum teleportation experimentally.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Imagine you are a photon, a packet of light. You are a tiny blip of energy, hurtling through the universe on your own. But you have a twin, another photon to whom you have been intimately connected since the day you were born. No matter what distance separates you, be it the width of a lab bench or the breadth of the universe, you mirror each other. Whatever happens to your twin instantaneously affects you, and vice versa.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entangled photons don't need wires or cables to link them, but on Earth it is necessary to use a fiber optic cable to transmit one of the particles to its desired location. But fibers absorb light as the photon travels through, so the quantum connection weakens with every mile the particle is transmitted. The previous distance record for what's known as quantum teleportation, or sending information via entangled particles, was about 141 kilometers</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But no light gets absorbed in space, because there's nothing to do the absorbing. Space is empty. This means that entangled particles can be transmitted long distances across the vacuum and not lose information. Entangled particles sent through space could vastly extend the distance across which entangled particles communicate. The behavior of entangled particles in space and across vast distances offers insight into the nature of space-time.. Entangled photons know what their partner is doing</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Modern physicists know that there are actually four fundamental forces: the two nuclear forces, the electromagnetic force and the gravitational force. All of these play a role in binding matter together, from the tiniest of atoms to the largest of planets.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is well known in physics experiments that the observer can become entangled with the object that they are measuring, changing the measurement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that we are all entangled in some way, and there really is a connection between every living thing in the galaxy. The effects of quantum entanglement tend to be very small for everyday objects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands used their bodies for generating laser beams.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Processes in large biomolecules could be influenced by quantum entanglement effects. In the world of condensed matter physics \u2014 the study of solids \u2014 entanglement is more commonplace.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A superconductor floating over a magnet in the Meissner effect \u2014 are from macroscopic quantum entanglements of electrons, or a spooky \"force\" acting over large distances. Quantum entanglement plays a role in modern physics and it is a binding principle for matter and energy. However, quantum entanglement on a large scale is difficult to achieve, and even more difficult to observe in living creatures.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Scientists are still struggling to develop a theory of Quantum Gravity and as a result a Grand Unified Field Theory\u2014which is represented by the divine 3D geometry of Sri Yantra\u2014the symbol of OM , whose digital number is 108.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Vedic Puranas the Great bear constellation stars ( 7 Sapt Rishis ) and entangled with their 7 wives in Pleiades constellation</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2716751153349151345\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_19M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; For Quantum entanglement, the entangled particles have to originate from the same source</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WATER HAS QUANTUM MEMORY. THE REASON WHY HINDUS MUST IMEMRSE THEIR CREMATED ASHES IN A WATER BODY LIKE A RIVER OR SEA</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Solid-state physicists study entanglement of billions and billions of particles together, often with spectacular new results such as superconductivity.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">TAMAS AND RAJAS SHOWCASE QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT FOR THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR AMONG HUMANS</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The Trinity ( Brahma- Rajas , Vishnu \u2013Sattva\u2014Shiva \u2013Tamas ) represents the organization of primal energy , the foundation of universal laws , relativity , stability of nature. The law holds together the endless spiral of galaxies .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe. No life is possible on earth without this subtle tension . It is a perfect tango of dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and constantly .</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost , the universe will spiral out of control and end. Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Particle/ anti particle</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Black hole/ quasar</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Positive pole/ negative</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Counterclockwise vortex/ clockwise</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Gravity / Antigravity</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">These dual poles of Tamas \u2013Rajas ( Yin Yang ) are connected via consciousness. It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A moron like Isaac Newton tries to explain the invisible through the visible. How stupid can you be !</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Varahamihira the great Astrologer and astronomer from wrote 4600 years ago, in the opening of his Samhita, \u201c It has been said in Vedas that the first primeval thing was darkness, which is not identical with the black colour, but a kind of non-existence like the state of a sleeping person.\u201d</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">God has given us 5 senses of narrow bandwidth, so that we do NOT have an information overload breakdown.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The quantum world cannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect laws of classical physics. Prana is amplified and focused like a laser beam.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum Physics like Vedas tell us that particles and waves are the same thing. Your intention determines whether you see a particle or a wave.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles. Quantum physics has showed the ancient Indian Yogis were NOT mere dreamers of cosmic consciousness, where our bodies, our brain and its mind, as inextricably joined with other matter and the mega dipole of universe .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Indian Vedic maharishis had the inherent ability to go on either side of the narrow band of five human senses. They could transcend the senses and limitations of space-time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In the quantum picture, electromagnetic radiation has a dual nature, existing both as waves and as streams of particles called photons. Photons are exchanged whenever electrically charged subatomic particles interact.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The photon has no electric charge, so it does not experience the electromagnetic force itself\u2014in other words, photons cannot interact with one another.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">At the level of quantum reality the universe is not made up of things. It is comprised of oscillating fields of energy. In the quantum domain everything is interrelated. The universe is filled with an incomprehensible amount of energy and substance\u2014some of which is imperceptible to our physical senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Radio waves, microwaves, infrared waves and microscopic particles are just a few examples of the infinite aspects of reality that elude the perception of our 5 senses.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Narrowing our 5 senses bands , serve as a filter or squelch to prevent breakdown due to excess information. The 5 senses create the set for the stage we call our lives.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ALL INITIAL QUANTUM PHYCISISTS LEARNT SANSKRIT, AND THE VEDAS . THEY PONDERED ABOUT MAYA BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN. . THEY ARE NOT STUPID TO DO THIS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The theory of Maya is one of the grand pillars upon which Vedanta rests. The word origin of MAYA is derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and YA ( that ). The term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology, Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis of the reclining Vishnu. MAYA is the veritable fabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the morphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya just as magicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Our 5 senses serve as a filter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our physical existence. The quantum world cannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect laws of classical physics.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 5--</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_20MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_20BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_20B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3316054655910645909\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 4-</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Maya is invisible and beyond sense-perception. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1513485276470#c5683279986965284953\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 17, 2017 at 10:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_109MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nRaj Pandey<br />\nJune 22, 2017 at 10:58 AM<br />\n<br />\nCaptain what exactly is/was Proto Indo European (PIE) language? Is it really the ancestor of Sanskrit? Did Sanskrit have an ancestor? Latin, Russian, German are derived from Sanskrit or all 4 including Sanskrit are derived from PIE as the Euro-centrists claim?<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n############<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 22, 2017 at 11:13 AM<br />\n<br />\nSANSKRIT IS THE OLDEST LANGUAGE ON THE PLANET<br />\n<br />\nMALAYALAM IS SECOND OLDEST<br />\n<br />\nTAMIL IS THIRD<br />\n<br />\nREST OF THE LANGUAGES CAME SEVERAL MILLENNIUMS YEARS LATER<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nDelete<br />\n###############<br />\nScott<br />\nDecember 17, 2017 at 9:31 AM<br />\n<br />\nPIE is the most recent common ancestor of the ten branches of the Indo-European family. You can see the family tree here! https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indo-European_languages#/media/File:IndoEuropeanTree.svg<br />\n<br />\nAs you can see, Sanskrit is a descendant of Vedic Sanskrit, which in turn is a descendant of Proto-Indo-Aryan, which is a descendant of Proto-Indo-Iranian, which descends from PIE. Latin is in the Italic branch of the family, Russian is in the Slavic, and German is in the Germanic. None of these are derived from each other, but rather are sister languages. They all descend from PIE originally.<br />\n<br />\nDelete<br />\n############<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 17, 2017 at 10:03 AM<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS IN SANSKRIT WAS TRANSMITTED ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES , BEFORE THEY WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO<br />\n<br />\nWE DONT SUBSCRIBE TO PIE BULL ANYMORE<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; Much of this inter-cellular signaling is electrochemical in nature<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With up to 100 trillion cells it is hard to imagine how that many cells can remain in harmony by the slow process of electrochemical signaling especially under times of great distress when survival of the entire organism is at stake and / or requires extremely rapid and coordinated responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Epigenetics which is the study of the mechanisms by which the environment influences cells and their offspring without changing genetic codes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Inter-cellular communication is especially critical in embryonic development. From a single fertilized egg, the embryo divides thousands of times and each time producing identical offspring cells called stem cells. Then at some critical point when the embryo has reached a certain size, something truly miraculous happens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED TO 4--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cells begin to differentiate and form groups of like cells that will eventually become all the highly specialized tissues and organs that make up the human body. Out of the entire mass of undifferentiated cells making up the embryo, how does a particular stem cell suddenly know that it is to transform into a heart cell, liver cell, neuron, etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Clearly, some of the differentiation results from electrochemical signaling with the immediate surrounding cells. This exchange is certainly necessary and provides information about how a cell must change to express itself correctly to become the right type of cell at the right place and at the right time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">In higher organisms with brains, the massively parallel processing capabilities of the brain structures are capable of simultaneously resonating with QUANTUM HOLOGRAM information at an incredible range of frequencies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">AKASHIK RECORD of Vedas described as an all pervasive foundation that contains not only all knowledge of the human experience but also the entire history of the universe. Our normal five senses cannot access this information but it can be accessed through spiritual practices such as meditation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">We live in a universe that operates according to the following principles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">It is:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Self-organizing - All non living and living matter seems to be the result of the emergent complexity adapting and evolving in response to changes in the environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Intelligent - The universe utilizes information, processes it and assigns meaning to it. It seems to evaluate new experiences against stored information and \"chooses\" actions based on that evaluation based on feedback mechanisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Creative - All matter in the universe appears to be interconnected and communicates with itself to continually form more complex systems. These systems seem to regulate and organize themselves in ways that are flexible, adaptable and exhibit some form of purposeful behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Interactive - All matter continually interacts with all other matter. There is no such thing as independent action. Everything is defined in relationship to everything else.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Learning - Experience is retained in nature\u2019s memory, the Quantum Hologram. Once information is created it is always available and never forgotten.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Participatory -The role of intention in conscious matter has demonstrable effect.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Evolving - Since its beginnings, nature has been developing into ever increasing levels of complexity in response to environmental changes or pressures resulting from natural processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Non-locally connected - All things in nature are interconnected in a very fundamental way beyond time and space. The exchange of information between any two objects occurs instantaneously no matter their space time separation and these interconnections cannot be shielded or attenuated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 17.6px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Based on Quantum Principles - From the micro scale of subatomic particles to the largest objects in the cosmos and everything in between, all matter displays the quantum characteristics of entanglement, coherence, correlation and resonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; He painted THE LAST SUPPER ( which never happened ) and MONA LISA \u2013 a hyped up painting<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mona-lisa-and-her-eyebrows-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>LEONARDO DA VINCIs ENTIRE SCIENTIFIC AN MATH KNOWLEDGE WAS LIFTED FROM THE STOLEN BOOKS FROM THE GREAT LIBABRY OF CORDOBA , SOUTH SPAIN, AFTER IT WAS SACKED BY BERBERS IN 1012 AD</b></span><br />\nUniversities in Paris and Oxford were established after visits by scholars to Moorish Spain's library Cordova. A lot of books were in Arabic, Malayalam and Sanskrit . These books were translated to Arabic knowledge in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nThe great library of Corboba , Spain was run by Kerala Namboodiris. That type of knowledge in those days , existed only in India. Hindus and Muslims co-existed because of the great Kerala spice market (owned by the Calicut King) just outside this library.<br />\n<br />\nArab Muslims were SPICE middle-men. I have visited Cordoba . Some interior pillars still have Hindu motifs .<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FIBONACCI WAS A ITALIAN THIEF WHO LIFTED THE GOLDEN MEAN AND FIBONACCI SERIES FROM THE ARABS.. THIS VEDIC KNOWLEDGE TRANSLATED TO ARABIC WAS SOLD FOR GOLD TO ARABS&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Fibonacci (died 1250 AD ) was an Italian mathematician from the Republic of Pisa, considered to be \"the most talented Western mathematician of the Middle Ages\"..<br />\n<br />\nFibonacci popularized the Hindu\u2013Arabic numeral system in the Western World primarily through his composition in 1202 of Liber Abaci (Book of Calculation). He introduced Europe to the sequence of Fibonacci numbers, which he used as an example in Liber Abaci.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leonardo_da_Vinci</span><br />\n<br />\nThe book De divina proportione (On the Divine Proportion) on mathematics written by Luca Pacioli and illustrated by Leonardo da Vinci, is 100% lifted from Vedas-- Brahmanas and Aranyakas- It related to the golden mean of 1.618<br />\n<br />\nHOW DID LEONARD DA VINCI GET THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 FOR MONA LISAs FACE ?<br />\n<br />\n1.618 IS THE FOUNDATION OF THE ANCIENT SRI YANTRA<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9nHcGHmUrK4</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\nIn De divina he explores its relation to the five regular (or Platonic) solids: the cube, tetrahedron and octahedron (used by the Pythagoras who studied in Kodungallur University )<br />\n<br />\nThe Pythagoreans had assigned each figure to an element: the cube to earth; the tetrahedron to fire; the octahedron to air; the icosahedron to water; and the dodecahedron to heavenly ether. ( VAASTU stuff lifted and fudges ).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_17MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_17BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_17B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"></span><br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1302187109658057037\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli says he\u2019s included in his book all the material forms of geometric bodies which have \u2018hitherto been unknown to the living\u2019.<br />\n<br />\n\"The geometric expression of divine proportion involves three lengths and God also contains three (the Holy Trinity of Father, Son and Holy Ghost)\"--LIFTED FROM INDIAN TRINITY.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF Pacioli proposes a fifth, esoteric, quality shared by the divine proportion and the Christian God, which he derives from Plato: \u2018As God has conferred being to heavenly virtue as a fifth substance, and by means of this fifth substance has extended being to the other four simple bodies or four elements (earth, water, air and fire) and through these to every other thing in nature, so in our divine proportion, following the ancient Plato in his Timaeus, we give formal being to Heaven itself by creating for it the body called the dodecahedron or the body of twelve pentagons.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nBRAAAAYYYY VIA ARABS ) LIKE FIBONACCI -- HE JUST INNOVATED A BIT.<br />\n<br />\nThief Leonardo da Vinci is the most overrated man on this planet\u2014so says Capt Ajit Vadakayil.<br />\n<br />\nLeonardo Da Vinci never actually built or tested most of his inventions --he just drew in a grander manner ( what he stole )<br />\n<br />\nLeonardo lifted from Ismail al-Jazari-- everything 100% of Al Jazari's Kerala elephant and Vishnu's Garuda in top. There were no elephants in Al Jazari baby\u2019s country.<br />\n<br />\nIbn Batuta had describes this clock in the Calicut Kings bedroom. A reproduction of the elephant clock can be seen in the Ibn Battuta Mall, Dubai.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/ibn-battuta-at-calicut-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug5F-_KzKMI</span><br />\n<br />\nAl-Jazari pre-dates Da Vinci by more than 200 years, and his STOLEN knowledge has programmable analog computers, camshaft, segmented gears, and more. Today we see it used in fibre optics. Total Internal Reflection was a science written down in our Vedic texts 7000 years ago.<br />\n<br />\nTill the white man discovered diamonds in South Africa in 1886, diamonds were available only in India. In 1726 the white man had found some\" low quality\" diamonds on a Brazilian river bed. The next discovery was in 1906 in Congo.<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANT GET THE PRECISION WITHOUT MEASURING INSTRUMENTS AND KNOWLEDGE OF CALCULUS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nA PYRAMID ( ON A MACRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE FIRST DRAWN IN SMALL SCALE ON PAPER--INCORPORATING THE GOLDEN MEAN OF 1.618 AND THE GOLDEN ANGLE OF 51 DEGREES, 49 MINUTES AND 38.25 SECONDS<br />\n<br />\nA DIAMOND ( ON MICRO SCALE ) HAS TO BE ENLARGED ON PAPER<br />\n<br />\nRATNA PARIKSHA was a 5000 year old Sanskrit text on optics which dealt with critical angles, high refractive index of diamond ( 2.4 ) and low critical angle ( 24 deg ) and total internal reflection physics and the art of cutting diamonds, to make it spit fire.. Precision was 100% required as a poor cut brought bad luck<br />\n<br />\nThe EYE OF BRAHMA ( colour changing diamond at middle eye ) would become opaque as soon as it was gouged out and stolen --and it brought a terrible curse. So as soon as the white an stole it , the first thing he did was to cut the diamond ( poorly ).<br />\n<br />\nThis was done even with SYAMANTAKAM ( Kohinoor). Despite cutting it brought bad luck. The queen consulted Indian astrologers and started the BEEF EATER and BLACK RAVEN thingy -it continues even today at the Tower of London<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun is low in the sky the rainbow appears relatively high; as the Sun rises higher, the rainbow appears lower in the sky, maintaining the critical 40\u00b0- to 42\u00b0-angle. When the Sun is more than 42\u00b0 above the horizon no rainbow can be seen because the required angle passes over the head of the observer.<br />\n<br />\nThe secondary rainbow has an angular radius of about 50\u00b0 and hence is seen outside of the primary bow. Higher-order rainbows, resulting from three or more internal reflections, are exceedingly weak but can be observed in Kerala in the months of August.<br />\n<br />\nAll this is written in our ancient texts.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_77BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; This is nonsense. Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj's religious and Vedic knowledge minister in 2800 BC<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . Today this ancient university is a Muslim mosque. Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the ancient Bhojsala university..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\nVararuchi lived 200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nTaxila and Nalanda have been hyped up by the white invader. More important and older universities like Kodungallur and Bhoj Shala Dhar has been deleted from history.<br />\nMEZHATHOL AGNIHOTRI WAS BORN MORE THAN 48 CENTURIES AGO.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parayi_Petta_Panthirukulam</span><br />\n<br />\nVararuchi never had a MAD son named Naranath Bhranthan ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naranath_Bhranthan</span><br />\nPakkanar never existed .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pakkanar</span><br />\nPerumthachan is NOT the son of Vararuchi.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perumthachan</span><br />\nThiruvalluvar was a Tamilian , NOT a Malayali. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 28, 2015 at 2:27 PM<br />\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\n4 days ago I visited a pretty village named Mezhathur 8 kms from Pattambi in Kerala.<br />\n<br />\nIt is named after Mezhathol Agnihothri.<br />\n<br />\nAgnihothri was the first child of Vararuchi.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol who did the famous Agnihotra ritual was the first child of the famous Vararuchi (2860 BC ) , the founder of Kerala system of Astrology.<br />\n<br />\nMezhathol did a marathon 99 Yaagams, one after the other. Lord Indra requested him not to do the 100th yaagam as this would give him unbridled powers and status higher than Indra.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\nVararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew inspiration crated the Kapatayadi system of counting. The entire Sanskrit Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form of a wheel<br />\n.<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n################################<br />\n<br />\nThe mathematical value pi has always been a curious number throughout history-- ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is Aryabhatta's version of the value of Pi in 2700 BC:<br />\n<br />\nLets split the words and understand the meaning:<br />\n\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u0927\u093f\u0915\u092e\u094d \u0936\u0924\u092e\u094d - Four more than hundred (=104)<br />\n\u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u0917\u0941\u0923\u092e\u094d - multiplied by 8 (104 x 8 = 832)<br />\n\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0937\u0937\u094d\u091f\u093f = 62<br />\n\u0924\u0925\u093e \u0938\u0939\u0938\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0923\u093e\u092e\u094d = of 1000 as such (=62000; totalling 62832)<br />\n\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924 \u0926\u094d\u0935\u092f = 10,000 x 2 (=20,000)<br />\n\u0935\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0915\u092e\u094d\u092d\u0938\u094d\u092f = of the diameter<br />\n\u0906\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0928: - approximately<br />\n\u0935\u0943\u0924\u094d\u0924 \u092a\u0930\u093f\u0923\u093e\u0939: - to the circumference.<br />\nIn effect, 62832/20000 =&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>3.1416</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIt interesting to note the large numbers he has used to arrive at Pi and the remark that pi is only an approximate value.<br />\n<br />\nAnd we have also coded it in Mantras by the KATAPAYADI SYSTEM<br />\n( check out in Wikipedia--they have just touched the tip of the PARALPERU iceberg. )<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHere is the Vararuchi system from Sanskrit verses .<br />\n<br />\nThey are not bumpkin shepherd\u2019s verses.<br />\n<br />\nVararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who taught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC .<br />\n<br />\nToday this ancient Hindu university is a Muslim mosque.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_64MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_64BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nWhat is the value of Pi ?<br />\n<br />\nO Lord anointed with the yogurt of the milkmaids\u2019 worship (Krishna), O savior of the fallen, O master of Shiva, please protect me.<br />\n<br />\n\u0917\u094b\u092a\u0940\u092d\u093e\u0917\u094d\u092f \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0935\u094d\u0930\u093e\u0924\u0903 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0902\u0917\u0936\u094b\u0926\u0927\u093f \u0938\u0902\u0927\u093f\u0917\u0903<br />\n<br />\n\u0916\u0932\u091c\u0940\u0935\u093f\u0924\u0916\u093e\u0924\u093e\u0935 \u0917\u0932\u0939\u093e\u0932\u093e \u0930\u0938\u0902\u0927\u0930\u0903<br />\n<br />\nGopibhagya madhuvrata srngisodadhisandhiga|<br />\nKhalajivitakhatava galahalarasandhara||<br />\n<br />\nKa\u1e6dapay\u0101di system dictates that:<br />\n* As the first digit is 3, the first consonant must be one of ga, \u1e0da, ba, la<br />\n* As the second digit is 1, the second consonant must be one of ka, \u1e6da, pa, ya<br />\n* For the third digit to be 4, the third consonant must be one of gha, \u1e0dha, bha, va\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSo to fit 3.141592653589793\u2026, the list of consonants in the verse must satisfy the regex<br />\n{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{gh,\u1e0dh,bh,v}{k,\u1e6d,p,y}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{jh,dh}{kh,\u1e6dh,ph,r}{c,t,\u1e63}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}{\u1e45,\u1e47,m,\u015b}{j,d,h}{jh,dh}{ch,th,s}{jh,dh}{g,\u1e0d,b,l}\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nga - 3 pii - 1 bhaa - 4 gya - 1 ma - 5 dhu - 9 ra - 2 ta -6 shru - 5 ga - 3 sho - 5 da - 8 dhi - 9 sa - 7 dha - 9 ga - 3 kha - 2 la - 3 jii - 8 vi - 4 ta - 6 kha - 2 ta - 6 va - 4 ga - 3 la - 3 ra - 2 sa - 7 dha - 9 ra \u2013 2<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">pi = 3.1415926535897932384626433832792</span><br />\n<br />\nShiksha, one of the six Vedangas, constituting a masterly exposition of the disciplines of Phonology and Phonetics developed in India, when the white man was running around naked doing GRUNT GRUNT for language<br />\n<br />\nAncient India used letters of the alphabet for numeric representation, till the appearance of specific symbols and words standing for numbers. The external world needed to be understood as much in quantitative as in qualitative terms. Time and distance required to be expressed in units.<br />\n<br />\nOne early device was to embed numeric codes through letters in texts. A typical example was the Katapayadi scheme where one could derive the numeric position of a Raga in the 72- Melakarta Raga scheme of classical music, from the letters that figured in the name of the Raga.<br />\n<br />\nThat scheme that tabulates the system of 72 basic ragas derives from a permutation and combination of the 12 half-tone intervals that comprise the octave and that figures so universally as to suggest an almost natural endowment or inheritance of all mankind.<br />\n<br />\nOne can recognize in these devices, the concepts could have led inevitably to thedevelopment of mathematical symbols and skills, and on the later development of advanced levels of knowledge in Mathematics and Astronomy.<br />\n<br />\nA fascination for Music, Mathematics and the Stars, leading on to God, would seem to characterize the ancient Indian mathematician and musician rooted in Shabda Brahman .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_65MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1521592996238#c4848674592747964571\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 21, 2018 at 6:13 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nThis brings us squarely into the discussion of what Words mean and indeed to the philosophical question of what Meaning itself means. A fundamental question then is, where does meaning come from ?<br />\n<br />\nFrom the thought, the word, from the choice or sequence of words, the whole sentence, or even the silent expression of what is not spoken ? Is there a gap between what is said and what is meant, and if so, how is it bridged ?<br />\n<br />\nThese are the central concerns of language, communication and meaning. And it is these questions that are addressed by the Vedangas. Thi is NOT mindless bullshit propagated by Noam Chomsky.<br />\n<br />\nThese disciplines of the Vedangas were later elaborated, codified and presented in extraordinary range and depth by a succession of the early brilliant scholars like Yaska, Panini and Patanjali and the later ones like Bhartrhari.<br />\n<br />\nTheir concepts reach down today in every significant work of modern linguistics Panini\u2019s central work, the Ashtdhyayi, so named after the eight chapters that comprise the work, has the totality of the Sanskrit language corpus, analysed and presented as rules of grammar in a total of 3998 Sutras or aphorisms of phenomenal brevity.<br />\n<br />\nIt has indeed been considered a masterpiece of encapsulation of the entire science of linguistics in a way that George Cardona says : \u201cPanini's grammar \u2026\u2026. merits asserting ... that it is one of the greatest monuments of human intelligence\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nDimitri Mendeleyeev said he could NOT have compiled his Periodic table and kept empty spaces , but for his knowledge of Sanskrit \u2013and he thanked Panini.<br />\n<br />\nThis pissed off the white man and he was denied the Nobel Prize.<br />\nTHIS WAS THE REASON WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS ABLE TO KICK NASA ON THEIR COLLECTIVE BALLS AND TWATS<br />\n<br />\nGo0gle for&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>DNA NASA&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT DO YOU SEE ON PAGE ONE AS ITEM ONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/dna-nasa-arsenic-and-phosphorous-capt.html</span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COSMOS IS A GRAND MUSICAL SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA .. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nWELL BEFORE THESE TWO THIEVES THAT WAS A JEW JOHN HOLWELL ( DIED 1686 ) WHO COLLECTED BOOKS ON CALCULUS AND ASTRONOMY FROM THE KERALA SCHOOL OF MATH.<br />\n<br />\nTHIEF ISAAC NEWTON DIED ONLY IN 1729<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLATER JOHN HOLWELLs SON JEW ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WOULD BUT KERALA TEAK AND ROSEWOOD FOR MAKING SHIPS IN LONDON..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN HOLWELLs GRANDSON JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL ( DIED 1798 )WAS A ROTHSCHILDs AGENT WHO CAME TO KERALA STOLE FROM SUSTRUTA SAMHITA AND BECAME A FAMOUS SURGEON..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIEF EDWARD JENNER ( FATHER OF VACCINATION ) DIED ONLY IN 1823 .. WE IN KERALA HAVE BEEN VACCINATING EGYPTIAN PHARAOHS THOUSANDS OF YEARS BEFORE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/edward-jenner-leech-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS A SURVIVOR OF THE \"BLACK HOLE OF CALCUTTA\" AND HE GAVE AN EXAGGERATED VERSION SO THAT ROTHSCHILD COULD USE THIS AS A HEGELIAN DIALECTIC..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/back-swing-of-john-galt-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN INDIA , IF YOU ASK A GENERAL OR A DGP --WHAT IS \"HEGELIAN DIALECTIC\" -THE CUNT WONT EVEN KNOW.. SO MUCH FOR OUR TRAINING ..<br />\n<br />\nJOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL WAS ELECTED FELLOW OF THE ROYAL SOCIETY IN 1767--AS HE GAVE MANY OF HIS STOLEN BOOKS FROM KERALA IN AYURVEDA AND MATH. ROTHSCHILD WOULD USE HIM FOR VACCINATING HIS WHITE SOLDIERS.<br />\n<br />\nIN GRATITUDE ROTHSCHILD MADE JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL GOVERNOR OF BENGAL --SUCCEEDING ROBERT CLIVE--ANOTHER THIEF OF THE FIRST ORDER.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WE MUST THANK JEW JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL FOR DECLARING IN ENGLAND TO THE PUBLIC THAT INDIANS ARE NOT A BUNCH OF SAVAGES..<br />\n<br />\nIT SHOCKED THE WHITE ENGLISH PUBLIC WHEN HE WROTE--<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: Homer, Virgil, Lucretius, Ovid, Lucian availed themselves of the simple cosmology of Brahma and derived their myths of creation from the Hindus. --from these Hindoos our Mitton copied -- Egyptians, Greeks, Romans, borrowed their mythology and cosmology from the doctrines of the Indian Hindoo\"<br />\n<br />\nHolwell in his Preliminary Discourse to the Religious Tenets of the Gentoos&nbsp;said :&nbsp; \"Having sediously perused all that has been written of the empire of&nbsp;ndostan, both as to its ancient as well as more modem state; as also the various&nbsp;accounts transmitted to us, by authors in almost all ages ... I venture to pronounce them all very defective, fallacious and unsatisfactory to an inquisitive searcher after tmth; and only tending to convey a very imperfect and injurious resemblance of a people, who from the earliest times have been an ornament to the creation if so much can with propriety be said of any known people upon earth\".<br />\n<br />\nHolwell wrote \u201c'Pythagoras and Plato came to India and borrowed the doctrines of the unity of Godhead, ... from the Brahmins of India\u201d. This statement was deleted by Jew Rothschild ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br />John Zephaniah Holwell</span>&nbsp;thus established the great antiquity of the Indian people and their literature. He, expressing himself against superficial studies, emphasized the need for a new orientation to Indian studies.<br />\n<br />\nIn this context he told not to depend only on the application of European standards to the study of India's past\u201d<br />\n<br />\nAT LEAST WE HAVE A HONEST JEW IN SURGEON JOHN ZEPHANIAH HOLWELL--UNLIKE HIS MATHEMATICIAN GRANDFATHER..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE INDIANS ARE GRATEFUL TO THIS JEW&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayi<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_77b+seedBU77D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_77b+seedBU77D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 35.2px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Through uniting with Purusha ( Shiva ) &nbsp;, Prakriti &nbsp;( Shakti ) gave form to his spirit and created the universe.&nbsp; (we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here - not street side sex&nbsp; as figured out by small minds)..&nbsp; When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle.&nbsp; Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.&nbsp; &nbsp;Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation.&nbsp; The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise&nbsp; is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_207BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Why did Trump go to Saudi Arabia first ?</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Read all 5 parts , below-</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-truth-exhumed-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5eyBI8ZZyRo/WSacn3IM5lI/AAAAAAABTnY/_JQTP6uTcCE6NaPyGI4Qh-ex_X9FkmCAgCLcB/s1600/iSSmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"167\" data-original-width=\"302\" height=\"353\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-5eyBI8ZZyRo/WSacn3IM5lI/AAAAAAABTnY/_JQTP6uTcCE6NaPyGI4Qh-ex_X9FkmCAgCLcB/s640/iSSmages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xVNkkm9eRVg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xVNkkm9eRVg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drawing support from\nmany non-Nazi Germans who harbored social prejudice towards Roma, the Nazis\njudged Roma to be \"racially inferior.\" SS medical researchers\nassigned to the Auschwitz complex, such as SS Captain JEW Dr. Josef Mengele,\nreceived authorization to choose human subjects for pseudoscientific medical\nexperiments from among the prisoners in the Auschwitz concentration camp\ncomplex.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In late March, the SS murdered approximately 1,700 Roma from the\nBialystok region in the gas chambers; After transferring as many as 3,000 Roma\ncapable of work to Auschwitz I and other concentration camps in Germany in the\nlate spring and early summer of 1944, the SS moved against the remaining 2,898\ninmates on August 2. Most of the victims were ill, elderly men, women, and\nchildren. The camp staff killed virtually all in the gas chambers of Birkenau.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A handful of children who had hidden during the operation were captured and\nkilled in the following days. At least 19,000 of the 23,000 Roma sent to\nAuschwitz died there. The total number of Roma killed in Serbia will never be\nknown. Estimates range upto 12,000. Romanian military and police officials\ndeported around 26,000 Roma, primarily from Bukovina and Bessarabia,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nauthorities of the so-called Independent State of Croatia, another Axis partner\nof Germany and run by the militant separatist and terrorist Ustasa\norganization, physically annihilated virtually the entire Roma population of\nthe country, around 25,000 people. The concentration camp system of Jasenovac,\nrun by the Ustasa militia and the Croat political police, claimed the lives\nof&nbsp; upto&nbsp;\n20,000 Roma. It is not known precisely how many Roma were killed in the\nHolocaust.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While exact figures or percentages cannot be ascertained, historians\nestimate that the Germans and their allies killed around 25 percent of all\nEuropean Roma. Of slightly less than one million Roma believed to have been\nliving in Europe before the war, the Germans and their Axis partners killed up\nto 220,000.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only in late 1979 did the West German Federal Parliament identify\nthe Nazi persecution of Roma as being racially motivated, creating eligibility\nfor most Roma to apply for compensation for their suffering and loss under the\nNazi regime. By this time, many of those who became eligible had already died.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the height of the\nbombing, the BBC's Kirsty Wark interviewed General Wesley Clark, the Nato\ncommander. The Serbian city of Nis had just been sprayed with American cluster\nbombs, killing women, old people and children in an open market and a hospital.\nWark asked not a single question about this, or about any other civilian\ndeaths.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Their main aim of the sheikhs was to grab a\npiece of the mafia action for themselves.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Albanian crypto Jew mercenaries have no scruples and will murder\nanybody&nbsp; as long as the SUPARI amount is\nright. &nbsp;In Kosovo you can get passports of any nation you want<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2004, a Gallup\nsurvey measured popular opinion of U.S. foreign policy around the world. Only\nten countries rated American foreign policy favorably, and among those, Kosovo\nscored highest, registering 88 percent approval&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crypto Jew Islamic&nbsp; Kosovars were America\u2019s , Israel\u2019s and Saudi\nArabia\u2019s most reliable allies in the world.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">American flags fly just\nabout everywhere outside the Serbian enclaves\u2014 some even in front of official\nbuildings\u2014and are sold at kiosks on the street, along with T-shirts that say\nTHANK YOU USA.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hotel Victory has\nerected the world\u2019s second-largest replica of the Statue of Liberty on its\nroof, and there is&nbsp; another replica in\nthe southeastern town of Vitina. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kosovars are fans of\nGeorge W. Bush, both because he recognized Kosovo\u2019s independence and simply\nbecause he\u2019s the US president. Graffiti in one Kosovar village proclaims THANKS\nUSA AND BUSH. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Many businesses are named after Clinton.&nbsp;&nbsp; There is a patisserie and disco bar named\n\u201cHillary,\u201d decorated with pictures of the ex-president and his wife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is striking about\nthe Yugoslav conflict, given the level of intense media coverage and public\ninterest it has received in the United States and abroad, is that there is\nalmost a complete lack of any public accountability by any of the national NATO\nmembers for missions undertaken in the NATO alliance's name.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Little information has\nbeen released on nations or aircraft involved in bombing missions, on specific\ntargets, and there is sparse information on weapons used in individual\ncircumstances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF THIS PLANET MUST\nKNOW PEACE,&nbsp; ROTHSCHILDs PRIVATE ARMY NATO\n&nbsp;AND THE ALBANIAN MAFIA ARM MUST BE\nDISMANTLED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
